And I’ll tell you the reason why.	 41.59377235304998
She always kept things decent in	 100.99456717720344
The Hannigan famileye.	 6.922777768218444
His feet marched in sudden proud rhythm over the sand furrows, along by	 72.15657411881593
the boulders of the south wall. He stared at them proudly, piled stone	 50.11916758159295
mammoth skulls. Gold light on sea, on sand, on boulders. The sun is	 117.4757165821384
there, the slender trees, the lemon houses.	 232.1111633617923
Paris rawly waking, crude sunlight on her lemon streets. Moist pith of	 58.843121947367216
farls of bread, the froggreen wormwood, her matin incense, court the	 44.68077078920059
air. Belluomo rises from the bed of his wife’s lover’s wife, the	 64.70668132490806
kerchiefed housewife is astir, a saucer of acetic acid in her hand. In	 19.441371713306502
Rodot’s Yvonne and Madeleine newmake their tumbled beauties, shattering	 6.794602523364729
with gold teeth _chaussons_ of pastry, their mouths yellowed with the	 50.90271046606923
_pus_ of _flan bréton_. Faces of Paris men go by, their wellpleased	 49.920203042037635
pleasers, curled conquistadores.	 88.001368590792
Noon slumbers. Kevin Egan rolls gunpowder cigarettes through fingers	 157.45184893888535
smeared with printer’s ink, sipping his green fairy as Patrice his	 45.976443344288654
white. About us gobblers fork spiced beans down their gullets. _Un demi	 142.6501644035544
sétier!_ A jet of coffee steam from the burnished caldron. She serves	 20.723603990329373
me at his beck. _Il est irlandais. Hollandais? Non fromage. Deux	 48.95931082885884
irlandais, nous, Irlande, vous savez ah, oui!_ She thought you wanted a	 51.033168161621994
cheese _hollandais_. Your postprandial, do you know that word?	 55.45120605081268
Postprandial. There was a fellow I knew once in Barcelona, queer	 40.565701469296464
fellow, used to call it his postprandial. Well: _slainte!_ Around the	 52.93454144840248
slabbed tables the tangle of wined breaths and grumbling gorges. His	 12.574101871600387
breath hangs over our saucestained plates, the green fairy’s fang	 74.45220584300617
thrusting between his lips. Of Ireland, the Dalcassians, of hopes,	 42.44560491322384
conspiracies, of Arthur Griffith now, A E, pimander, good shepherd of	 40.36345102440411
men. To yoke me as his yokefellow, our crimes our common cause. You’re	 124.41761699063673
your father’s son. I know the voice. His fustian shirt,	 111.96375981189605
sanguineflowered, trembles its Spanish tassels at his secrets. M.	 54.48599483437115
Drumont, famous journalist, Drumont, know what he called queen	 95.80592068288459
Victoria? Old hag with the yellow teeth. _Vieille ogresse_ with the	 78.62736890482338
_dents jaunes_. Maud Gonne, beautiful woman, _La Patrie_, M. Millevoye,	 51.50667466578656
Félix Faure, know how he died? Licentious men. The froeken, _bonne à	 36.48867287258613
tout faire_, who rubs male nakedness in the bath at Upsala. _Moi	 24.417526710140244
faire_, she said, _Tous les messieurs_. Not this _Monsieur_, I said.	 84.74810641090787
Most licentious custom. Bath a most private thing. I wouldn’t let my	 149.78855985656685
brother, not even my own brother, most lascivious thing. Green eyes, I	 194.50788843902453
see you. Fang, I feel. Lascivious people.	 104.22307162755757
The blue fuse burns deadly between hands and burns clear. Loose	 58.50099527620323
tobaccoshreds catch fire: a flame and acrid smoke light our corner. Raw	 214.2786820398378
facebones under his peep of day boy’s hat. How the head centre got	 120.08845576786207
away, authentic version. Got up as a young bride, man, veil,	 87.41114479902818
orangeblossoms, drove out the road to Malahide. Did, faith. Of lost	 112.81641418221676
leaders, the betrayed, wild escapes. Disguises, clutched at, gone, not	 49.09009806651672
here.	 766.5895929181931
Spurned lover. I was a strapping young gossoon at that time, I tell	 56.034564159205004
you. I’ll show you my likeness one day. I was, faith. Lover, for her	 55.17146095633178
love he prowled with colonel Richard Burke, tanist of his sept, under	 51.91924085833366
the walls of Clerkenwell and, crouching, saw a flame of vengeance hurl	 19.580474619688815
them upward in the fog. Shattered glass and toppling masonry. In gay	 52.957012190558494
Paree he hides, Egan of Paris, unsought by any save by me. Making his	 75.61151981410946
day’s stations, the dingy printingcase, his three taverns, the	 43.54608910268712
Montmartre lair he sleeps short night in, rue de la Goutte-d’Or,	 22.210701561817753
damascened with flyblown faces of the gone. Loveless, landless,	 29.88152825398724
wifeless. She is quite nicey comfy without her outcast man, madame in	 66.5061506868369
rue Gît-le-Cœur, canary and two buck lodgers. Peachy cheeks, a zebra	 29.630314404454925
skirt, frisky as a young thing’s. Spurned and undespairing. Tell Pat	 123.13617167336793
you saw me, won’t you? I wanted to get poor Pat a job one time. _Mon	 110.14007033058928
fils_, soldier of France. I taught him to sing _The boys of Kilkenny	 59.587383192726534
are stout roaring blades_. Know that old lay? I taught Patrice that.	 162.5680593943134
Old Kilkenny: saint Canice, Strongbow’s castle on the Nore. Goes like	 64.27588154901656
this. _O, O_. He takes me, Napper Tandy, by the hand.	 62.52154967003189
O, O the boys of	 42.68572124183896
Kilkenny...	 9064.4883153015
Weak wasting hand on mine. They have forgotten Kevin Egan, not he them.	 151.4099871515784
Remembering thee, O Sion.	 126.19446350908228
He had come nearer the edge of the sea and wet sand slapped his boots.	 50.43415517087575
The new air greeted him, harping in wild nerves, wind of wild air of	 207.49303967294279
seeds of brightness. Here, I am not walking out to the Kish lightship,	 47.27595753855531
am I? He stood suddenly, his feet beginning to sink slowly in the	 54.44135801549512
quaking soil. Turn back.	 165.09393330773406
Turning, he scanned the shore south, his feet sinking again slowly in	 77.63977272495889
new sockets. The cold domed room of the tower waits. Through the	 67.99309809457779
barbacans the shafts of light are moving ever, slowly ever as my feet	 79.78508325621812
are sinking, creeping duskward over the dial floor. Blue dusk,	 62.38031239741001
nightfall, deep blue night. In the darkness of the dome they wait,	 62.48724490383564
their pushedback chairs, my obelisk valise, around a board of abandoned	 78.57501967363864
platters. Who to clear it? He has the key. I will not sleep there when	 123.63700926949063
this night comes. A shut door of a silent tower, entombing their blind	 105.37079949023759
bodies, the panthersahib and his pointer. Call: no answer. He lifted	 146.64262421082356
his feet up from the suck and turned back by the mole of boulders. Take	 74.31788185995823
all, keep all. My soul walks with me, form of forms. So in the moon’s	 94.40843459634488
midwatches I pace the path above the rocks, in sable silvered, hearing	 57.63972467900569
Elsinore’s tempting flood.	 47.983647330346734
The flood is following me. I can watch it flow past from here. Get back	 144.86221159350143
then by the Poolbeg road to the strand there. He climbed over the sedge	 39.74257304929502
and eely oarweeds and sat on a stool of rock, resting his ashplant in a	 22.904981461913383
grike.	 4.608171674364364
A bloated carcass of a dog lay lolled on bladderwrack. Before him the	 33.450853009835996
gunwale of a boat, sunk in sand. _Un coche ensablé_ Louis Veuillot	 30.154584814660872
called Gautier’s prose. These heavy sands are language tide and wind	 191.6563885453373
have silted here. And these, the stoneheaps of dead builders, a warren	 47.63322442649592
of weasel rats. Hide gold there. Try it. You have some. Sands and	 77.66636435942576
stones. Heavy of the past. Sir Lout’s toys. Mind you don’t get one bang	 131.32119948294667
on the ear. I’m the bloody well gigant rolls all them bloody well	 163.26796111475795
boulders, bones for my steppingstones. Feefawfum. I zmellz de bloodz	 35.65225987935404
odz an Iridzman.	 17.84116441836289
A point, live dog, grew into sight running across the sweep of sand.	 65.37312602738125
Lord, is he going to attack me? Respect his liberty. You will not be	 89.6998493457509
master of others or their slave. I have my stick. Sit tight. From	 142.18491605802478
farther away, walking shoreward across from the crested tide, figures,	 121.81788894006402
two. The two maries. They have tucked it safe mong the bulrushes.	 63.533520958880125
Peekaboo. I see you. No, the dog. He is running back to them. Who?	 71.54722546249579
Galleys of the Lochlanns ran here to beach, in quest of prey, their	 50.31461491625173
bloodbeaked prows riding low on a molten pewter surf. Dane vikings,	 15.237352718748763
torcs of tomahawks aglitter on their breasts when Malachi wore the	 17.763851134213258
collar of gold. A school of turlehide whales stranded in hot noon,	 55.02709766955365
spouting, hobbling in the shallows. Then from the starving cagework	 10.896743622232114
city a horde of jerkined dwarfs, my people, with flayers’ knives,	 28.96576068170129
running, scaling, hacking in green blubbery whalemeat. Famine, plague	 56.32189666075062
and slaughters. Their blood is in me, their lusts my waves. I moved	 136.6460669083014
among them on the frozen Liffey, that I, a changeling, among the	 83.38871646404603
spluttering resin fires. I spoke to no-one: none to me.	 42.67921105871267
The dog’s bark ran towards him, stopped, ran back. Dog of my enemy. I	 89.59360108233737
just simply stood pale, silent, bayed about. _Terribilia meditans_. A	 110.53387967757885
primrose doublet, fortune’s knave, smiled on my fear. For that are you	 102.50650812489589
pining, the bark of their applause? Pretenders: live their lives. The	 50.278079753496776
Bruce’s brother, Thomas Fitzgerald, silken knight, Perkin Warbeck,	 28.907576568856882
York’s false scion, in breeches of silk of whiterose ivory, wonder of a	 104.73663920208591
day, and Lambert Simnel, with a tail of nans and sutlers, a scullion	 32.29862154400691
crowned. All kings’ sons. Paradise of pretenders then and now. He saved	 65.0149083332193
men from drowning and you shake at a cur’s yelping. But the courtiers	 52.55896913589126
who mocked Guido in Or san Michele were in their own house. House of...	 47.10261986040404
We don’t want any of your medieval abstrusiosities. Would you do what	 49.638796809038794
he did? A boat would be near, a lifebuoy. _Natürlich_, put there for	 65.8178507091761
you. Would you or would you not? The man that was drowned nine days ago	 47.845839591254745
off Maiden’s rock. They are waiting for him now. The truth, spit it	 68.4030465106605
out. I would want to. I would try. I am not a strong swimmer. Water	 81.50653503858692
cold soft. When I put my face into it in the basin at Clongowes. Can’t	 83.37020398457997
see! Who’s behind me? Out quickly, quickly! Do you see the tide flowing	 138.9698237512914
quickly in on all sides, sheeting the lows of sand quickly,	 50.613086346187906
shellcocoacoloured? If I had land under my feet. I want his life still	 103.69363710498259
to be his, mine to be mine. A drowning man. His human eyes scream to me	 107.84941843894704
out of horror of his death. I... With him together down... I could not	 106.44076430460352
save her. Waters: bitter death: lost.	 448.2986736775002
A woman and a man. I see her skirties. Pinned up, I bet.	 68.98821612886977
Their dog ambled about a bank of dwindling sand, trotting, sniffing on	 115.14495857899948
all sides. Looking for something lost in a past life. Suddenly he made	 112.71845066408358
off like a bounding hare, ears flung back, chasing the shadow of a	 57.20627030230927
lowskimming gull. The man’s shrieked whistle struck his limp ears. He	 71.73802761985483
turned, bounded back, came nearer, trotted on twinkling shanks. On a	 146.15514941993774
field tenney a buck, trippant, proper, unattired. At the lacefringe of	 61.59585482047608
the tide he halted with stiff forehoofs, seawardpointed ears. His snout	 81.04242189368384
lifted barked at the wavenoise, herds of seamorse. They serpented	 23.80222428964877
towards his feet, curling, unfurling many crests, every ninth,	 76.72483124430151
breaking, plashing, from far, from farther out, waves and waves.	 152.51858930918718
Cocklepickers. They waded a little way in the water and, stooping,	 37.053411835928785
soused their bags and, lifting them again, waded out. The dog yelped	 41.55154355921471
running to them, reared up and pawed them, dropping on all fours, again	 70.07954603561728
reared up at them with mute bearish fawning. Unheeded he kept by them	 38.86095058336794
as they came towards the drier sand, a rag of wolf’s tongue redpanting	 42.55756657431458
from his jaws. His speckled body ambled ahead of them and then loped	 49.42840830509811
off at a calf’s gallop. The carcass lay on his path. He stopped,	 66.69569565781728
sniffed, stalked round it, brother, nosing closer, went round it,	 49.27872178399607
sniffling rapidly like a dog all over the dead dog’s bedraggled fell.	 86.97602698731026
Dogskull, dogsniff, eyes on the ground, moves to one great goal. Ah,	 45.24906724566857
poor dogsbody! Here lies poor dogsbody’s body.	 194.36006050412524
—Tatters! Out of that, you mongrel!	 55.02136629361543
The cry brought him skulking back to his master and a blunt bootless	 38.89906872062722
kick sent him unscathed across a spit of sand, crouched in flight. He	 67.0997586850054
slunk back in a curve. Doesn’t see me. Along by the edge of the mole he	 59.425352285389316
lolloped, dawdled, smelt a rock and from under a cocked hindleg pissed	 58.008825582888434
against it. He trotted forward and, lifting again his hindleg, pissed	 61.709536621732674
quick short at an unsmelt rock. The simple pleasures of the poor. His	 176.85173418280758
hindpaws then scattered the sand: then his forepaws dabbled and delved.	 24.382435948529615
Something he buried there, his grandmother. He rooted in the sand,	 88.35776763377936
dabbling, delving and stopped to listen to the air, scraped up the sand	 36.21153718162703
again with a fury of his claws, soon ceasing, a pard, a panther, got in	 66.29546045448738
spousebreach, vulturing the dead.	 23.869119043024238
After he woke me last night same dream or was it? Wait. Open hallway.	 99.78842963136984
Street of harlots. Remember. Haroun al Raschid. I am almosting it. That	 44.307654129337855
man led me, spoke. I was not afraid. The melon he had he held against	 89.1717741394342
my face. Smiled: creamfruit smell. That was the rule, said. In. Come.	 90.12001968071748
Red carpet spread. You will see who.	 48.92296781238186
Shouldering their bags they trudged, the red Egyptians. His blued feet	 36.080850162213466
out of turnedup trousers slapped the clammy sand, a dull brick muffler	 31.712388569666505
strangling his unshaven neck. With woman steps she followed: the	 68.49436293913537
ruffian and his strolling mort. Spoils slung at her back. Loose sand	 87.38265763038495
and shellgrit crusted her bare feet. About her windraw face hair	 47.796638416967696
trailed. Behind her lord, his helpmate, bing awast to Romeville. When	 40.41221950383099
night hides her body’s flaws calling under her brown shawl from an	 69.97725026788869
archway where dogs have mired. Her fancyman is treating two Royal	 56.902166908919895
Dublins in O’Loughlin’s of Blackpitts. Buss her, wap in rogues’ rum	 17.924754235245278
lingo, for, O, my dimber wapping dell! A shefiend’s whiteness under her	 23.35429475918019
rancid rags. Fumbally’s lane that night: the tanyard smells.	 38.75738167438695
White thy fambles, red thy gan	 141.5146398261944
And thy quarrons dainty is.	 134.72472712116877
Couch a hogshead with me then.	 176.83478915496505
In the darkmans clip and kiss.	 59.45519782310629
Morose delectation Aquinas tunbelly calls this, _frate porcospino_.	 16.790152160207285
Unfallen Adam rode and not rutted. Call away let him: _thy quarrons	 97.45956223701933
dainty is_. Language no whit worse than his. Monkwords, marybeads	 89.19554224903348
jabber on their girdles: roguewords, tough nuggets patter in their	 10.046625067462218
pockets.	 6710.406055504035
Passing now.	 895.3438754444754
A side eye at my Hamlet hat. If I were suddenly naked here as I sit? I	 128.02206111884928
am not. Across the sands of all the world, followed by the sun’s	 36.39540045083138
flaming sword, to the west, trekking to evening lands. She trudges,	 77.31106083601722
schlepps, trains, drags, trascines her load. A tide westering,	 33.628628805720254
moondrawn, in her wake. Tides, myriadislanded, within her, blood not	 52.97435009108325
mine, _oinopa ponton_, a winedark sea. Behold the handmaid of the moon.	 33.14902648431973
In sleep the wet sign calls her hour, bids her rise. Bridebed,	 123.93971938922168
childbed, bed of death, ghostcandled. _Omnis caro ad te veniet_. He	 31.469389936829057
comes, pale vampire, through storm his eyes, his bat sails bloodying	 63.983206618162136
the sea, mouth to her mouth’s kiss.	 91.45650152094882
Here. Put a pin in that chap, will you? My tablets. Mouth to her kiss.	 71.65638739022556
No. Must be two of em. Glue em well. Mouth to her mouth’s kiss.	 144.90805914039208
His lips lipped and mouthed fleshless lips of air: mouth to her moomb.	 36.11507437400235
Oomb, allwombing tomb. His mouth moulded issuing breath, unspeeched:	 21.752409772737455
ooeeehah: roar of cataractic planets, globed, blazing, roaring	 24.74533477629689
wayawayawayawayaway. Paper. The banknotes, blast them. Old Deasy’s	 77.49820231614476
letter. Here. Thanking you for the hospitality tear the blank end off.	 122.52339327647645
Turning his back to the sun he bent over far to a table of rock and	 76.90396051275013
scribbled words. That’s twice I forgot to take slips from the library	 125.33556690881164
counter.	 8501.45569188669
His shadow lay over the rocks as he bent, ending. Why not endless till	 115.46131382693551
the farthest star? Darkly they are there behind this light, darkness	 91.66701700933264
shining in the brightness, delta of Cassiopeia, worlds. Me sits there	 109.353435713217
with his augur’s rod of ash, in borrowed sandals, by day beside a livid	 32.46604479171875
sea, unbeheld, in violet night walking beneath a reign of uncouth	 57.03827270933543
stars. I throw this ended shadow from me, manshape ineluctable, call it	 209.52992162771022
back. Endless, would it be mine, form of my form? Who watches me here?	 102.10862114887449
Who ever anywhere will read these written words? Signs on a white	 168.0371481408005
field. Somewhere to someone in your flutiest voice. The good bishop of	 131.0129064536235
Cloyne took the veil of the temple out of his shovel hat: veil of space	 61.61742293398477
with coloured emblems hatched on its field. Hold hard. Coloured on a	 54.50182303490979
flat: yes, that’s right. Flat I see, then think distance, near, far,	 221.85619874047075
flat I see, east, back. Ah, see now! Falls back suddenly, frozen in	 164.99074862544595
stereoscope. Click does the trick. You find my words dark. Darkness is	 110.31285400451488
in our souls do you not think? Flutier. Our souls, shamewounded by our	 57.07710662508811
sins, cling to us yet more, a woman to her lover clinging, the more the	 129.6347909216012
more.	 1129.3064542327327
She trusts me, her hand gentle, the longlashed eyes. Now where the blue	 75.5655764505903
hell am I bringing her beyond the veil? Into the ineluctable modality	 83.87692209829241
of the ineluctable visuality. She, she, she. What she? The virgin at	 198.0999708887107
Hodges Figgis’ window on Monday looking in for one of the alphabet	 54.451874093832835
books you were going to write. Keen glance you gave her. Wrist through	 71.58771073251314
the braided jesse of her sunshade. She lives in Leeson park with a	 37.51770847250867
grief and kickshaws, a lady of letters. Talk that to someone else,	 120.18436765847044
Stevie: a pickmeup. Bet she wears those curse of God stays suspenders	 45.73135695971241
and yellow stockings, darned with lumpy wool. Talk about apple	 67.72668649780182
dumplings, _piuttosto_. Where are your wits?	 54.36472341945808
Touch me. Soft eyes. Soft soft soft hand. I am lonely here. O, touch me	 74.97401430223006
soon, now. What is that word known to all men? I am quiet here alone.	 67.58568884004649
Sad too. Touch, touch me.	 181.9924068841408
He lay back at full stretch over the sharp rocks, cramming the	 53.533260589017516
scribbled note and pencil into a pocket, his hat tilted down on his	 57.924771807043165
eyes. That is Kevin Egan’s movement I made, nodding for his nap,	 113.44929215092404
sabbath sleep. _Et vidit Deus. Et erant valde bona_. Alo! _Bonjour_.	 22.17815843703775
Welcome as the flowers in May. Under its leaf he watched through	 213.97087645718048
peacocktwittering lashes the southing sun. I am caught in this burning	 47.54642315966717
scene. Pan’s hour, the faunal noon. Among gumheavy serpentplants,	 88.57205427940647
milkoozing fruits, where on the tawny waters leaves lie wide. Pain is	 204.3262531543974
far.	 2423.8344003412017
And no more turn aside and brood.	 16.053608400204098
His gaze brooded on his broadtoed boots, a buck’s castoffs,	 27.56875248058352
_nebeneinander_. He counted the creases of rucked leather wherein	 15.587288317231307
another’s foot had nested warm. The foot that beat the ground in	 121.58841506430811
tripudium, foot I dislove. But you were delighted when Esther Osvalt’s	 52.217494618719826
shoe went on you: girl I knew in Paris. _Tiens, quel petit pied!_	 65.8958143236485
Staunch friend, a brother soul: Wilde’s love that dare not speak its	 132.4023955299718
name. His arm: Cranly’s arm. He now will leave me. And the blame? As I	 148.26076196986264
am. As I am. All or not at all.	 128.19139612390703
In long lassoes from the Cock lake the water flowed full, covering	 99.23501160006246
greengoldenly lagoons of sand, rising, flowing. My ashplant will float	 54.168941412853975
away. I shall wait. No, they will pass on, passing, chafing against the	 165.31147566294064
low rocks, swirling, passing. Better get this job over quick. Listen: a	 387.0187433199972
fourworded wavespeech: seesoo, hrss, rsseeiss, ooos. Vehement breath of	 8.942232600604738
waters amid seasnakes, rearing horses, rocks. In cups of rocks it	 206.8378774732461
slops: flop, slop, slap: bounded in barrels. And, spent, its speech	 64.51244711493798
ceases. It flows purling, widely flowing, floating foampool, flower	 58.90847310391592
unfurling.	 4.608171674364364
Under the upswelling tide he saw the writhing weeds lift languidly and	 34.02089883633467
sway reluctant arms, hising up their petticoats, in whispering water	 76.09490811610095
swaying and upturning coy silver fronds. Day by day: night by night:	 91.01260660010233
lifted, flooded and let fall. Lord, they are weary; and, whispered to,	 67.34293307263717
they sigh. Saint Ambrose heard it, sigh of leaves and waves, waiting,	 136.09088626665968
awaiting the fullness of their times, _diebus ac noctibus iniurias	 12.8043745279192
patiens ingemiscit_. To no end gathered; vainly then released,	 48.80385414242427
forthflowing, wending back: loom of the moon. Weary too in sight of	 47.761134692529176
lovers, lascivious men, a naked woman shining in her courts, she draws	 150.07198942689706
a toil of waters.	 34.75428830294937
Five fathoms out there. Full fathom five thy father lies. At one, he	 178.37281579770817
said. Found drowned. High water at Dublin bar. Driving before it a	 135.72920435809888
loose drift of rubble, fanshoals of fishes, silly shells. A corpse	 59.53369966166762
rising saltwhite from the undertow, bobbing a pace a pace a porpoise	 29.30186185011496
landward. There he is. Hook it quick. Pull. Sunk though he be beneath	 61.77148208862381
the watery floor. We have him. Easy now.	 38.206462637960435
Bag of corpsegas sopping in foul brine. A quiver of minnows, fat of a	 30.21315317445105
spongy titbit, flash through the slits of his buttoned trouserfly. God	 35.553287449558304
becomes man becomes fish becomes barnacle goose becomes featherbed	 172.74646640147694
mountain. Dead breaths I living breathe, tread dead dust, devour a	 237.24659481266653
urinous offal from all dead. Hauled stark over the gunwale he breathes	 25.872259168559257
upward the stench of his green grave, his leprous nosehole snoring to	 34.2869281550767
the sun.	 70.67507120277145
A seachange this, brown eyes saltblue. Seadeath, mildest of all deaths	 44.09613992970003
known to man. Old Father Ocean. _Prix de Paris_: beware of imitations.	 98.79111856407667
Just you give it a fair trial. We enjoyed ourselves immensely.	 82.95504196035445
Come. I thirst. Clouding over. No black clouds anywhere, are there?	 140.29001975043462
Thunderstorm. Allbright he falls, proud lightning of the intellect,	 34.04518001238451
_Lucifer, dico, qui nescit occasum_. No. My cockle hat and staff and	 31.600178660538248
hismy sandal shoon. Where? To evening lands. Evening will find itself.	 46.93725705589504
He took the hilt of his ashplant, lunging with it softly, dallying	 27.409169597854106
still. Yes, evening will find itself in me, without me. All days make	 182.81228487985072
their end. By the way next when is it Tuesday will be the longest day.	 70.55793573061408
Of all the glad new year, mother, the rum tum tiddledy tum. Lawn	 88.53444384558273
Tennyson, gentleman poet. _Già_. For the old hag with the yellow teeth.	 46.367734672451306
And Monsieur Drumont, gentleman journalist. _Già_. My teeth are very	 125.27544607908574
bad. Why, I wonder. Feel. That one is going too. Shells. Ought I go to	 148.6256475187595
a dentist, I wonder, with that money? That one. This. Toothless Kinch,	 111.66548511763072
the superman. Why is that, I wonder, or does it mean something perhaps?	 87.49627147721249
My handkerchief. He threw it. I remember. Did I not take it up?	 112.00824571883352
His hand groped vainly in his pockets. No, I didn’t. Better buy one.	 51.99748045401001
He laid the dry snot picked from his nostril on a ledge of rock,	 43.98870908068615
carefully. For the rest let look who will.	 178.51386656964328
Behind. Perhaps there is someone.	 533.7316742608635
He turned his face over a shoulder, rere regardant. Moving through the	 54.5107654750862
air high spars of a threemaster, her sails brailed up on the	 28.219139179441
crosstrees, homing, upstream, silently moving, a silent ship.	 50.250656944848025
— II —	 4.608171674364364
[ 4 ]	 463.94842625767166
Mr Leopold Bloom ate with relish the inner organs of beasts and fowls.	 23.55335855308248
He liked thick giblet soup, nutty gizzards, a stuffed roast heart,	 100.62031952912645
liverslices fried with crustcrumbs, fried hencods’ roes. Most of all he	 83.74940141378895
liked grilled mutton kidneys which gave to his palate a fine tang of	 63.02941066741569
faintly scented urine.	 213.58557182642582
Kidneys were in his mind as he moved about the kitchen softly, righting	 45.13901317932583
her breakfast things on the humpy tray. Gelid light and air were in the	 71.83292867362759
kitchen but out of doors gentle summer morning everywhere. Made him	 164.70392056645542
feel a bit peckish.	 86.09414603362141
The coals were reddening.	 17.27825353271037
Another slice of bread and butter: three, four: right. She didn’t like	 104.59312026669177
her plate full. Right. He turned from the tray, lifted the kettle off	 137.30799125604887
the hob and set it sideways on the fire. It sat there, dull and squat,	 44.821006070235356
its spout stuck out. Cup of tea soon. Good. Mouth dry. The cat walked	 220.1340565832065
stiffly round a leg of the table with tail on high.	 62.673998149867344
—Mkgnao!	 4.608171674364364
—O, there you are, Mr Bloom said, turning from the fire.	 40.13524547942558
The cat mewed in answer and stalked again stiffly round a leg of the	 39.66617945558807
table, mewing. Just how she stalks over my writingtable. Prr. Scratch	 135.931624185308
my head. Prr.	 81.19075016664547
Mr Bloom watched curiously, kindly the lithe black form. Clean to see:	 66.58983995253455
the gloss of her sleek hide, the white button under the butt of her	 29.54859609713619
tail, the green flashing eyes. He bent down to her, his hands on his	 79.6170640580007
knees.	 9129.572798767445
—Milk for the pussens, he said.	 33.622800313383145
—Mrkgnao! the cat cried.	 42.34671729240023
They call them stupid. They understand what we say better than we	 84.45331871507356
understand them. She understands all she wants to. Vindictive too.	 164.12981559037968
Cruel. Her nature. Curious mice never squeal. Seem to like it. Wonder	 150.6302581137901
what I look like to her. Height of a tower? No, she can jump me.	 110.00339399692169
—Afraid of the chickens she is, he said mockingly. Afraid of the	 33.116006088852735
chookchooks. I never saw such a stupid pussens as the pussens.	 29.678012863070684
—Mrkrgnao! the cat said loudly.	 66.2148276083844
She blinked up out of her avid shameclosing eyes, mewing plaintively	 21.57982720161342
and long, showing him her milkwhite teeth. He watched the dark eyeslits	 55.71529105713836
narrowing with greed till her eyes were green stones. Then he went to	 48.0700843537375
the dresser, took the jug Hanlon’s milkman had just filled for him,	 72.79921258822151
poured warmbubbled milk on a saucer and set it slowly on the floor.	 47.89874351851341
—Gurrhr! she cried, running to lap.	 42.70426433288411
He watched the bristles shining wirily in the weak light as she tipped	 57.700942264459016
three times and licked lightly. Wonder is it true if you clip them they	 72.6827677764696
can’t mouse after. Why? They shine in the dark, perhaps, the tips. Or	 50.779679707630734
kind of feelers in the dark, perhaps.	 23.224316151384613
He listened to her licking lap. Ham and eggs, no. No good eggs with	 86.71031000123979
this drouth. Want pure fresh water. Thursday: not a good day either for	 52.457786196172506
a mutton kidney at Buckley’s. Fried with butter, a shake of pepper.	 89.38703941428452
Better a pork kidney at Dlugacz’s. While the kettle is boiling. She	 51.77560247350914
lapped slower, then licking the saucer clean. Why are their tongues so	 61.32935726021416
rough? To lap better, all porous holes. Nothing she can eat? He glanced	 280.5637142160264
round him. No.	 97.28628822023087
On quietly creaky boots he went up the staircase to the hall, paused by	 79.69390051815024
the bedroom door. She might like something tasty. Thin bread and butter	 98.41995619826223
she likes in the morning. Still perhaps: once in a way.	 99.07726501854908
He said softly in the bare hall:	 50.75882979982011
—I’m going round the corner. Be back in a minute.	 82.07193508350191
And when he had heard his voice say it he added:	 96.02120553429437
—You don’t want anything for breakfast?	 32.98004855959804
A sleepy soft grunt answered:	 260.4925699484028
—Mn.	 4.608171674364364
No. She didn’t want anything. He heard then a warm heavy sigh, softer,	 97.66752013100154
as she turned over and the loose brass quoits of the bedstead jingled.	 30.387809613005935
Must get those settled really. Pity. All the way from Gibraltar.	 60.634412513059466
Forgotten any little Spanish she knew. Wonder what her father gave for	 105.54425046495658
it. Old style. Ah yes! of course. Bought it at the governor’s auction.	 75.19153666550558
Got a short knock. Hard as nails at a bargain, old Tweedy. Yes, sir. At	 154.36987365486956
Plevna that was. I rose from the ranks, sir, and I’m proud of it. Still	 69.16020762929041
he had brains enough to make that corner in stamps. Now that was	 64.40982548040203
farseeing.	 4.608171674364364
His hand took his hat from the peg over his initialled heavy overcoat	 33.20063203849251
and his lost property office secondhand waterproof. Stamps: stickyback	 38.47116831213633
pictures. Daresay lots of officers are in the swim too. Course they do.	 105.12361332951386
The sweated legend in the crown of his hat told him mutely: Plasto’s	 23.951615355300632
high grade ha. He peeped quickly inside the leather headband. White	 42.00577651555241
slip of paper. Quite safe.	 227.39059203496615
On the doorstep he felt in his hip pocket for the latchkey. Not there.	 36.61576789695472
In the trousers I left off. Must get it. Potato I have. Creaky	 81.65790444180001
wardrobe. No use disturbing her. She turned over sleepily that time. He	 42.94904167076276
pulled the halldoor to after him very quietly, more, till the footleaf	 106.85125390989775
dropped gently over the threshold, a limp lid. Looked shut. All right	 122.32614713329285
till I come back anyhow.	 230.48954457456537
He crossed to the bright side, avoiding the loose cellarflap of number	 49.038465277244796
seventyfive. The sun was nearing the steeple of George’s church. Be a	 21.804543877232792
warm day I fancy. Specially in these black clothes feel it more. Black	 251.90098955893666
conducts, reflects, (refracts is it?), the heat. But I couldn’t go in	 41.76044465145596
that light suit. Make a picnic of it. His eyelids sank quietly often as	 166.79761951500595
he walked in happy warmth. Boland’s breadvan delivering with trays our	 26.52771493450391
daily but she prefers yesterday’s loaves turnovers crisp crowns hot.	 83.69770778080748
Makes you feel young. Somewhere in the east: early morning: set off at	 131.74591017576836
dawn. Travel round in front of the sun, steal a day’s march on him.	 38.872084297946856
Keep it up for ever never grow a day older technically. Walk along a	 43.3264943157929
strand, strange land, come to a city gate, sentry there, old ranker	 206.97149343657935
too, old Tweedy’s big moustaches, leaning on a long kind of a spear.	 66.557171914326
Wander through awned streets. Turbaned faces going by. Dark caves of	 164.6807426063208
carpet shops, big man, Turko the terrible, seated crosslegged, smoking	 217.00515576190793
a coiled pipe. Cries of sellers in the streets. Drink water scented	 52.32201445977629
with fennel, sherbet. Dander along all day. Might meet a robber or two.	 50.55995301153098
Well, meet him. Getting on to sundown. The shadows of the mosques among	 33.488828684787244
the pillars: priest with a scroll rolled up. A shiver of the trees,	 29.204668245271964
signal, the evening wind. I pass on. Fading gold sky. A mother watches	 159.7422719287941
me from her doorway. She calls her children home in their dark	 92.22091755113838
language. High wall: beyond strings twanged. Night sky, moon, violet,	 200.2089127634229
colour of Molly’s new garters. Strings. Listen. A girl playing one of	 129.59431227114666
those instruments what do you call them: dulcimers. I pass.	 35.870688487453045
Probably not a bit like it really. Kind of stuff you read: in the track	 49.26233861545196
of the sun. Sunburst on the titlepage. He smiled, pleasing himself.	 28.516193140613755
What Arthur Griffith said about the headpiece over the _Freeman_	 29.745397789234946
leader: a homerule sun rising up in the northwest from the laneway	 11.065136389647185
behind the bank of Ireland. He prolonged his pleased smile. Ikey touch	 80.94909055991711
that: homerule sun rising up in the northwest.	 17.54471122884455
He approached Larry O’Rourke’s. From the cellar grating floated up the	 36.32590471114618
flabby gush of porter. Through the open doorway the bar squirted out	 40.24818616073959
whiffs of ginger, teadust, biscuitmush. Good house, however: just the	 86.57828040068952
end of the city traffic. For instance M’Auley’s down there: n. g. as	 67.2165098775083
position. Of course if they ran a tramline along the North Circular	 60.874900407371705
from the cattlemarket to the quays value would go up like a shot.	 62.05765743236176
Baldhead over the blind. Cute old codger. No use canvassing him for an	 40.04824239743791
ad. Still he knows his own business best. There he is, sure enough, my	 83.42967909975835
bold Larry, leaning against the sugarbin in his shirtsleeves watching	 23.961910515676998
the aproned curate swab up with mop and bucket. Simon Dedalus takes him	 29.040044377236857
off to a tee with his eyes screwed up. Do you know what I’m going to	 25.90624941907434
tell you? What’s that, Mr O’Rourke? Do you know what? The Russians,	 28.574309773365094
they’d only be an eight o’clock breakfast for the Japanese.	 106.15325197693849
Stop and say a word: about the funeral perhaps. Sad thing about poor	 94.75800663195807
Dignam, Mr O’Rourke.	 221.0557453227336
Turning into Dorset street he said freshly in greeting through the	 49.425108721223815
doorway:	 4130.1771016838475
—Good day, Mr O’Rourke.	 43.8676484190945
—Good day to you.	 56.339458379410075
—Lovely weather, sir.	 259.1605153541779
—’Tis all that.	 218.09084554885513
Where do they get the money? Coming up redheaded curates from the	 43.87390815296078
county Leitrim, rinsing empties and old man in the cellar. Then, lo and	 37.97623362835821
behold, they blossom out as Adam Findlaters or Dan Tallons. Then think	 97.51491634830685
of the competition. General thirst. Good puzzle would be cross Dublin	 138.39327065765406
without passing a pub. Save it they can’t. Off the drunks perhaps. Put	 261.67236683014744
down three and carry five. What is that, a bob here and there, dribs	 111.8398273768965
and drabs. On the wholesale orders perhaps. Doing a double shuffle with	 59.98485340954746
the town travellers. Square it you with the boss and we’ll split the	 109.34509213227989
job, see?	 1883.8895841321878
How much would that tot to off the porter in the month? Say ten barrels	 130.75636380038722
of stuff. Say he got ten per cent off. O more. Fifteen. He passed Saint	 222.75440938016413
Joseph’s National school. Brats’ clamour. Windows open. Fresh air helps	 72.73212436452081
memory. Or a lilt. Ahbeesee defeegee kelomen opeecue rustyouvee	 17.177713411173304
doubleyou. Boys are they? Yes. Inishturk. Inishark. Inishboffin. At	 75.58553205764612
their joggerfry. Mine. Slieve Bloom.	 128.66087614621475
He halted before Dlugacz’s window, staring at the hanks of sausages,	 39.15041909407466
polonies, black and white. Fifteen multiplied by. The figures whitened	 40.28161264854903
in his mind, unsolved: displeased, he let them fade. The shiny links,	 42.021704299933596
packed with forcemeat, fed his gaze and he breathed in tranquilly the	 33.1384462101849
lukewarm breath of cooked spicy pigs’ blood.	 26.442129532547355
A kidney oozed bloodgouts on the willowpatterned dish: the last. He	 50.235250285076866
stood by the nextdoor girl at the counter. Would she buy it too,	 59.12824700089744
calling the items from a slip in her hand? Chapped: washingsoda. And a	 42.37097523105541
pound and a half of Denny’s sausages. His eyes rested on her vigorous	 56.454829415068765
hips. Woods his name is. Wonder what he does. Wife is oldish. New	 106.42217296176575
blood. No followers allowed. Strong pair of arms. Whacking a carpet on	 192.4226037341557
the clothesline. She does whack it, by George. The way her crooked	 74.8833353478094
skirt swings at each whack.	 125.72569901614219
The ferreteyed porkbutcher folded the sausages he had snipped off with	 44.57390478325307
blotchy fingers, sausagepink. Sound meat there: like a stallfed heifer.	 64.32924714834957
He took a page up from the pile of cut sheets: the model farm at	 58.248531277616145
Kinnereth on the lakeshore of Tiberias. Can become ideal winter	 18.455915994530972
sanatorium. Moses Montefiore. I thought he was. Farmhouse, wall round	 68.21045729389279
it, blurred cattle cropping. He held the page from him: interesting:	 88.672500974049
read it nearer, the title, the blurred cropping cattle, the page	 72.72161711415126
rustling. A young white heifer. Those mornings in the cattlemarket, the	 73.46584529329732
beasts lowing in their pens, branded sheep, flop and fall of dung, the	 79.22255904352434
breeders in hobnailed boots trudging through the litter, slapping a	 19.226798258958205
palm on a ripemeated hindquarter, there’s a prime one, unpeeled	 69.26505719344078
switches in their hands. He held the page aslant patiently, bending his	 47.96385855548511
senses and his will, his soft subject gaze at rest. The crooked skirt	 171.0192430009452
swinging, whack by whack by whack.	 31.630189260789738
The porkbutcher snapped two sheets from the pile, wrapped up her prime	 44.80710598559021
sausages and made a red grimace.	 102.52248839558062
—Now, my miss, he said.	 125.5136018127688
She tendered a coin, smiling boldly, holding her thick wrist out.	 73.73403799931619
—Thank you, my miss. And one shilling threepence change. For you,	 84.37306566694353
please?	 4188.489862735096
Mr Bloom pointed quickly. To catch up and walk behind her if she went	 75.70562559796399
slowly, behind her moving hams. Pleasant to see first thing in the	 135.6582853106883
morning. Hurry up, damn it. Make hay while the sun shines. She stood	 89.47269953753603
outside the shop in sunlight and sauntered lazily to the right. He	 73.95967258365923
sighed down his nose: they never understand. Sodachapped hands. Crusted	 112.49793591201394
toenails too. Brown scapulars in tatters, defending her both ways. The	 48.83074178381696
sting of disregard glowed to weak pleasure within his breast. For	 32.243451126477204
another: a constable off duty cuddling her in Eccles’ Lane. They like	 100.89959706890821
them sizeable. Prime sausage. O please, Mr Policeman, I’m lost in the	 83.08086963805371
wood.	 18561.75093746402
—Threepence, please.	 1175.4715148016683
His hand accepted the moist tender gland and slid it into a sidepocket.	 49.81080731287446
Then it fetched up three coins from his trousers’ pocket and laid them	 85.3012022107271
on the rubber prickles. They lay, were read quickly and quickly slid,	 76.03920970080524
disc by disc, into the till.	 378.8010542708768
—Thank you, sir. Another time.	 63.43137107555116
A speck of eager fire from foxeyes thanked him. He withdrew his gaze	 60.112590225844265
after an instant. No: better not: another time.	 133.59184252796825
—Good morning, he said, moving away.	 60.81807302192487
—Good morning, sir.	 32.292620761292696
No sign. Gone. What matter?	 263.16476603132696
He walked back along Dorset street, reading gravely. Agendath Netaim:	 40.167041777553926
planters’ company. To purchase waste sandy tracts from Turkish	 102.76631262888394
government and plant with eucalyptus trees. Excellent for shade, fuel	 94.48386148138518
and construction. Orangegroves and immense melonfields north of Jaffa.	 38.399834176651304
You pay eighty marks and they plant a dunam of land for you with	 42.57226823978546
olives, oranges, almonds or citrons. Olives cheaper: oranges need	 88.83842643794289
artificial irrigation. Every year you get a sending of the crop. Your	 52.16972384702517
name entered for life as owner in the book of the union. Can pay ten	 69.3774859255732
down and the balance in yearly instalments. Bleibtreustrasse 34,	 24.629225872177617
Berlin, W. 15.	 55.45087921631254
Nothing doing. Still an idea behind it.	 184.74191048473213
He looked at the cattle, blurred in silver heat. Silverpowdered	 33.72546067552004
olivetrees. Quiet long days: pruning, ripening. Olives are packed in	 73.0651916308177
jars, eh? I have a few left from Andrews. Molly spitting them out.	 59.73702914032825
Knows the taste of them now. Oranges in tissue paper packed in crates.	 48.93549576007033
Citrons too. Wonder is poor Citron still in Saint Kevin’s parade. And	 94.27135330848859
Mastiansky with the old cither. Pleasant evenings we had then. Molly in	 155.12294248636272
Citron’s basketchair. Nice to hold, cool waxen fruit, hold in the hand,	 125.15314585378778
lift it to the nostrils and smell the perfume. Like that, heavy, sweet,	 191.3462813617322
wild perfume. Always the same, year after year. They fetched high	 179.49577151418663
prices too, Moisel told me. Arbutus place: Pleasants street: pleasant	 92.3971125138951
old times. Must be without a flaw, he said. Coming all that way: Spain,	 51.12035120561216
Gibraltar, Mediterranean, the Levant. Crates lined up on the quayside	 17.71710888255014
at Jaffa, chap ticking them off in a book, navvies handling them	 60.55641949540236
barefoot in soiled dungarees. There’s whatdoyoucallhim out of. How do	 135.31143713624274
you? Doesn’t see. Chap you know just to salute bit of a bore. His back	 127.39657004864986
is like that Norwegian captain’s. Wonder if I’ll meet him today.	 67.11499642268075
Watering cart. To provoke the rain. On earth as it is in heaven.	 77.96343791324459
A cloud began to cover the sun slowly, wholly. Grey. Far.	 35.3837680221665
No, not like that. A barren land, bare waste. Vulcanic lake, the dead	 67.74180625126971
sea: no fish, weedless, sunk deep in the earth. No wind could lift	 160.2832663160098
those waves, grey metal, poisonous foggy waters. Brimstone they called	 90.50057803386272
it raining down: the cities of the plain: Sodom, Gomorrah, Edom. All	 32.888108591922546
dead names. A dead sea in a dead land, grey and old. Old now. It bore	 204.2230004403067
the oldest, the first race. A bent hag crossed from Cassidy’s,	 37.125257237084746
clutching a naggin bottle by the neck. The oldest people. Wandered far	 80.73577354635381
away over all the earth, captivity to captivity, multiplying, dying,	 92.86249778914727
being born everywhere. It lay there now. Now it could bear no more.	 142.56885835623277
Dead: an old woman’s: the grey sunken cunt of the world.	 52.749719364423555
Desolation.	 4.608171674364364
Grey horror seared his flesh. Folding the page into his pocket he	 62.03608800440143
turned into Eccles street, hurrying homeward. Cold oils slid along his	 58.624266234338975
veins, chilling his blood: age crusting him with a salt cloak. Well, I	 88.15716470917226
am here now. Yes, I am here now. Morning mouth bad images. Got up wrong	 117.03265414529811
side of the bed. Must begin again those Sandow’s exercises. On the	 42.96023852281866
hands down. Blotchy brown brick houses. Number eighty still unlet. Why	 208.04164016236027
is that? Valuation is only twentyeight. Towers, Battersby, North,	 71.00911612401374
MacArthur: parlour windows plastered with bills. Plasters on a sore	 99.17386880577426
eye. To smell the gentle smoke of tea, fume of the pan, sizzling	 71.34263809667475
butter. Be near her ample bedwarmed flesh. Yes, yes.	 184.00496768237366
Quick warm sunlight came running from Berkeley road, swiftly, in slim	 184.4027529916177
sandals, along the brightening footpath. Runs, she runs to meet me, a	 41.81730819911578
girl with gold hair on the wind.	 93.74393144696919
Two letters and a card lay on the hallfloor. He stooped and gathered	 48.04531842029496
them. Mrs Marion Bloom. His quickened heart slowed at once. Bold hand.	 70.37804617858221
Mrs Marion.	 194.7146081259593
—Poldy!	 4346.298988560709

yellow twilight towards her tousled head.	 126.2975561054141
—Who are the letters for?	 72.19762888875981
He looked at them. Mullingar. Milly.	 60.98813956400936
—A letter for me from Milly, he said carefully, and a card to you. And	 69.31467236776376
a letter for you.	 77.02688562808066
He laid her card and letter on the twill bedspread near the curve of	 36.08479657446014
her knees.	 214.52296312381392
—Do you want the blind up?	 89.42230373236373
Letting the blind up by gentle tugs halfway his backward eye saw her	 124.8569175899582
glance at the letter and tuck it under her pillow.	 67.32242177023738
—That do? he asked, turning.	 62.506095085913046
She was reading the card, propped on her elbow.	 38.54832785992574
—She got the things, she said.	 78.73349507795301
He waited till she had laid the card aside and curled herself back	 57.39761584937793
slowly with a snug sigh.	 131.86119054096847
—Hurry up with that tea, she said. I’m parched.	 77.10516507387706
—The kettle is boiling, he said.	 20.303048127514522
But he delayed to clear the chair: her striped petticoat, tossed soiled	 102.47307971208355
linen: and lifted all in an armful on to the foot of the bed.	 40.87552555086812
As he went down the kitchen stairs she called:	 34.75697203942211
—Poldy!	 4346.298988560709
—What?	 178.1757147016287
—Scald the teapot.	 56.230868600629954
On the boil sure enough: a plume of steam from the spout. He scalded	 28.077920137700243
and rinsed out the teapot and put in four full spoons of tea, tilting	 57.24868921752369
the kettle then to let the water flow in. Having set it to draw he took	 109.68270978262606
off the kettle, crushed the pan flat on the live coals and watched the	 84.03158642098556
lump of butter slide and melt. While he unwrapped the kidney the cat	 81.23187948247148
mewed hungrily against him. Give her too much meat she won’t mouse. Say	 107.27409899553776
they won’t eat pork. Kosher. Here. He let the bloodsmeared paper fall	 91.11525521673657
to her and dropped the kidney amid the sizzling butter sauce. Pepper.	 58.95281961343421
He sprinkled it through his fingers ringwise from the chipped eggcup.	 22.083316422771652
Then he slit open his letter, glancing down the page and over. Thanks:	 73.8839323217125
new tam: Mr Coghlan: lough Owel picnic: young student: Blazes Boylan’s	 71.88172443163073
seaside girls.	 68.70866081974728
The tea was drawn. He filled his own moustachecup, sham crown Derby,	 82.39780378512884
smiling. Silly Milly’s birthday gift. Only five she was then. No, wait:	 125.49556591442084
four. I gave her the amberoid necklace she broke. Putting pieces of	 65.75370961826899
folded brown paper in the letterbox for her. He smiled, pouring.	 74.446154715766
O, Milly Bloom, you are my darling.	 143.86312239336428
You are my lookingglass from night to morning.	 159.01296146942343
I’d rather have you without a farthing	 80.33011777487218
Than Katey Keogh with her ass and garden.	 78.14076721784052
Poor old professor Goodwin. Dreadful old case. Still he was a courteous	 83.20277977435305
old chap. Oldfashioned way he used to bow Molly off the platform. And	 54.53259034827012
the little mirror in his silk hat. The night Milly brought it into the	 50.08649972262748
parlour. O, look what I found in professor Goodwin’s hat! All we	 241.49188560675802
laughed. Sex breaking out even then. Pert little piece she was.	 154.7123087887093
He prodded a fork into the kidney and slapped it over: then fitted the	 55.623276160761044
teapot on the tray. Its hump bumped as he took it up. Everything on it?	 101.18005839582338
Bread and butter, four, sugar, spoon, her cream. Yes. He carried it	 136.23970905660647
upstairs, his thumb hooked in the teapot handle.	 82.34984283164793
Nudging the door open with his knee he carried the tray in and set it	 52.63634950753058
on the chair by the bedhead.	 26.806176542011222
—What a time you were! she said.	 83.95400645307902
She set the brasses jingling as she raised herself briskly, an elbow on	 94.4371626113223
the pillow. He looked calmly down on her bulk and between her large	 64.81587750622812

A strip of torn envelope peeped from under the dimpled pillow. In the	 22.390476989486462
act of going he stayed to straighten the bedspread.	 41.71106794924424
—Who was the letter from? he asked.	 90.48457179581261
Bold hand. Marion.	 181.33304249537795
—O, Boylan, she said. He’s bringing the programme.	 83.03207323596185
—What are you singing?	 75.07073245859064
—_Là ci darem_ with J. C. Doyle, she said, and _Love’s Old Sweet Song_.	 42.24749201301029
Her full lips, drinking, smiled. Rather stale smell that incense leaves	 188.08957172009895
next day. Like foul flowerwater.	 97.47789155086949
—Would you like the window open a little?	 86.54047433846132
She doubled a slice of bread into her mouth, asking:	 55.333240598901384
—What time is the funeral?	 59.1793465900594
—Eleven, I think, he answered. I didn’t see the paper.	 83.71313614174575
Following the pointing of her finger he took up a leg of her soiled	 88.6760195400451
drawers from the bed. No? Then, a twisted grey garter looped round a	 71.2616093589965
stocking: rumpled, shiny sole.	 73.9411417099865
—No: that book.	 225.57909083149858
Other stocking. Her petticoat.	 175.42469195150312
—It must have fell down, she said.	 58.42655370908134
He felt here and there. _Voglio e non vorrei_. Wonder if she pronounces	 26.2985560272395
that right: _voglio_. Not in the bed. Must have slid down. He stooped	 91.88990852924482
and lifted the valance. The book, fallen, sprawled against the bulge of	 35.5029110802824
the orangekeyed chamberpot.	 6.922777768218444
—Show here, she said. I put a mark in it. There’s a word I wanted to	 73.64690043967073
ask you.	 214.2205485657066
She swallowed a draught of tea from her cup held by nothandle and,	 58.6382669119493

text with the hairpin till she reached the word.	 40.64790709790328
—Met him what? he asked.	 69.65811272392912
—Here, she said. What does that mean?	 55.78949445505096
He leaned downward and read near her polished thumbnail.	 99.40848578683689
—Metempsychosis?	 6253.152008985971
—Yes. Who’s he when he’s at home?	 123.5974966974625
—Metempsychosis, he said, frowning. It’s Greek: from the Greek. That	 65.565944513417
means the transmigration of souls.	 100.95379786456063
—O, rocks! she said. Tell us in plain words.	 72.10995650087096
He smiled, glancing askance at her mocking eyes. The same young eyes.	 66.02889238161663
The first night after the charades. Dolphin’s Barn. He turned over the	 27.566292682620812
smudged pages. _Ruby: the Pride of the Ring_. Hello. Illustration.	 59.19745003189941
Fierce Italian with carriagewhip. Must be Ruby pride of the on the	 56.04562531239616
floor naked. Sheet kindly lent. _The monster Maffei desisted and flung	 68.85412103295941
his victim from him with an oath_. Cruelty behind it all. Doped	 40.41039247217356
animals. Trapeze at Hengler’s. Had to look the other way. Mob gaping.	 82.2181851668386
Break your neck and we’ll break our sides. Families of them. Bone them	 97.03980601600884
young so they metamspychosis. That we live after death. Our souls. That	 104.07856262097616
a man’s soul after he dies. Dignam’s soul...	 130.85909602224507
—Did you finish it? he asked.	 44.95734008053962
—Yes, she said. There’s nothing smutty in it. Is she in love with the	 51.33555900868712
first fellow all the time?	 100.15853431299995
—Never read it. Do you want another?	 75.63974998619054
—Yes. Get another of Paul de Kock’s. Nice name he has.	 62.01278351783527
She poured more tea into her cup, watching it flow sideways.	 86.34559070107464
Must get that Capel street library book renewed or they’ll write to	 63.08048264885203
Kearney, my guarantor. Reincarnation: that’s the word.	 34.193391012316376
—Some people believe, he said, that we go on living in another body	 66.06697220122204
after death, that we lived before. They call it reincarnation. That we	 53.02524821269926
all lived before on the earth thousands of years ago or some other	 77.89175754903331
planet. They say we have forgotten it. Some say they remember their	 63.8162802310147
past lives.	 1055.9822367457373
The sluggish cream wound curdling spirals through her tea. Better	 86.57213425538404
remind her of the word: metempsychosis. An example would be better. An	 123.57407186428128
example?	 6109.352620258348
The _Bath of the Nymph_ over the bed. Given away with the Easter number	 62.78776951278353
of _Photo Bits_: Splendid masterpiece in art colours. Tea before you	 187.46446989932411
put milk in. Not unlike her with her hair down: slimmer. Three and six	 108.91225680122504
I gave for the frame. She said it would look nice over the bed. Naked	 54.3765737610385
nymphs: Greece: and for instance all the people that lived then.	 40.08810103960048
He turned the pages back.	 98.13208312690992
—Metempsychosis, he said, is what the ancient Greeks called it. They	 68.61487727398566
used to believe you could be changed into an animal or a tree, for	 67.39714320775937
instance. What they called nymphs, for example.	 151.01725628835857
Her spoon ceased to stir up the sugar. She gazed straight before her,	 43.08325928902113
inhaling through her arched nostrils.	 68.73257161329596
—There’s a smell of burn, she said. Did you leave anything on the fire?	 36.65519113943021
—The kidney! he cried suddenly.	 151.84274786300784
He fitted the book roughly into his inner pocket and, stubbing his toes	 30.242282278199454
against the broken commode, hurried out towards the smell, stepping	 174.69909240785336
hastily down the stairs with a flurried stork’s legs. Pungent smoke	 32.77554242908545
shot up in an angry jet from a side of the pan. By prodding a prong of	 40.272087874164484
the fork under the kidney he detached it and turned it turtle on its	 76.44573330960084
back. Only a little burnt. He tossed it off the pan on to a plate and	 89.72374405265691
let the scanty brown gravy trickle over it.	 90.46455873070627
Cup of tea now. He sat down, cut and buttered a slice of the loaf. He	 94.76684677632792
shore away the burnt flesh and flung it to the cat. Then he put a	 68.11951108052014
forkful into his mouth, chewing with discernment the toothsome pliant	 21.133941912417022
meat. Done to a turn. A mouthful of tea. Then he cut away dies of	 94.97494346674013
bread, sopped one in the gravy and put it in his mouth. What was that	 47.15674584232476
about some young student and a picnic? He creased out the letter at his	 48.55060957898202
side, reading it slowly as he chewed, sopping another die of bread in	 80.98296278464792
the gravy and raising it to his mouth.	 82.44008492099812
Dearest Papli	 126.80637487642312
Thanks ever so much for the lovely birthday present. It suits me	 115.01390037671004
splendid. Everyone says I am quite the belle in my new tam. I got	 93.60976793909967
mummy’s lovely box of creams and am writing. They are lovely. I am	 73.14154002177543
getting on swimming in the photo business now. Mr Coghlan took one of	 101.34760795284878
me and Mrs. Will send when developed. We did great biz yesterday. Fair	 214.2838506262518
day and all the beef to the heels were in. We are going to lough Owel	 42.46849751258388
on Monday with a few friends to make a scrap picnic. Give my love to	 87.60835289452055
mummy and to yourself a big kiss and thanks. I hear them at the piano	 82.06917555929591
downstairs. There is to be a concert in the Greville Arms on Saturday.	 73.93666627730862
There is a young student comes here some evenings named Bannon his	 93.62848296247967
cousins or something are big swells and he sings Boylan’s (I was on the	 61.74745588234561
pop of writing Blazes Boylan’s) song about those seaside girls. Tell	 154.97151800007381
him silly Milly sends my best respects. I must now close with fondest	 66.54035006809735
love	 1289.2335931206333
Your fond daughter	 110.81826948457139
Milly	 4414.8148963618805
P. S. Excuse bad writing am in hurry. Byby.	 62.10279774790866
M.	 3366.7019246785835
Fifteen yesterday. Curious, fifteenth of the month too. Her first	 107.15552778940524
birthday away from home. Separation. Remember the summer morning she	 239.53527165544352
was born, running to knock up Mrs Thornton in Denzille street. Jolly	 73.25466734998103
old woman. Lot of babies she must have helped into the world. She knew	 53.014523291237275
from the first poor little Rudy wouldn’t live. Well, God is good, sir.	 45.30437016711258
She knew at once. He would be eleven now if he had lived.	 46.70831933979028
His vacant face stared pityingly at the postscript. Excuse bad writing.	 39.8177805676436
Hurry. Piano downstairs. Coming out of her shell. Row with her in the	 49.758847611987854
XL Café about the bracelet. Wouldn’t eat her cakes or speak or look.	 54.40039470471061
Saucebox. He sopped other dies of bread in the gravy and ate piece	 55.53088528542952
after piece of kidney. Twelve and six a week. Not much. Still, she	 184.24076868356403
might do worse. Music hall stage. Young student. He drank a draught of	 75.16128599103843
cooler tea to wash down his meal. Then he read the letter again: twice.	 89.79112942437635
O, well: she knows how to mind herself. But if not? No, nothing has	 118.03775222237354
happened. Of course it might. Wait in any case till it does. A wild	 168.45793336384108
piece of goods. Her slim legs running up the staircase. Destiny.	 116.89668972906519
Ripening now. Vain: very.	 131.18635581837543
He smiled with troubled affection at the kitchen window. Day I caught	 67.62766999509712
her in the street pinching her cheeks to make them red. Anemic a	 47.4778867767357
little. Was given milk too long. On the _Erin’s King_ that day round	 126.87881093583967
the Kish. Damned old tub pitching about. Not a bit funky. Her pale blue	 69.71975235751322
scarf loose in the wind with her hair.	 79.16534632213536
All dimpled cheeks and curls,	 155.1734093835683
Your head it simply swirls.	 48.534959482457765

jarvey off for the day, singing. Friend of the family. Swurls, he says.	 85.10932456654115
Pier with lamps, summer evening, band.	 231.42560055978302
Those girls, those girls,	 43.10405480222386
Those lovely seaside girls.	 13.58521916230276
Milly too. Young kisses: the first. Far away now past. Mrs Marion.	 121.49783894974118

A soft qualm, regret, flowed down his backbone, increasing. Will	 58.54162062367006

Will happen too. He felt the flowing qualm spread over him. Useless to	 195.57641148805195

and six return. Six weeks off, however. Might work a press pass. Or	 184.30333704614463
through M’Coy.	 249.99806228824906
The cat, having cleaned all her fur, returned to the meatstained paper,	 52.21698820905036
nosed at it and stalked to the door. She looked back at him, mewing.	 41.396262139360864
Wants to go out. Wait before a door sometime it will open. Let her	 158.80156025122926
wait. Has the fidgets. Electric. Thunder in the air. Was washing at her	 74.29096035797538
ear with her back to the fire too.	 180.62996301606745
He felt heavy, full: then a gentle loosening of his bowels. He stood	 71.62076368482239
up, undoing the waistband of his trousers. The cat mewed to him.	 39.54023060849858
—Miaow! he said in answer. Wait till I’m ready.	 41.51278016212239
Heaviness: hot day coming. Too much trouble to fag up the stairs to the	 72.56865699580638
landing.	 18323.67903879946
A paper. He liked to read at stool. Hope no ape comes knocking just as	 87.34396516524102
I’m.	 731.9029102521719
In the tabledrawer he found an old number of _Titbits_. He folded it	 43.518069907211576
under his armpit, went to the door and opened it. The cat went up in	 53.99028776417625
soft bounds. Ah, wanted to go upstairs, curl up in a ball on the bed.	 47.736655456992395
Listening, he heard her voice:	 135.02870703834884
—Come, come, pussy. Come.	 179.85780061915625
He went out through the backdoor into the garden: stood to listen	 35.66971263490248
towards the next garden. No sound. Perhaps hanging clothes out to dry.	 126.07056026800277
The maid was in the garden. Fine morning.	 97.92195047131553
He bent down to regard a lean file of spearmint growing by the wall.	 43.07117876400971
Make a summerhouse here. Scarlet runners. Virginia creepers. Want to	 35.831161732374156
manure the whole place over, scabby soil. A coat of liver of sulphur.	 57.24751052788142
All soil like that without dung. Household slops. Loam, what is this	 99.57061596514232
that is? The hens in the next garden: their droppings are very good top	 39.30407018873162
dressing. Best of all though are the cattle, especially when they are	 111.33495373153988
fed on those oilcakes. Mulch of dung. Best thing to clean ladies’ kid	 119.11572974210834
gloves. Dirty cleans. Ashes too. Reclaim the whole place. Grow peas in	 91.41592735248702
that corner there. Lettuce. Always have fresh greens then. Still	 179.57597398521665
gardens have their drawbacks. That bee or bluebottle here Whitmonday.	 83.54955586583111
He walked on. Where is my hat, by the way? Must have put it back on the	 35.736496885032224
peg. Or hanging up on the floor. Funny I don’t remember that. Hallstand	 26.05308948791762
too full. Four umbrellas, her raincloak. Picking up the letters.	 98.88332842563415
Drago’s shopbell ringing. Queer I was just thinking that moment. Brown	 89.15067619214147
brillantined hair over his collar. Just had a wash and brushup. Wonder	 131.23645967078608
have I time for a bath this morning. Tara street. Chap in the paybox	 60.75229618359663
there got away James Stephens, they say. O’Brien.	 45.94209247561106
Deep voice that fellow Dlugacz has. Agendath what is it? Now, my miss.	 96.04001811830558
Enthusiast.	 4.608171674364364
He kicked open the crazy door of the jakes. Better be careful not to	 58.57660867246227
get these trousers dirty for the funeral. He went in, bowing his head	 119.49848828017755
under the low lintel. Leaving the door ajar, amid the stench of mouldy	 29.050524542786444
limewash and stale cobwebs he undid his braces. Before sitting down he	 49.27520150181936

countinghouse. Nobody.	 224.56465560343185
Asquat on the cuckstool he folded out his paper, turning its pages over	 35.69646493081452
on his bared knees. Something new and easy. No great hurry. Keep it a	 150.45748921250123
bit. Our prize titbit: _Matcham’s Masterstroke_. Written by Mr Philip	 96.85031563266126
Beaufoy, Playgoers’ Club, London. Payment at the rate of one guinea a	 78.59267781447657
column has been made to the writer. Three and a half. Three pounds	 101.61809381087997
three. Three pounds, thirteen and six.	 35.70303165903969
Quietly he read, restraining himself, the first column and, yielding	 75.911404539223
but resisting, began the second. Midway, his last resistance yielding,	 69.7318673011832
he allowed his bowels to ease themselves quietly as he read, reading	 40.7228731190196
still patiently that slight constipation of yesterday quite gone. Hope	 147.73895742801534
it’s not too big bring on piles again. No, just right. So. Ah! Costive.	 123.3923289172171
One tabloid of cascara sagrada. Life might be so. It did not move or	 48.08399081130327
touch him but it was something quick and neat. Print anything now.	 181.77163754251063
Silly season. He read on, seated calm above his own rising smell. Neat	 107.37365613230446
certainly. _Matcham often thinks of the masterstroke by which he won	 35.92488316800968
the laughing witch who now_. Begins and ends morally. _Hand in hand_.	 110.77252410800813
Smart. He glanced back through what he had read and, while feeling his	 140.2347015007566
water flow quietly, he envied kindly Mr Beaufoy who had written it and	 167.25233861329062
received payment of three pounds, thirteen and six.	 52.86569502840707
Might manage a sketch. By Mr and Mrs L. M. Bloom. Invent a story for	 115.6082528372714
some proverb. Which? Time I used to try jotting down on my cuff what	 83.81437307139478
she said dressing. Dislike dressing together. Nicked myself shaving.	 53.29227890128997
Biting her nether lip, hooking the placket of her skirt. Timing her.	 22.901751250033758
9.15. Did Roberts pay you yet? 9.20. What had Gretta Conroy on? 9.23.	 221.41198940152583
What possessed me to buy this comb? 9.24. I’m swelled after that	 96.03024797236674
cabbage. A speck of dust on the patent leather of her boot.	 127.8896342460165
Rubbing smartly in turn each welt against her stockinged calf. Morning	 132.3600989973097
after the bazaar dance when May’s band played Ponchielli’s dance of the	 85.05219988933172
hours. Explain that: morning hours, noon, then evening coming on, then	 194.63937670861787
night hours. Washing her teeth. That was the first night. Her head	 119.88222452552183
dancing. Her fansticks clicking. Is that Boylan well off? He has money.	 125.29770355963205
Why? I noticed he had a good rich smell off his breath dancing. No use	 83.55118392015854
humming then. Allude to it. Strange kind of music that last night. The	 84.78845001073938
mirror was in shadow. She rubbed her handglass briskly on her woollen	 76.20380311397841
vest against her full wagging bub. Peering into it. Lines in her eyes.	 82.92518767202903
It wouldn’t pan out somehow.	 148.6102453058541
Evening hours, girls in grey gauze. Night hours then: black with	 218.1916531903684
daggers and eyemasks. Poetical idea: pink, then golden, then grey, then	 181.87997844280636
black. Still, true to life also. Day: then the night.	 184.0964923685554

By lorries along sir John Rogerson’s quay Mr Bloom walked soberly, past	 75.6977561921446
Windmill lane, Leask’s the linseed crusher, the postal telegraph	 26.51654866676637
office. Could have given that address too. And past the sailors’ home.	 141.78513075927162
He turned from the morning noises of the quayside and walked through	 23.370014500066357
Lime street. By Brady’s cottages a boy for the skins lolled, his bucket	 32.53494974669648
of offal linked, smoking a chewed fagbutt. A smaller girl with scars of	 57.585191333935484
eczema on her forehead eyed him, listlessly holding her battered	 39.9527582215607
caskhoop. Tell him if he smokes he won’t grow. O let him! His life	 82.27249963503259
isn’t such a bed of roses. Waiting outside pubs to bring da home. Come	 216.20795834140318
home to ma, da. Slack hour: won’t be many there. He crossed Townsend	 214.56855745891082
street, passed the frowning face of Bethel. El, yes: house of: Aleph,	 62.811763335185546
Beth. And past Nichols’ the undertaker. At eleven it is. Time enough.	 47.75718171327079
Daresay Corny Kelleher bagged the job for O’Neill’s. Singing with his	 66.51716194588828
eyes shut. Corny. Met her once in the park. In the dark. What a lark.	 63.735816288211815
Police tout. Her name and address she then told with my tooraloom	 143.41842707475647
tooraloom tay. O, surely he bagged it. Bury him cheap in a	 141.2996108584218
whatyoumaycall. With my tooraloom, tooraloom, tooraloom, tooraloom.	 5.9746555338729515
In Westland row he halted before the window of the Belfast and Oriental	 25.630942258308284

finest quality, family tea. Rather warm. Tea. Must get some from Tom	 319.083145792599
Kernan. Couldn’t ask him at a funeral, though. While his eyes still	 186.55367864466675
read blandly he took off his hat quietly inhaling his hairoil and sent	 40.624797054627344
his right hand with slow grace over his brow and hair. Very warm	 70.08906585811187
morning. Under their dropped lids his eyes found the tiny bow of the	 66.51323938993991
leather headband inside his high grade ha. Just there. His right hand	 52.43531913529636
came down into the bowl of his hat. His fingers found quickly a card	 82.34434678472267
behind the headband and transferred it to his waistcoat pocket.	 76.05037148924481
So warm. His right hand once more more slowly went over his brow and	 46.14357177566166
hair. Then he put on his hat again, relieved: and read again: choice	 53.1050992937407
blend, made of the finest Ceylon brands. The far east. Lovely spot it	 70.25058993274567
must be: the garden of the world, big lazy leaves to float about on,	 124.10805937276724
cactuses, flowery meads, snaky lianas they call them. Wonder is it like	 18.301830655057675
that. Those Cinghalese lobbing about in the sun in _dolce far niente_,	 48.04246539159433
not doing a hand’s turn all day. Sleep six months out of twelve. Too	 130.6066281212469
hot to quarrel. Influence of the climate. Lethargy. Flowers of	 60.508807903696656
idleness. The air feeds most. Azotes. Hothouse in Botanic gardens.	 33.0001086216548
Sensitive plants. Waterlilies. Petals too tired to. Sleeping sickness	 47.783525203331024
in the air. Walk on roseleaves. Imagine trying to eat tripe and	 61.16142773578314
cowheel. Where was the chap I saw in that picture somewhere? Ah yes, in	 38.992665140357765
the dead sea floating on his back, reading a book with a parasol open.	 44.39210191428328
Couldn’t sink if you tried: so thick with salt. Because the weight of	 105.75651690328014
the water, no, the weight of the body in the water is equal to the	 31.788972553581154
weight of the what? Or is it the volume is equal to the weight? It’s a	 57.516603297576665
law something like that. Vance in High school cracking his	 40.075862145909284
fingerjoints, teaching. The college curriculum. Cracking curriculum.	 47.75640654690188
What is weight really when you say the weight? Thirtytwo feet per	 54.19487457080605
second per second. Law of falling bodies: per second per second. They	 24.389978645349828
all fall to the ground. The earth. It’s the force of gravity of the	 45.55486595000542
earth is the weight.	 154.17537256533066
