It was at the royal university dinner. Everything was going swimmingly	 54.19057850198646

SHINDY IN WELLKNOWN RESTAURANT	 22.389659622053056

waiter’s face in the Star and Garter. Oho!	 62.186916384376744

graf von Tirconnell in Ireland. Sent his heir over to make the king an	 58.68640188297257
Austrian fieldmarshal now. Going to be trouble there one day. Wild	 60.51896811962091
geese. O yes, every time. Don’t you forget that!	 70.12752375933275

Professor MacHugh turned on him.	 42.03338638836513

LOST CAUSES NOBLE MARQUESS MENTIONED	 215.80567601498277
—We were always loyal to lost causes, the professor said. Success for	 40.10638119720301
us is the death of the intellect and of the imagination. We were never	 72.25744645716328
loyal to the successful. We serve them. I teach the blatant Latin	 76.10708780388693
language. I speak the tongue of a race the acme of whose mentality is	 60.73446391695537
the maxim: time is money. Material domination. _Dominus!_ Lord! Where	 58.55615466910541
is the spirituality? Lord Jesus? Lord Salisbury? A sofa in a westend	 26.571170662589722
club. But the Greek!	 428.98807730991496
KYRIE ELEISON!	 4.411654744205047
A smile of light brightened his darkrimmed eyes, lengthened his long	 44.01254399552614
lips.	 3162.54872884086
—The Greek! he said again. _Kyrios!_ Shining word! The vowels the	 75.61289991441922
Semite and the Saxon know not. _Kyrie!_ The radiance of the intellect.	 35.18135930867576
I ought to profess Greek, the language of the mind. _Kyrie eleison!_	 47.71027804684155
The closetmaker and the cloacamaker will never be lords of our spirit.	 26.81132386250744
We are liege subjects of the catholic chivalry of Europe that foundered	 32.04217662161095
at Trafalgar and of the empire of the spirit, not an _imperium,_ that	 80.06739029735935
went under with the Athenian fleets at Aegospotami. Yes, yes. They went	 71.02450473517396
under. Pyrrhus, misled by an oracle, made a last attempt to retrieve	 58.36635166256619
the fortunes of Greece. Loyal to a lost cause.	 50.767475911238584

THE GREAT GALLAHER	 82.67360031816119

His mouth continued to twitch unspeaking in nervous curls of disdain.	 22.6121156685722
Would anyone wish that mouth for her kiss? How do you know? Why did you	 51.58744546763881
write it then?	 371.9466708873828
RHYMES AND REASONS	 42.686719973592304
Mouth, south. Is the mouth south someway? Or the south a mouth? Must be	 74.86807340369461
some. South, pout, out, shout, drouth. Rhymes: two men dressed the	 124.85473567505548
same, looking the same, two by two.	 212.6433420116203
........................ la tua pace	 885.6421857965612
.................. che parlar ti piace	 29.2656405751407
Mentre che il vento, come fa, si tace.	 67.93790250238554
He saw them three by three, approaching girls, in green, in rose, in	 208.22652932962183
russet, entwining, _per l’aer perso_, in mauve, in purple, _quella	 25.439041618539633
pacifica oriafiamma_, gold of oriflamme, _di rimirar fè più ardenti._	 14.386799200576586
But I old men, penitent, leadenfooted, underdarkneath the night: mouth	 62.95101984992549
south: tomb womb.	 732.7641318156283
—Speak up for yourself, Mr O’Madden Burke said.	 60.487438039608946
SUFFICIENT FOR THE DAY...	 27.270120862857297
J. J. O’Molloy, smiling palely, took up the gage.	 19.28267308420911
—My dear Myles, he said, flinging his cigarette aside, you put a false	 135.4768274615971
construction on my words. I hold no brief, as at present advised, for	 93.0587200498867
the third profession _qua_ profession but your Cork legs are running	 93.63466444243525
away with you. Why not bring in Henry Grattan and Flood and Demosthenes	 97.68176382672456
and Edmund Burke? Ignatius Gallaher we all know and his Chapelizod	 83.32259849789808
boss, Harmsworth of the farthing press, and his American cousin of the	 35.85509306174621
Bowery guttersheet not to mention _Paddy Kelly’s Budget_, _Pue’s	 36.998814293266804
Occurrences_ and our watchful friend _The Skibbereen Eagle_. Why bring	 46.918783534658964
in a master of forensic eloquence like Whiteside? Sufficient for the	 29.70646446257721
day is the newspaper thereof.	 115.60260735660842
LINKS WITH BYGONE DAYS OF YORE	 79.66836651166622
—Grattan and Flood wrote for this very paper, the editor cried in his	 51.79675366220906
face. Irish volunteers. Where are you now? Established 1763. Dr Lucas.	 86.74895648342304
Who have you now like John Philpot Curran? Psha!	 57.044312456536936
—Well, J. J. O’Molloy said, Bushe K.C., for example.	 26.37550313547927

.... But no matter.	 122.47869192688663

the Childs murder case. Bushe defended him.	 60.463144452673056
_And in the porches of mine ear did pour._	 36.72942282852226
By the way how did he find that out? He died in his sleep. Or the other	 54.35503391969768
story, beast with two backs?	 83.46284559182467

ITALIA, MAGISTRA ARTIUM	 4.206040932916629

False lull. Something quite ordinary.	 392.6309870165912
Messenger took out his matchbox thoughtfully and lit his cigar.	 91.97294755253394

it was that small act, trivial in itself, that striking of that match,	 90.88199656042114

A POLISHED PERIOD	 67.4047423937428
J. J. O’Molloy resumed, moulding his words:	 24.860096075979428

—Fine! Myles Crawford said at once.	 29.157507411862206

A MAN OF HIGH MORALE	 58.82190736510906
—Professor Magennis was speaking to me about you, J. J. O’Molloy said	 52.823185618846175
to Stephen. What do you think really of that hermetic crowd, the opal	 51.04296497784748
hush poets: A. E. the mastermystic? That Blavatsky woman started it.	 165.6030773488559
She was a nice old bag of tricks. A. E. has been telling some yankee	 48.432814154969805
interviewer that you came to him in the small hours of the morning to	 74.22078553800321
ask him about planes of consciousness. Magennis thinks you must have	 51.07991404452674
been pulling A. E.’s leg. He is a man of the very highest morale,	 33.49281163343884
Magennis.	 4.608171674364364
Speaking about me. What did he say? What did he say? What did he say	 37.798665564606374
about me? Don’t ask.	 187.20476958969124
—No, thanks, professor MacHugh said, waving the cigarettecase aside.	 39.278166546800804
Wait a moment. Let me say one thing. The finest display of oratory I	 55.30692828370702
ever heard was a speech made by John F Taylor at the college historical	 81.55762153160165
society. Mr Justice Fitzgibbon, the present lord justice of appeal, had	 366.85559758637163
spoken and the paper under debate was an essay (new for those days),	 112.97304172689611
advocating the revival of the Irish tongue.	 18.744160218075443
He turned towards Myles Crawford and said:	 66.59804929711065
—You know Gerald Fitzgibbon. Then you can imagine the style of his	 45.49106095069203
discourse.	 4.608171674364364
—He is sitting with Tim Healy, J. J. O’Molloy said, rumour has it, on	 24.227300984664804
the Trinity college estates commission.	 35.15273927148996
—He is sitting with a sweet thing, Myles Crawford said, in a child’s	 38.3276218379805
frock. Go on. Well?	 68.16047841813447
—It was the speech, mark you, the professor said, of a finished orator,	 45.32861019970208
full of courteous haughtiness and pouring in chastened diction I will	 31.216590100084733
not say the vials of his wrath but pouring the proud man’s contumely	 41.807547123346936
upon the new movement. It was then a new movement. We were weak,	 44.186108761329095
therefore worthless.	 174.71724018419692
He closed his long thin lips an instant but, eager to be on, raised an	 90.45927534043241
outspanned hand to his spectacles and, with trembling thumb and	 41.39561315104202
ringfinger touching lightly the black rims, steadied them to a new	 75.74202315708486
focus.	 4.608171674364364
IMPROMPTU	 4.608171674364364
In ferial tone he addressed J. J. O’Molloy:	 27.85678243955657
—Taylor had come there, you must know, from a sickbed. That he had	 74.75589233156556
prepared his speech I do not believe for there was not even one	 56.72136608722378
shorthandwriter in the hall. His dark lean face had a growth of shaggy	 40.69566844249921
beard round it. He wore a loose white silk neckcloth and altogether he	 70.25663469782702
looked (though he was not) a dying man.	 68.49628770854667
His gaze turned at once but slowly from J. J. O’Molloy’s towards	 98.36224698739949
Stephen’s face and then bent at once to the ground, seeking. His	 51.532043875219316
unglazed linen collar appeared behind his bent head, soiled by his	 47.80074630292161
withering hair. Still seeking, he said:	 65.14974985511404
—When Fitzgibbon’s speech had ended John F Taylor rose to reply.	 167.93252383660408
Briefly, as well as I can bring them to mind, his words were these.	 43.4565048027522
He raised his head firmly. His eyes bethought themselves once more.	 38.375799621449175
Witless shellfish swam in the gross lenses to and fro, seeking outlet.	 10.065451494665403
He began:	 99.57516565792203
_—Mr Chairman, ladies and gentlemen: Great was my admiration in	 89.08458291000788
listening to the remarks addressed to the youth of Ireland a moment	 54.83034352781284
since by my learned friend. It seemed to me that I had been transported	 62.471357698206106
into a country far away from this country, into an age remote from this	 131.71997402968844
age, that I stood in ancient Egypt and that I was listening to the	 73.1109234841104
speech of some highpriest of that land addressed to the youthful	 51.49720488454846
Moses._	 3951.079191913059
His listeners held their cigarettes poised to hear, their smokes	 51.208879834401905
ascending in frail stalks that flowered with his speech. _And let our	 30.08068495050936
crooked smokes._ Noble words coming. Look out. Could you try your hand	 142.82332140950413
at it yourself?	 213.34294410068824
_—And it seemed to me that I heard the voice of that Egyptian	 36.279218719659085
highpriest raised in a tone of like haughtiness and like pride. I heard	 79.13005523101498
his words and their meaning was revealed to me._	 69.67090856618866
FROM THE FATHERS	 213.4166973748175
It was revealed to me that those things are good which yet are	 78.13645782744221
corrupted which neither if they were supremely good nor unless they	 60.79748248943689
were good could be corrupted. Ah, curse you! That’s saint Augustine.	 260.30868712158474
_—Why will you jews not accept our culture, our religion and our	 87.39370488161323
language? You are a tribe of nomad herdsmen: we are a mighty people.	 85.91077304495724
You have no cities nor no wealth: our cities are hives of humanity and	 55.642506045734095
our galleys, trireme and quadrireme, laden with all manner merchandise	 23.336372526709624
furrow the waters of the known globe. You have but emerged from	 52.362566077070895
primitive conditions: we have a literature, a priesthood, an agelong	 29.628587472068006
history and a polity._	 68.02662793272938
Nile.	 4.608171674364364
Child, man, effigy.	 432.9271745960408
By the Nilebank the babemaries kneel, cradle of bulrushes: a man supple	 43.3722450922151
in combat: stonehorned, stonebearded, heart of stone.	 47.33565614815453
_—You pray to a local and obscure idol: our temples, majestic and	 27.071080969445866
mysterious, are the abodes of Isis and Osiris, of Horus and Ammon Ra.	 25.483830790465202
Yours serfdom, awe and humbleness: ours thunder and the seas. Israel is	 93.3199922670894
weak and few are her children: Egypt is an host and terrible are her	 218.215814206679
arms. Vagrants and daylabourers are you called: the world trembles at	 57.27791859307429
our name._	 480.55743998552833
A dumb belch of hunger cleft his speech. He lifted his voice above it	 25.41712238561701
boldly:	 22002.532851485295
_—But, ladies and gentlemen, had the youthful Moses listened to and	 149.20291553522392
accepted that view of life, had he bowed his head and bowed his will	 106.89192942336207
and bowed his spirit before that arrogant admonition he would never	 70.8936440122104
have brought the chosen people out of their house of bondage, nor	 72.59768951977786
followed the pillar of the cloud by day. He would never have spoken	 75.3526632248411
with the Eternal amid lightnings on Sinai’s mountaintop nor ever have	 53.76320878475436
come down with the light of inspiration shining in his countenance and	 55.00963042966659
bearing in his arms the tables of the law, graven in the language of	 61.76026403174373
the outlaw._	 7.77559996992721
He ceased and looked at them, enjoying a silence.	 61.12861495324306
OMINOUS—FOR HIM!	 45.15518483009432

four winds. A people sheltered within his voice. Dead noise. Akasic	 122.60935333009854

DEAR DIRTY DUBLIN	 461.67901440421105
Dubliners.	 4.608171674364364
—Two Dublin vestals, Stephen said, elderly and pious, have lived fifty	 102.99196171478583
and fiftythree years in Fumbally’s lane.	 72.30795881616258
—Where is that? the professor asked.	 36.399082651820045
—Off Blackpitts, Stephen said.	 65.60864665940842
Damp night reeking of hungry dough. Against the wall. Face glistering	 102.34115578016446
tallow under her fustian shawl. Frantic hearts. Akasic records.	 41.94073671283585
Quicker, darlint!	 4.411654744205047
On now. Dare it. Let there be life.	 377.5109583991449
—They want to see the views of Dublin from the top of Nelson’s pillar.	 21.88390159648129
They save up three and tenpence in a red tin letterbox moneybox. They	 72.11209409623095
shake out the threepenny bits and sixpences and coax out the pennies	 66.87757580531289
with the blade of a knife. Two and three in silver and one and seven in	 131.74667363347078
coppers. They put on their bonnets and best clothes and take their	 55.398550014124
umbrellas for fear it may come on to rain.	 62.98548995159641
—Wise virgins, professor MacHugh said.	 27.66513100186578
LIFE ON THE RAW	 242.57810448268384
—They buy one and fourpenceworth of brawn and four slices of panloaf at	 38.2879866559339
the north city diningrooms in Marlborough street from Miss Kate	 50.95021604908798
Collins, proprietress... They purchase four and twenty ripe plums from	 53.60047361937842
a girl at the foot of Nelson’s pillar to take off the thirst of the	 29.76809328506009
brawn. They give two threepenny bits to the gentleman at the turnstile	 125.73029535075152
and begin to waddle slowly up the winding staircase, grunting,	 37.97570371607977
encouraging each other, afraid of the dark, panting, one asking the	 41.69564636638898
other have you the brawn, praising God and the Blessed Virgin,	 96.78033073100326
threatening to come down, peeping at the airslits. Glory be to God.	 79.70923330687401
They had no idea it was that high.	 83.95588369347662
Their names are Anne Kearns and Florence MacCabe. Anne Kearns has the	 24.87449914086479
lumbago for which she rubs on Lourdes water, given her by a lady who	 62.51412997911314
got a bottleful from a passionist father. Florence MacCabe takes a	 51.73806449948668
crubeen and a bottle of double X for supper every Saturday.	 61.87509039397552
—Antithesis, the professor said nodding twice. Vestal virgins. I can	 51.679840822839985
see them. What’s keeping our friend?	 113.6530362264464
He turned.	 32.184482385959534

RETURN OF BLOOM	 357.6053268010245
—Yes, he said. I see them.	 36.77656666450994

A newsboy cried in Mr Bloom’s face:	 52.71195259034205

INTERVIEW WITH THE EDITOR	 34.659051046820814
—Just this ad, Mr Bloom said, pushing through towards the steps,	 53.46812025401477
puffing, and taking the cutting from his pocket. I spoke with Mr Keyes	 46.49670917291137
just now. He’ll give a renewal for two months, he says. After he’ll	 76.49801748434315
see. But he wants a par to call attention in the _Telegraph_ too, the	 81.34991107467019
Saturday pink. And he wants it copied if it’s not too late I told	 105.7995470405114
councillor Nannetti from the _Kilkenny People_. I can have access to it	 46.35470851843464
in the national library. House of keys, don’t you see? His name is	 22.75535473265214
Keyes. It’s a play on the name. But he practically promised he’d give	 107.23084633979711
the renewal. But he wants just a little puff. What will I tell him, Mr	 53.15064597346965
Crawford?	 15961.84660739075
K.M.A.	 4.608171674364364
—Will you tell him he can kiss my arse? Myles Crawford said throwing	 26.278975419142697
out his arm for emphasis. Tell him that straight from the stable.	 54.17331876638884
A bit nervy. Look out for squalls. All off for a drink. Arm in arm.	 70.22403680307531
Lenehan’s yachting cap on the cadge beyond. Usual blarney. Wonder is	 32.831332245070804
that young Dedalus the moving spirit. Has a good pair of boots on him	 104.70502591221356
today. Last time I saw him he had his heels on view. Been walking in	 74.99544741869722
muck somewhere. Careless chap. What was he doing in Irishtown?	 95.1714262959624
—Well, Mr Bloom said, his eyes returning, if I can get the design I	 34.107701606798074
suppose it’s worth a short par. He’d give the ad, I think. I’ll tell	 48.501798911735925
him...	 330.5397417229756
K.M.R.I.A.	 4.608171674364364
—He can kiss my royal Irish arse, Myles Crawford cried loudly over his	 31.86212039302695
shoulder. Any time he likes, tell him.	 87.70423069023427
While Mr Bloom stood weighing the point and about to smile he strode on	 105.06613002015031
jerkily.	 4.608171674364364
RAISING THE WIND	 289.72948632066334
—_Nulla bona_, Jack, he said, raising his hand to his chin. I’m up to	 39.5351929661585
here. I’ve been through the hoop myself. I was looking for a fellow to	 69.43173761530306
back a bill for me no later than last week. Sorry, Jack. You must take	 97.53495606339767
the will for the deed. With a heart and a half if I could raise the	 60.57396579935869
wind anyhow.	 882.8995854101817
J. J. O’Molloy pulled a long face and walked on silently. They caught	 47.26118464600196
up on the others and walked abreast.	 64.86748588609305

—Something for you, the professor explained to Myles Crawford. Two old	 96.93195732780713

SOME COLUMN!—THAT’S WHAT WADDLER ONE SAID	 185.1827398467942

THOSE SLIGHTLY RAMBUNCTIOUS FEMALES	 253.88638555032747

archdiocese here.	 85.12154925584635

—Onehandled adulterer! the professor cried. I like that. I see the	 40.91671158352921

DAMES DONATE DUBLIN’S CITS SPEEDPILLS VELOCITOUS AEROLITHS, BELIEF	 22.952284055552187
—It gives them a crick in their necks, Stephen said, and they are too	 39.91062193507625
tired to look up or down or to speak. They put the bag of plums between	 145.78319037809857
them and eat the plums out of it, one after another, wiping off with	 97.10987684056687
their handkerchiefs the plumjuice that dribbles out of their mouths and	 23.301520721724778
spitting the plumstones slowly out between the railings.	 133.41311627406398
He gave a sudden loud young laugh as a close. Lenehan and Mr O’Madden	 119.84517886726705
Burke, hearing, turned, beckoned and led on across towards Mooney’s.	 227.233207865178
—Finished? Myles Crawford said. So long as they do no worse.	 74.54365067660959
SOPHIST WALLOPS HAUGHTY HELEN SQUARE ON PROBOSCIS. SPARTANS GNASH	 35.58795639039721
MOLARS. ITHACANS VOW PEN IS CHAMP.	 21.95226436380776
—You remind me of Antisthenes, the professor said, a disciple of	 24.36441078034061
Gorgias, the sophist. It is said of him that none could tell if he were	 66.00359486256471
bitterer against others or against himself. He was the son of a noble	 90.69085724475208
and a bondwoman. And he wrote a book in which he took away the palm of	 41.31900208452448
beauty from Argive Helen and handed it to poor Penelope.	 130.63001667288836
Poor Penelope. Penelope Rich.	 51.48976878628863

Very good for the brain.	 111.53432139427574
From Butler’s monument house corner he glanced along Bachelor’s walk.	 50.74206984385267
Dedalus’ daughter there still outside Dillon’s auctionrooms. Must be	 204.64746468447154
selling off some old furniture. Knew her eyes at once from the father.	 115.83039075367769
Lobbing about waiting for him. Home always breaks up when the mother	 91.08458203658594
goes. Fifteen children he had. Birth every year almost. That’s in their	 247.43348462644346
theology or the priest won’t give the poor woman the confession, the	 74.18227142231966
absolution. Increase and multiply. Did you ever hear such an idea? Eat	 84.35504416731101
you out of house and home. No families themselves to feed. Living on	 120.00530241746758
the fat of the land. Their butteries and larders. I’d like to see them	 46.88456262141995
do the black fast Yom Kippur. Crossbuns. One meal and a collation for	 48.70402702532999
fear he’d collapse on the altar. A housekeeper of one of those fellows	 46.250468821069575
if you could pick it out of her. Never pick it out of her. Like getting	 35.947578040273505
£. s. d. out of him. Does himself well. No guests. All for number one.	 64.17883207834235
Watching his water. Bring your own bread and butter. His reverence:	 170.3164441189124
mum’s the word.	 36.474856210649925
Good Lord, that poor child’s dress is in flitters. Underfed she looks	 86.2186664851287
too. Potatoes and marge, marge and potatoes. It’s after they feel it.	 52.82507250014775
Proof of the pudding. Undermines the constitution.	 16.147712575341107
As he set foot on O’Connell bridge a puffball of smoke plumed up from	 45.44638130676522
the parapet. Brewery barge with export stout. England. Sea air sours	 97.64433427564582
it, I heard. Be interesting some day get a pass through Hancock to see	 98.12071744373591
the brewery. Regular world in itself. Vats of porter wonderful. Rats	 76.22441831031131
get in too. Drink themselves bloated as big as a collie floating. Dead	 109.4371687632754
drunk on the porter. Drink till they puke again like christians.	 157.78269048651373
Imagine drinking that! Rats: vats. Well, of course, if we knew all the	 55.31796368953017
things.	 6033.715550817363

things. Knows how to tell a story too.	 135.35495700139245

into the Liffey. See that? The gulls swooped silently, two, then all	 261.8052026187511
from their heights, pouncing on prey. Gone. Every morsel.	 55.551523212745025
Aware of their greed and cunning he shook the powdery crumb from his	 28.537961863095802

have, all seabirds, gulls, seagoose. Swans from Anna Liffey swim down	 117.70344888465488
here sometimes to preen themselves. No accounting for tastes. Wonder	 103.84384425257922
what kind is swanmeat. Robinson Crusoe had to live on them.	 79.21960769181977
They wheeled flapping weakly. I’m not going to throw any more. Penny	 27.377043020513604
quite enough. Lot of thanks I get. Not even a caw. They spread foot and	 66.61376625745342
mouth disease too. If you cram a turkey say on chestnutmeal it tastes	 48.18755765747938
like that. Eat pig like pig. But then why is it that saltwater fish are	 90.16860284945261
not salty? How is that?	 65.68906553987149

barreltone voice. He has legs like barrels and you’d think he was	 128.21609165900554

A procession of whitesmocked sandwichmen marched slowly towards him	 14.71554448820099

Wisdom Hely’s. Y lagging behind drew a chunk of bread from under his	 35.161018042301016
foreboard, crammed it into his mouth and munched as he walked. Our	 40.168592709616206
staple food. Three bob a day, walking along the gutters, street after	 69.24111928774494
street. Just keep skin and bone together, bread and skilly. They are	 90.14603847902497
not Boyl: no, M’Glade’s men. Doesn’t bring in any business either. I	 102.63974103724752
suggested to him about a transparent showcart with two smart girls	 54.148887321033584
sitting inside writing letters, copybooks, envelopes, blottingpaper. I	 166.10046344242113
bet that would have caught on. Smart girls writing something catch the	 96.78490275255679
eye at once. Everyone dying to know what she’s writing. Get twenty of	 102.5682714413559
them round you if you stare at nothing. Have a finger in the pie. Women	 172.2479208932926
too. Curiosity. Pillar of salt. Wouldn’t have it of course because he	 63.122703748797406
didn’t think of it himself first. Or the inkbottle I suggested with a	 67.26573896709486
false stain of black celluloid. His ideas for ads like Plumtree’s	 87.07441735941711
potted under the obituaries, cold meat department. You can’t lick ’em.	 88.62149978938426

Robinson, I am hastening to purchase the only reliable inkeraser	 66.04395011585727
_Kansell,_ sold by Hely’s Ltd, 85 Dame street. Well out of that ruck I	 44.39922495843483
am. Devil of a job it was collecting accounts of those convents.	 43.83516467683486
Tranquilla convent. That was a nice nun there, really sweet face.	 73.85644916522598
Wimple suited her small head. Sister? Sister? I am sure she was crossed	 86.26949409439975
in love by her eyes. Very hard to bargain with that sort of a woman. I	 83.40600957060498
disturbed her at her devotions that morning. But glad to communicate	 42.53761298612897
with the outside world. Our great day, she said. Feast of Our Lady of	 94.66835265706466
Mount Carmel. Sweet name too: caramel. She knew I, I think she knew by	 131.50721198240765
the way she. If she had married she would have changed. I suppose they	 79.06537990240969
really were short of money. Fried everything in the best butter all the	 115.0138830051105
same. No lard for them. My heart’s broke eating dripping. They like	 105.16645116782979
buttering themselves in and out. Molly tasting it, her veil up. Sister?	 139.58687716898038
Pat Claffey, the pawnbroker’s daughter. It was a nun they say invented	 60.00509657165725
barbed wire.	 143.00753976677254

cycleshop. Those races are on today. How long ago is that? Year Phil	 66.97727127882128

the job in Wisdom Hely’s year we married. Six years. Ten years ago:	 75.19107987641105
ninetyfour he died yes that’s right the big fire at Arnott’s. Val	 77.67994963082675
Dillon was lord mayor. The Glencree dinner. Alderman Robert O’Reilly	 87.99772777182521
emptying the port into his soup before the flag fell. Bobbob lapping it	 64.94091538239904
for the inner alderman. Couldn’t hear what the band played. For what we	 42.73575411190158
have already received may the Lord make us. Milly was a kiddy then.	 129.96625609063756
Molly had that elephantgrey dress with the braided frogs. Mantailored	 84.49428941481699
with selfcovered buttons. She didn’t like it because I sprained my	 85.178032444513
ankle first day she wore choir picnic at the Sugarloaf. As if that. Old	 79.66505641056077
Goodwin’s tall hat done up with some sticky stuff. Flies’ picnic too.	 245.66744625792276
Never put a dress on her back like it. Fitted her like a glove,	 56.70394008513402
shoulders and hips. Just beginning to plump it out well. Rabbitpie we	 107.58008212856078
had that day. People looking after her.	 135.93994169118167
Happy. Happier then. Snug little room that was with the red wallpaper.	 88.51702685195251

soap I bought: elderflower. Cosy smell of her bathwater. Funny she	 105.40944389055784
looked soaped all over. Shapely too. Now photography. Poor papa’s	 125.98511421808698
daguerreotype atelier he told me of. Hereditary taste.	 52.510369543916546

—Woke me up in the night, she said. Dream he had, a nightmare.	 31.589298214701593
Indiges.	 4.608171674364364
—Said the ace of spades was walking up the stairs.	 66.8222284299151
—The ace of spades! Mr Bloom said.	 16.396208869622033
She took a folded postcard from her handbag.	 29.145142811429235
—Read that, she said. He got it this morning.	 85.04221728777932
—What is it? Mr Bloom asked, taking the card. U. P.?	 27.07120688964756
—U. p: up, she said. Someone taking a rise out of him. It’s a great	 45.81518515508303
shame for them whoever he is.	 105.52960741614193
—Indeed it is, Mr Bloom said.	 42.61455288669576
She took back the card, sighing.	 82.94566374070276
—And now he’s going round to Mr Menton’s office. He’s going to take an	 29.67652804825889
action for ten thousand pounds, he says.	 49.587397459953344
She folded the card into her untidy bag and snapped the catch.	 86.37727109139747
Same blue serge dress she had two years ago, the nap bleaching. Seen	 80.71092932212495
its best days. Wispish hair over her ears. And that dowdy toque: three	 96.52105149459163
old grapes to take the harm out of it. Shabby genteel. She used to be a	 25.786055700929143
tasty dresser. Lines round her mouth. Only a year or so older than	 83.94261215413388
Molly.	 2054.2518145680447
See the eye that woman gave her, passing. Cruel. The unfair sex.	 107.77209185104658
He looked still at her, holding back behind his look his discontent.	 58.25518571954016
Pungent mockturtle oxtail mulligatawny. I’m hungry too. Flakes of	 48.85680247871238
pastry on the gusset of her dress: daub of sugary flour stuck to her	 34.44571831838799
cheek. Rhubarb tart with liberal fillings, rich fruit interior. Josie	 26.92616945614573
Powell that was. In Luke Doyle’s long ago. Dolphin’s Barn, the	 15.10182088180377
charades. U. p: up.	 12.820020575835482
Change the subject.	 667.8964516246393
—Do you ever see anything of Mrs Beaufoy? Mr Bloom asked.	 41.088983070521806
—Mina Purefoy? she said.	 198.61043802113483
Philip Beaufoy I was thinking. Playgoers’ Club. Matcham often thinks of	 47.12232023240526
the masterstroke. Did I pull the chain? Yes. The last act.	 76.99649692090155
—Yes.	 220.63927910459736
—I just called to ask on the way in is she over it. She’s in the	 91.13782694007695
lying-in hospital in Holles street. Dr Horne got her in. She’s three	 97.08423125296912
days bad now.	 375.19027901952956
—O, Mr Bloom said. I’m sorry to hear that.	 19.24853970429374
—Yes, Mrs Breen said. And a houseful of kids at home. It’s a very stiff	 34.27987438523406
birth, the nurse told me.	 116.1742699525881
—O, Mr Bloom said.	 16.486067931957727
His heavy pitying gaze absorbed her news. His tongue clacked in	 92.40489892530255
compassion. Dth! Dth!	 32.264731083255825
—I’m sorry to hear that, he said. Poor thing! Three days! That’s	 61.733581690261204
terrible for her.	 287.8787326990842
Mrs Breen nodded.	 42.241173489392196
—She was taken bad on the Tuesday...	 113.45792597106636
Mr Bloom touched her funnybone gently, warning her:	 38.610456542163206
—Mind! Let this man pass.	 743.5096426282521
A bony form strode along the curbstone from the river staring with a	 72.09252324875419
rapt gaze into the sunlight through a heavystringed glass. Tight as a	 100.11788704717662
skullpiece a tiny hat gripped his head. From his arm a folded dustcoat,	 54.58150648730495
a stick and an umbrella dangled to his stride.	 36.11010875603526
—Watch him, Mr Bloom said. He always walks outside the lampposts.	 55.12890202801825
Watch!	 2711.78832421018
—Who is he if it’s a fair question? Mrs Breen asked. Is he dotty?	 54.61931213293537
—His name is Cashel Boyle O’Connor Fitzmaurice Tisdall Farrell, Mr	 9.982598214515498
Bloom said smiling. Watch!	 150.26557556688866
—He has enough of them, she said. Denis will be like that one of these	 49.97364827718712
days.	 2347.1916633893857
She broke off suddenly.	 119.61529683780692
—There he is, she said. I must go after him. Goodbye. Remember me to	 33.22236790379349
Molly, won’t you?	 120.6615118594709
—I will, Mr Bloom said.	 20.336250767078987
He watched her dodge through passers towards the shopfronts. Denis	 51.83556881003575
Breen in skimpy frockcoat and blue canvas shoes shuffled out of	 85.68448362126004
Harrison’s hugging two heavy tomes to his ribs. Blown in from the bay.	 41.72757002143302
Like old times. He suffered her to overtake him without surprise and	 89.65239638360046
thrust his dull grey beard towards her, his loose jaw wagging as he	 116.9895033056463
spoke earnestly.	 3500.1257162322668
Meshuggah. Off his chump.	 19.12510244958565
Mr Bloom walked on again easily, seeing ahead of him in sunlight the	 37.11592949795647
tight skullpiece, the dangling stickumbrelladustcoat. Going the two	 191.04698958678821
days. Watch him! Out he goes again. One way of getting on in the world.	 106.50702890914557
And that other old mosey lunatic in those duds. Hard time she must have	 64.43794584310794
with him.	 77.73164388468649
U. p: up. I’ll take my oath that’s Alf Bergan or Richie Goulding. Wrote	 30.230445642541305
it for a lark in the Scotch house I bet anything. Round to Menton’s	 46.222354340606465
office. His oyster eyes staring at the postcard. Be a feast for the	 75.91909060986916
gods.	 18423.38058900307
He passed the _Irish Times_. There might be other answers lying there.	 74.45396094596646
Like to answer them all. Good system for criminals. Code. At their	 80.53397618807915
lunch now. Clerk with the glasses there doesn’t know me. O, leave them	 127.82528410071222
there to simmer. Enough bother wading through fortyfour of them.	 66.43929395618142
Wanted, smart lady typist to aid gentleman in literary work. I called	 128.29077376964463
you naughty darling because I do not like that other world. Please tell	 22.283699870818534
me what is the meaning. Please tell me what perfume does your wife.	 24.261840790561802
Tell me who made the world. The way they spring those questions on you.	 66.83053589876022
And the other one Lizzie Twigg. My literary efforts have had the good	 67.44221593448982
fortune to meet with the approval of the eminent poet A. E. (Mr Geo.	 41.02276947366421
Russell). No time to do her hair drinking sloppy tea with a book of	 89.59802234425791
poetry.	 18794.8135371824
Best paper by long chalks for a small ad. Got the provinces now. Cook	 137.2174302528384
and general, exc. cuisine, housemaid kept. Wanted live man for spirit	 223.43718258086741
counter. Resp. girl (R.C.) wishes to hear of post in fruit or pork	 127.73847797061956
shop. James Carlisle made that. Six and a half per cent dividend. Made	 170.6298605212041
a big deal on Coates’s shares. Ca’ canny. Cunning old Scotch hunks. All	 38.04373835729859
the toady news. Our gracious and popular vicereine. Bought the _Irish	 74.31282532664598
Field_ now. Lady Mountcashel has quite recovered after her confinement	 115.24910544131163
and rode out with the Ward Union staghounds at the enlargement	 48.77669605698126
yesterday at Rathoath. Uneatable fox. Pothunters too. Fear injects	 95.44213253024067
juices make it tender enough for them. Riding astride. Sit her horse	 154.20149545852706
like a man. Weightcarrying huntress. No sidesaddle or pillion for her,	 32.04276461139204
not for Joe. First to the meet and in at the death. Strong as a brood	 208.2112542047021
mare some of those horsey women. Swagger around livery stables. Toss	 168.57956293385158
off a glass of brandy neat while you’d say knife. That one at the	 85.60574418195365
Grosvenor this morning. Up with her on the car: wishswish. Stonewall or	 45.496936303195106
fivebarred gate put her mount to it. Think that pugnosed driver did it	 125.16918699769496
out of spite. Who is this she was like? O yes! Mrs Miriam Dandrade that	 54.258396487244624
sold me her old wraps and black underclothes in the Shelbourne hotel.	 49.823228101612784
Divorced Spanish American. Didn’t take a feather out of her my handling	 53.43325098789328
them. As if I was her clotheshorse. Saw her in the viceregal party when	 76.78804493424887
Stubbs the park ranger got me in with Whelan of the _Express._	 67.03800970951568
Scavenging what the quality left. High tea. Mayonnaise I poured on the	 84.09613919368019
plums thinking it was custard. Her ears ought to have tingled for a few	 49.23209682668553
weeks after. Want to be a bull for her. Born courtesan. No nursery work	 102.4034798238108
for her, thanks.	 207.97478270758285
Poor Mrs Purefoy! Methodist husband. Method in his madness. Saffron bun	 26.872305185019385
and milk and soda lunch in the educational dairy. Y. M. C. A. Eating	 45.63795037853046
with a stopwatch, thirtytwo chews to the minute. And still his	 52.99233723623549
muttonchop whiskers grew. Supposed to be well connected. Theodore’s	 36.43341065952034
cousin in Dublin Castle. One tony relative in every family. Hardy	 64.3785992307654
annuals he presents her with. Saw him out at the Three Jolly Topers	 58.94072597715915
marching along bareheaded and his eldest boy carrying one in a	 91.54792386261661
marketnet. The squallers. Poor thing! Then having to give the breast	 108.29855921895243
year after year all hours of the night. Selfish those t.t’s are. Dog in	 86.23369470727992
the manger. Only one lump of sugar in my tea, if you please.	 59.16414981292836
He stood at Fleet street crossing. Luncheon interval. A sixpenny at	 28.852654086528325
Rowe’s? Must look up that ad in the national library. An eightpenny in	 49.87435932441467
the Burton. Better. On my way.	 114.5096598486461
He walked on past Bolton’s Westmoreland house. Tea. Tea. Tea. I forgot	 78.96167148119834
to tap Tom Kernan.	 176.6449367493677
Sss. Dth, dth, dth! Three days imagine groaning on a bed with a	 46.6492486014432
vinegared handkerchief round her forehead, her belly swollen out. Phew!	 90.73671454007349
Dreadful simply! Child’s head too big: forceps. Doubled up inside her	 126.48632882460599
trying to butt its way out blindly, groping for the way out. Kill me	 57.93988178417071
that would. Lucky Molly got over hers lightly. They ought to invent	 139.36310491571018
something to stop that. Life with hard labour. Twilight sleep idea:	 157.7238250135909
queen Victoria was given that. Nine she had. A good layer. Old woman	 70.98507196033907
that lived in a shoe she had so many children. Suppose he was	 48.1957051341272
consumptive. Time someone thought about it instead of gassing about the	 42.30361626780806
what was it the pensive bosom of the silver effulgence. Flapdoodle to	 25.065046163133857
feed fools on. They could easily have big establishments whole thing	 179.2856059412463
quite painless out of all the taxes give every child born five quid at	 67.64807772538995
compound interest up to twentyone five per cent is a hundred shillings	 61.89563994294065
and five tiresome pounds multiply by twenty decimal system encourage	 139.0216540389416
people to put by money save hundred and ten and a bit twentyone years	 232.92119412853037
want to work it out on paper come to a tidy sum more than you think.	 43.53661767647499
Not stillborn of course. They are not even registered. Trouble for	 35.52971343852751
nothing.	 1607.3341761142708
Funny sight two of them together, their bellies out. Molly and Mrs	 164.06260179300753
Moisel. Mothers’ meeting. Phthisis retires for the time being, then	 37.504007955361516
returns. How flat they look all of a sudden after. Peaceful eyes.	 183.0862753642777
Weight off their mind. Old Mrs Thornton was a jolly old soul. All my	 148.76104572255838
babies, she said. The spoon of pap in her mouth before she fed them. O,	 56.841705298342994
that’s nyumnyum. Got her hand crushed by old Tom Wall’s son. His first	 189.83484212390493
bow to the public. Head like a prize pumpkin. Snuffy Dr Murren. People	 105.25494460245137
knocking them up at all hours. For God’ sake, doctor. Wife in her	 101.13709040837767
throes. Then keep them waiting months for their fee. To attendance on	 105.04304586027001
your wife. No gratitude in people. Humane doctors, most of them.	 166.05371939530434
Before the huge high door of the Irish house of parliament a flock of	 70.6360805196929
pigeons flew. Their little frolic after meals. Who will we do it on? I	 82.35348675614165
pick the fellow in black. Here goes. Here’s good luck. Must be	 255.28566079228779
thrilling from the air. Apjohn, myself and Owen Goldberg up in the	 32.26109027418465
trees near Goose green playing the monkeys. Mackerel they called me.	 127.01401596954382
A squad of constables debouched from College street, marching in Indian	 18.150326245099453
file. Goosestep. Foodheated faces, sweating helmets, patting their	 46.17299969048846
truncheons. After their feed with a good load of fat soup under their	 32.79986791241107
belts. Policeman’s lot is oft a happy one. They split up in groups and	 56.238013974241845
scattered, saluting, towards their beats. Let out to graze. Best moment	 157.99641239791703
to attack one in pudding time. A punch in his dinner. A squad of	 63.11790794849275
others, marching irregularly, rounded Trinity railings making for the	 90.36436477875932
station. Bound for their troughs. Prepare to receive cavalry. Prepare	 38.09538875007254
to receive soup.	 169.21720761290953
He crossed under Tommy Moore’s roguish finger. They did right to put	 153.49648422443295
him up over a urinal: meeting of the waters. Ought to be places for	 66.40341908985508
women. Running into cakeshops. Settle my hat straight. _There is not in	 137.90496373314778
this wide world a vallee_. Great song of Julia Morkan’s. Kept her voice	 100.15120338698692
up to the very last. Pupil of Michael Balfe’s, wasn’t she?	 77.96279674523623
He gazed after the last broad tunic. Nasty customers to tackle. Jack	 42.38474497224662
Power could a tale unfold: father a G man. If a fellow gave them	 137.86214754882928
trouble being lagged they let him have it hot and heavy in the	 101.52366580327993
bridewell. Can’t blame them after all with the job they have especially	 54.13459705653141
the young hornies. That horsepoliceman the day Joe Chamberlain was	 52.58065631655377
given his degree in Trinity he got a run for his money. My word he did!	 113.85725659646664
His horse’s hoofs clattering after us down Abbey street. Lucky I had	 79.33703861234096
the presence of mind to dive into Manning’s or I was souped. He did	 48.931008026321514
come a wallop, by George. Must have cracked his skull on the	 64.02372357601163
cobblestones. I oughtn’t to have got myself swept along with those	 71.64310332569895
medicals. And the Trinity jibs in their mortarboards. Looking for	 40.29173810324613
trouble. Still I got to know that young Dixon who dressed that sting	 82.00209964015936
for me in the Mater and now he’s in Holles street where Mrs Purefoy.	 47.26724329386784
Wheels within wheels. Police whistle in my ears still. All skedaddled.	 250.45808238989625
Why he fixed on me. Give me in charge. Right here it began.	 130.48117809894728
—Up the Boers!	 32.3421265221091
—Three cheers for De Wet!	 69.19218659403784

The Butter exchange band. Few years’ time half of them magistrates and	 66.39019705582147
civil servants. War comes on: into the army helterskelter: same fellows	 238.49104037948615
used to. Whether on the scaffold high.	 68.37833487940345

always courting slaveys. Easily twig a man used to uniform.	 88.43988169238538

half the night.	 351.7393626875636

You must have a certain fascination: Parnell. Arthur Griffith is a	 38.456933206056036
squareheaded fellow but he has no go in him for the mob. Or gas about	 103.81086969635297
our lovely land. Gammon and spinach. Dublin Bakery Company’s tearoom.	 22.20380781174508
Debating societies. That republicanism is the best form of government.	 33.5604745407888
That the language question should take precedence of the economic	 49.695774774155176
question. Have your daughters inveigling them to your house. Stuff them	 224.43898395790265
up with meat and drink. Michaelmas goose. Here’s a good lump of thyme	 93.02049102212598
seasoning under the apron for you. Have another quart of goosegrease	 21.007824213980616
before it gets too cold. Halffed enthusiasts. Penny roll and a walk	 98.67250880818727
with the band. No grace for the carver. The thought that the other chap	 54.123902166112316
pays best sauce in the world. Make themselves thoroughly at home. Show	 142.48256074200063
us over those apricots, meaning peaches. The not far distant day.	 146.80038260533817
Homerule sun rising up in the northwest.	 13.403548447797178
His smile faded as he walked, a heavy cloud hiding the sun slowly,	 59.11922542413409
shadowing Trinity’s surly front. Trams passed one another, ingoing,	 54.05000020697814
outgoing, clanging. Useless words. Things go on same, day after day:	 130.40860346204238
squads of police marching out, back: trams in, out. Those two loonies	 79.83930762896517
mooching about. Dignam carted off. Mina Purefoy swollen belly on a bed	 135.75078805316943
groaning to have a child tugged out of her. One born every second	 47.42706300980276
somewhere. Other dying every second. Since I fed the birds five	 219.72176545005897
minutes. Three hundred kicked the bucket. Other three hundred born,	 125.67497883421827
washing the blood off, all are washed in the blood of the lamb, bawling	 84.55795902908936
maaaaaa.	 4.608171674364364
Cityful passing away, other cityful coming, passing away too: other	 190.71783656459786
coming on, passing on. Houses, lines of houses, streets, miles of	 211.95840436002763
pavements, piledup bricks, stones. Changing hands. This owner, that.	 80.3607239098282
Landlord never dies they say. Other steps into his shoes when he gets	 124.22490164937943
his notice to quit. They buy the place up with gold and still they have	 83.09873075859856
all the gold. Swindle in it somewhere. Piled up in cities, worn away	 94.17304437166644
age after age. Pyramids in sand. Built on bread and onions. Slaves	 92.83780102110047
Chinese wall. Babylon. Big stones left. Round towers. Rest rubble,	 397.64074137993833
sprawling suburbs, jerrybuilt. Kerwan’s mushroom houses built of	 15.450160412858752
breeze. Shelter, for the night.	 61.63054512495361
No-one is anything.	 851.49778701928
This is the very worst hour of the day. Vitality. Dull, gloomy: hate	 75.77088749043688
this hour. Feel as if I had been eaten and spewed.	 37.833785969469346
Provost’s house. The reverend Dr Salmon: tinned salmon. Well tinned in	 24.864964089687405
there. Like a mortuary chapel. Wouldn’t live in it if they paid me.	 72.84781165313649
Hope they have liver and bacon today. Nature abhors a vacuum.	 94.54912437021834
The sun freed itself slowly and lit glints of light among the	 78.66560832833002
silverware opposite in Walter Sexton’s window by which John Howard	 137.67527563817453
Parnell passed, unseeing.	 244.9985165706099
There he is: the brother. Image of him. Haunting face. Now that’s a	 55.44827139881386
coincidence. Course hundreds of times you think of a person and don’t	 116.94365019843525
meet him. Like a man walking in his sleep. No-one knows him. Must be a	 42.032944866833624
corporation meeting today. They say he never put on the city marshal’s	 42.44744566160407
uniform since he got the job. Charley Kavanagh used to come out on his	 74.2248898516927
high horse, cocked hat, puffed, powdered and shaved. Look at the	 48.593781786263875
woebegone walk of him. Eaten a bad egg. Poached eyes on ghost. I have a	 60.931176772210065
pain. Great man’s brother: his brother’s brother. He’d look nice on the	 122.94876560524204
city charger. Drop into the D.B.C. probably for his coffee, play chess	 70.22019400680405
there. His brother used men as pawns. Let them all go to pot. Afraid to	 210.2836270020968
pass a remark on him. Freeze them up with that eye of his. That’s the	 99.33962616564679
fascination: the name. All a bit touched. Mad Fanny and his other	 85.59418153049438
sister Mrs Dickinson driving about with scarlet harness. Bolt upright	 182.43402804568453
like surgeon M’Ardle. Still David Sheehy beat him for south Meath.	 53.9529089222489
Apply for the Chiltern Hundreds and retire into public life. The	 26.007770983355677
patriot’s banquet. Eating orangepeels in the park. Simon Dedalus said	 23.109841830207703
when they put him in parliament that Parnell would come back from the	 62.49543719462707
grave and lead him out of the house of commons by the arm.	 45.0278340194281
—Of the twoheaded octopus, one of whose heads is the head upon which	 45.87902666767449
the ends of the world have forgotten to come while the other speaks	 47.256806864447945
with a Scotch accent. The tentacles...	 20.701637299402083
They passed from behind Mr Bloom along the curbstone. Beard and	 83.39237856222302
bicycle. Young woman.	 410.47690315901855
And there he is too. Now that’s really a coincidence: second time.	 110.39178474958717
Coming events cast their shadows before. With the approval of the	 80.29810913932181
eminent poet, Mr Geo. Russell. That might be Lizzie Twigg with him. A.	 65.05216043682982
E.: what does that mean? Initials perhaps. Albert Edward, Arthur	 161.38085769202135
Edmund, Alphonsus Eb Ed El Esquire. What was he saying? The ends of the	 28.0344002803772
world with a Scotch accent. Tentacles: octopus. Something occult:	 33.14777090200969
symbolism. Holding forth. She’s taking it all in. Not saying a word. To	 122.56594301477705
aid gentleman in literary work.	 122.95484780013807
His eyes followed the high figure in homespun, beard and bicycle, a	 50.07022284519123
listening woman at his side. Coming from the vegetarian. Only	 75.54228109302655
weggebobbles and fruit. Don’t eat a beefsteak. If you do the eyes of	 54.21336938709594
that cow will pursue you through all eternity. They say it’s healthier.	 97.37378260453896
Windandwatery though. Tried it. Keep you on the run all day. Bad as a	 80.87192151974703
bloater. Dreams all night. Why do they call that thing they gave me	 69.44243880678819
nutsteak? Nutarians. Fruitarians. To give you the idea you are eating	 39.73200528646933
rumpsteak. Absurd. Salty too. They cook in soda. Keep you sitting by	 74.04129631525626
the tap all night.	 313.13648980744154
Her stockings are loose over her ankles. I detest that: so tasteless.	 54.19911043732324
Those literary etherial people they are all. Dreamy, cloudy,	 70.89686203004297
symbolistic. Esthetes they are. I wouldn’t be surprised if it was that	 37.08748081566169
kind of food you see produces the like waves of the brain the poetical.	 92.00480806036721
For example one of those policemen sweating Irish stew into their	 51.551134797890576
shirts you couldn’t squeeze a line of poetry out of him. Don’t know	 72.60030513049868
what poetry is even. Must be in a certain mood.	 58.293347549005205
The dreamy cloudy gull	 28.481400457750713
Waves o’er the waters dull.	 82.59267866811795
He crossed at Nassau street corner and stood before the window of	 55.4853827650925
Yeates and Son, pricing the fieldglasses. Or will I drop into old	 73.75868298832918
Harris’s and have a chat with young Sinclair? Wellmannered fellow.	 43.022933357354084
Probably at his lunch. Must get those old glasses of mine set right.	 174.07135832971426
Goerz lenses six guineas. Germans making their way everywhere. Sell on	 73.00931611329449
easy terms to capture trade. Undercutting. Might chance on a pair in	 92.44898355684849
the railway lost property office. Astonishing the things people leave	 67.90328158797429
behind them in trains and cloakrooms. What do they be thinking about?	 42.42590871073108
Women too. Incredible. Last year travelling to Ennis had to pick up	 52.35915189494844
that farmer’s daughter’s bag and hand it to her at Limerick junction.	 110.85416160997865
Unclaimed money too. There’s a little watch up there on the roof of the	 46.6319326463168
bank to test those glasses by.	 193.45292281619194
His lids came down on the lower rims of his irides. Can’t see it. If	 38.690046489172154
you imagine it’s there you can almost see it. Can’t see it.	 36.96662837187342
He faced about and, standing between the awnings, held out his right	 53.22401029292729
hand at arm’s length towards the sun. Wanted to try that often. Yes:	 110.78066546894767
completely. The tip of his little finger blotted out the sun’s disk.	 22.011742751464322
Must be the focus where the rays cross. If I had black glasses.	 77.40102201861272
Interesting. There was a lot of talk about those sunspots when we were	 40.4055069168104
in Lombard street west. Looking up from the back garden. Terrific	 29.932519991552883
explosions they are. There will be a total eclipse this year: autumn	 39.29982562631734
some time.	 201.5270231773873
Now that I come to think of it that ball falls at Greenwich time. It’s	 91.7237688989997
the clock is worked by an electric wire from Dunsink. Must go out there	 74.82429642706457
some first Saturday of the month. If I could get an introduction to	 40.687492924922985
professor Joly or learn up something about his family. That would do	 127.62240611291625
to: man always feels complimented. Flattery where least expected.	 88.85938437248845
Nobleman proud to be descended from some king’s mistress. His	 104.14764986510907
foremother. Lay it on with a trowel. Cap in hand goes through the land.	 57.19023841188552
Not go in and blurt out what you know you’re not to: what’s parallax?	 74.38978611227165
Show this gentleman the door.	 208.26841748707352
Ah.	 892.5304701208863
His hand fell to his side again.	 47.105467486914414
Never know anything about it. Waste of time. Gasballs spinning about,	 54.3812089922541
crossing each other, passing. Same old dingdong always. Gas: then	 197.89117538164615
solid: then world: then cold: then dead shell drifting around, frozen	 114.48574549612934
rock, like that pineapple rock. The moon. Must be a new moon out, she	 50.055719375081345
said. I believe there is.	 84.99998143189539
He went on by la maison Claire.	 30.67789070337704
Wait. The full moon was the night we were Sunday fortnight exactly	 74.93558040198022
there is a new moon. Walking down by the Tolka. Not bad for a Fairview	 32.80363911116352
moon. She was humming. The young May moon she’s beaming, love. He other	 210.043190815494
side of her. Elbow, arm. He. Glowworm’s la-amp is gleaming, love.	 59.87357002557002
Touch. Fingers. Asking. Answer. Yes.	 690.8128566752306
Stop. Stop. If it was it was. Must.	 69.28141349560663
Mr Bloom, quickbreathing, slowlier walking passed Adam court.	 71.21462525148893
With a keep quiet relief his eyes took note this is the street here	 85.1089507024782
middle of the day of Bob Doran’s bottle shoulders. On his annual bend,	 90.61158712401847

femme_. Up in the Coombe with chummies and streetwalkers and then the	 24.562766608871463
rest of the year sober as a judge.	 178.26179718835925
Yes. Thought so. Sloping into the Empire. Gone. Plain soda would do him	 148.65084577562195
good. Where Pat Kinsella had his Harp theatre before Whitbred ran the	 217.4076030828213
Queen’s. Broth of a boy. Dion Boucicault business with his harvestmoon	 53.52786967656755

laughed spluttering, their drink against their breath. More power, Pat.	 209.3105805301478
Coarse red: fun for drunkards: guffaw and smoke. Take off that white	 109.80437612268213
hat. His parboiled eyes. Where is he now? Beggar somewhere. The harp	 74.11198174571989
that once did starve us all.	 125.62173921159508
I was happier then. Or was that I? Or am I now I? Twentyeight I was.	 71.68443300233221
She twentythree. When we left Lombard street west something changed.	 18.0258957514528
Could never like it again after Rudy. Can’t bring back time. Like	 227.26844299729078
holding water in your hand. Would you go back to then? Just beginning	 104.21725007606818

boy? Wants to sew on buttons for me. I must answer. Write it in the	 47.26359317576632
library.	 7643.670197145237

of plumb.	 19.14104210176948

brought that here. _La causa è santa!_ Tara tara. Great chorus that.	 63.02060454564116

the animals feed.	 167.3789235509063
Men, men, men.	 375.87868784570765

it. Chump chop from the grill. Bolting to get it over. Sad booser’s	 26.29334382958945
eyes. Bitten off more than he can chew. Am I like that? See ourselves	 70.48780147966143

he was eating. Something galoptious. Saint Patrick converted him to	 52.26465536300274
Christianity. Couldn’t swallow it all however.	 99.37779102210565
—Roast beef and cabbage.	 474.6629981104384
—One stew.	 83.20206568596824

of plug, spilt beer, men’s beery piss, the stale of ferment.	 29.90498420193323
His gorge rose.	 101.86149815167455

of course does that. Just a bite or two. Then about six o’clock I can.	 74.92083855101372

Mr Bloom walked behind the eyeless feet, a flatcut suit of herringbone	 26.937208536175095

say. Of course the other senses are more. Embroider. Plait baskets.	 43.7924053356165
People ought to help. Workbasket I could buy for Molly’s birthday.	 85.68802460281826

together. Each street different smell. Each person too. Then the	 178.2998164977136

your eyes shut or a cold in the head. Also smoke in the dark they say	 66.06362311435063
get no pleasure.	 738.9948279041698

school. I sentenced him to ten years. I suppose he’d turn up his nose	 84.17821434824806
at that stuff I drank. Vintage wine for them, the year marked on a	 91.87606937610816
dusty bottle. Has his own ideas of justice in the recorder’s court.	 115.34705424645118
Wellmeaning old man. Police chargesheets crammed with cases get their	 80.748074691144
percentage manufacturing crime. Sends them to the rightabout. The devil	 18.324902235778175
on moneylenders. Gave Reuben J a great strawcalling. Now he’s really	 87.73746219947779
what they call a dirty jew. Power those judges have. Crusty old topers	 73.4835632329866

soul.	 4899.512649922165

only to the poor of heart, the life of Homer’s Phæacians.	 61.32071153805461

died in Stratford that his namesake may live for ever.	 145.4796255563545

I wept alone.	 321.87234208642275

—Bosh! Stephen said rudely. A man of genius makes no mistakes. His	 46.16934029781588

—Dialectic, Stephen answered: and from his mother how to bring thoughts	 72.06518167789876
into the world. What he learnt from his other wife Myrto (_absit	 50.41152801027546

know. But neither the midwife’s lore nor the caudlelectures saved him	 93.23857323934656
from the archons of Sinn Fein and their naggin of hemlock.	 15.200666209232557
—But Ann Hathaway? Mr Best’s quiet voice said forgetfully. Yes, we seem	 131.82931060823137

chide them not unkindly, then to the baldpink lollard costard,	 22.76503991000889
guiltless though maligned.	 41.18729013113005
—He had a good groatsworth of wit, Stephen said, and no truant memory.	 50.450689690773885
He carried a memory in his wallet as he trudged to Romeville whistling	 44.352077445260605
_The girl I left behind me._ If the earthquake did not time it we	 112.97849295685805
should know where to place poor Wat, sitting in his form, the cry of	 149.41734931068714
hounds, the studded bridle and her blue windows. That memory, _Venus	 40.86260971961659
and Adonis_, lay in the bedchamber of every light-of-love in London. Is	 39.06074571995785
Katharine the shrew illfavoured? Hortensio calls her young and	 55.88795823506526
beautiful. Do you think the writer of _Antony and Cleopatra_, a	 27.57768022710226
passionate pilgrim, had his eyes in the back of his head that he chose	 42.671272484740406
the ugliest doxy in all Warwickshire to lie withal? Good: he left her	 50.650062372746795
and gained the world of men. But his boywomen are the women of a boy.	 54.22679102197932
Their life, thought, speech are lent them by males. He chose badly? He	 132.2645253664691
was chosen, it seems to me. If others have their will Ann hath a way.	 69.09464804028606
By cock, she was to blame. She put the comether on him, sweet and	 87.45230237277785
twentysix. The greyeyed goddess who bends over the boy Adonis, stooping	 18.772392434474863
to conquer, as prologue to the swelling act, is a boldfaced Stratford	 59.6420202120501
wench who tumbles in a cornfield a lover younger than herself.	 37.57669433942085
And my turn? When?	 109.64021698326032
Come!	 382.81606238906494

—I don’t know if I can. Thursday. We have our meeting. If I can get	 23.88400837775975
away in time.	 277.54765684491724
Yogibogeybox in Dawson chambers. _Isis Unveiled._ Their Pali book we	 38.15459893324935
tried to pawn. Crosslegged under an umbrel umbershoot he thrones an	 34.07085465657046
Aztec logos, functioning on astral levels, their oversoul, mahamahatma.	 10.118592209409144
The faithful hermetists await the light, ripe for chelaship,	 41.264354256361706
ringroundabout him. Louis H. Victory. T. Caulfield Irwin. Lotus ladies	 41.31133395988936
tend them i’the eyes, their pineal glands aglow. Filled with his god,	 57.60905317243655
he thrones, Buddh under plantain. Gulfer of souls, engulfer. Hesouls,	 19.465976914739173
shesouls, shoals of souls. Engulfed with wailing creecries, whirled,	 11.035418662149548
whirling, they bewail.	 18.22078634113026
In quintessential triviality	 14.2946225236903
For years in this fleshcase a shesoul dwelt.	 31.346867915228696
—They say we are to have a literary surprise, the quaker librarian	 43.97154023498847
said, friendly and earnest. Mr Russell, rumour has it, is gathering	 166.69805458701936
together a sheaf of our younger poets’ verses. We are all looking	 47.80225591942922
forward anxiously.	 129.9346476239801
Anxiously he glanced in the cone of lamplight where three faces,	 50.377361693509805
lighted, shone.	 941.2657262008945
See this. Remember.	 704.743571978626
Stephen looked down on a wide headless caubeen, hung on his	 34.4631080117315
ashplanthandle over his knee. My casque and sword. Touch lightly with	 64.66168220246453
two index fingers. Aristotle’s experiment. One or two? Necessity is	 47.042168340197314
that in virtue of which it is impossible that one can be otherwise.	 58.85610387867273
Argal, one hat is one hat.	 115.23941809878325
Listen.	 3666.581656814521
Young Colum and Starkey. George Roberts is doing the commercial part.	 77.49203055227638
Longworth will give it a good puff in the _Express._ O, will he? I	 81.72106066893751
liked Colum’s _Drover._ Yes, I think he has that queer thing genius. Do	 56.28041691707798
you think he has genius really? Yeats admired his line: _As in wild	 141.33191337206665
earth a Grecian vase_. Did he? I hope you’ll be able to come tonight.	 39.43369503963005
Malachi Mulligan is coming too. Moore asked him to bring Haines. Did	 106.0693542452186
you hear Miss Mitchell’s joke about Moore and Martyn? That Moore is	 79.05910273835528
Martyn’s wild oats? Awfully clever, isn’t it? They remind one of Don	 164.46328202801038
Quixote and Sancho Panza. Our national epic has yet to be written, Dr	 32.494940525109335
Sigerson says. Moore is the man for it. A knight of the rueful	 34.51989955408746
countenance here in Dublin. With a saffron kilt? O’Neill Russell? O,	 54.236600794090855
yes, he must speak the grand old tongue. And his Dulcinea? James	 124.98245612480139
Stephens is doing some clever sketches. We are becoming important, it	 195.1975147516345
seems.	 3047.473125135645
Cordelia. _Cordoglio._ Lir’s loneliest daughter.	 16.163308261855448
Nookshotten. Now your best French polish.	 66.77703926065722
—Thank you very much, Mr Russell, Stephen said, rising. If you will be	 37.92016135383562
so kind as to give the letter to Mr Norman...	 82.6389637718248
—O, yes. If he considers it important it will go in. We have so much	 75.17160419587246
correspondence.	 4.608171674364364
—I understand, Stephen said. Thanks.	 75.34485707634447
God ild you. The pigs’ paper. Bullockbefriending.	 62.32298257795193

read? I feel we are. The Gaelic league wants something in Irish. I hope	 92.6646094564215
you will come round tonight. Bring Starkey.	 123.6740794379541
Stephen sat down.	 55.38974920096471
The quaker librarian came from the leavetakers. Blushing, his mask	 26.376862430139973
said:	 674.7359038427248
—Mr Dedalus, your views are most illuminating.	 71.92806997419548
He creaked to and fro, tiptoing up nearer heaven by the altitude of a	 37.10837378344208
chopine, and, covered by the noise of outgoing, said low:	 60.316663797037265
—Is it your view, then, that she was not faithful to the poet?	 61.368219152956385
Alarmed face asks me. Why did he come? Courtesy or an inward light?	 50.53494992552117
—Where there is a reconciliation, Stephen said, there must have been	 27.898718553107493
first a sundering.	 82.03133244448047
—Yes.	 220.63927910459736
Christfox in leather trews, hiding, a runaway in blighted treeforks,	 32.396909002646986
from hue and cry. Knowing no vixen, walking lonely in the chase. Women	 94.03950544824461
he won to him, tender people, a whore of Babylon, ladies of justices,	 61.46081947664759
bully tapsters’ wives. Fox and geese. And in New Place a slack	 79.35033375109636
dishonoured body that once was comely, once as sweet, as fresh as	 138.69512928315606
cinnamon, now her leaves falling, all, bare, frighted of the narrow	 49.42355291037502
grave and unforgiven.	 81.95098213734077
—Yes. So you think...	 126.74842656952617
The door closed behind the outgoer.	 18.49203554844195
Rest suddenly possessed the discreet vaulted cell, rest of warm and	 58.94255587647652
brooding air.	 92.97261758676878
A vestal’s lamp.	 65.1534087415266
Here he ponders things that were not: what Cæsar would have lived to do	 94.24783730525495
had he believed the soothsayer: what might have been: possibilities of	 37.55300925920496
the possible as possible: things not known: what name Achilles bore	 178.58836582894514
when he lived among women.	 180.60676162774274
Coffined thoughts around me, in mummycases, embalmed in spice of words.	 40.577683941676746
Thoth, god of libraries, a birdgod, moonycrowned. And I heard the voice	 33.56106224692109
of that Egyptian highpriest. _In painted chambers loaded with	 32.0919640229807
tilebooks._	 4.608171674364364
They are still. Once quick in the brains of men. Still: but an itch of	 76.8226992594932
death is in them, to tell me in my ear a maudlin tale, urge me to wreak	 56.79474302698954
their will.	 410.2324135526378
—Certainly, John Eglinton mused, of all great men he is the most	 90.06404580588843
enigmatic. We know nothing but that he lived and suffered. Not even so	 56.42686584562494
much. Others abide our question. A shadow hangs over all the rest.	 155.85984647243697
—But _Hamlet_ is so personal, isn’t it? Mr Best pleaded. I mean, a kind	 52.52256919323326
of private paper, don’t you know, of his private life. I mean, I don’t	 79.25397100577169
care a button, don’t you know, who is killed or who is guilty...	 68.89360258117352
He rested an innocent book on the edge of the desk, smiling his	 62.59645922778798
defiance. His private papers in the original. _Ta an bad ar an tir.	 54.22704758720227
Taim in mo shagart_. Put beurla on it, littlejohn.	 52.33614421050444
Quoth littlejohn Eglinton:	 48.11353972971265
—I was prepared for paradoxes from what Malachi Mulligan told us but I	 37.621223830156985
may as well warn you that if you want to shake my belief that	 60.091154710063954
Shakespeare is Hamlet you have a stern task before you.	 64.51168572030656
Bear with me.	 288.4623491360184
Stephen withstood the bane of miscreant eyes glinting stern under	 19.092620389281002
wrinkled brows. A basilisk. _E quando vede l’uomo l’attosca_. Messer	 27.21367995525281
Brunetto, I thank thee for the word.	 34.896795910117596
—As we, or mother Dana, weave and unweave our bodies, Stephen said,	 80.2741797692499
from day to day, their molecules shuttled to and fro, so does the	 119.8721947460505
artist weave and unweave his image. And as the mole on my right breast	 88.81163513457726
is where it was when I was born, though all my body has been woven of	 65.8862487626008
new stuff time after time, so through the ghost of the unquiet father	 119.61140060664194
the image of the unliving son looks forth. In the intense instant of	 31.84326308712092
imagination, when the mind, Shelley says, is a fading coal, that which	 96.62225023705678
I was is that which I am and that which in possibility I may come to	 68.14515491174194
be. So in the future, the sister of the past, I may see myself as I sit	 83.45998166797106
here now but by reflection from that which then I shall be.	 110.45615457053239
Drummond of Hawthornden helped you at that stile.	 38.53892258899179
—Yes, Mr Best said youngly. I feel Hamlet quite young. The bitterness	 74.91830612824081
might be from the father but the passages with Ophelia are surely from	 61.99762935933704
the son.	 86.79687478911175
Has the wrong sow by the lug. He is in my father. I am in his son.	 57.70800907482094
—That mole is the last to go, Stephen said, laughing.	 81.9220517667915
John Eglinton made a nothing pleasing mow.	 65.41115816363782
—If that were the birthmark of genius, he said, genius would be a drug	 33.00104360582437
in the market. The plays of Shakespeare’s later years which Renan	 80.35095154510961
admired so much breathe another spirit.	 165.85992722442901
—The spirit of reconciliation, the quaker librarian breathed.	 31.893219681735317
—There can be no reconciliation, Stephen said, if there has not been a	 53.96832438783173
sundering.	 4.608171674364364
Said that.	 150.49247178546432
—If you want to know what are the events which cast their shadow over	 41.48996691784159
the hell of time of _King Lear, Othello, Hamlet, Troilus and Cressida,_	 40.163422773257274
look to see when and how the shadow lifts. What softens the heart of a	 104.51821773152922
man, shipwrecked in storms dire, Tried, like another Ulysses, Pericles,	 61.5742102668815
prince of Tyre?	 60.671471378275086
Head, redconecapped, buffeted, brineblinded.	 22.08337509391153
—A child, a girl, placed in his arms, Marina.	 43.40088790951927
—The leaning of sophists towards the bypaths of apocrypha is a constant	 17.36238199982954
quantity, John Eglinton detected. The highroads are dreary but they	 25.50422197293025
lead to the town.	 147.40971174319657
Good Bacon: gone musty. Shakespeare Bacon’s wild oats. Cypherjugglers	 95.31804451917202
going the highroads. Seekers on the great quest. What town, good	 73.56447459997257
masters? Mummed in names: A. E., eon: Magee, John Eglinton. East of the	 100.77415498619797
sun, west of the moon: _Tir na n-og_. Booted the twain and staved.	 36.491172713066284
How many miles to Dublin?	 111.22699471205769
Three score and ten, sir.	 160.43691260705432
Will we be there by candlelight?	 69.67718618400396
—Mr Brandes accepts it, Stephen said, as the first play of the closing	 49.01965432591614
period.	 16648.503073527976
—Does he? What does Mr Sidney Lee, or Mr Simon Lazarus as some aver his	 68.14885507182717
name is, say of it?	 132.82162867166133
—Marina, Stephen said, a child of storm, Miranda, a wonder, Perdita,	 44.304910788622884
that which was lost. What was lost is given back to him: his daughter’s	 90.10843995597311
child. _My dearest wife_, Pericles says, _was like this maid._ Will any	 244.5005353403407
man love the daughter if he has not loved the mother?	 108.76125144894392

grand_...	 5759.882060320137
—Will he not see reborn in her, with the memory of his own youth added,	 51.21816375968699
another image?	 270.98886718934074
Do you know what you are talking about? Love, yes. Word known to all	 32.054186927325304
men. _Amor vero aliquid alicui bonum vult unde et ea quae concupiscimus	 8.732924286071091
—His own image to a man with that queer thing genius is the standard of	 31.625038018828636
all experience, material and moral. Such an appeal will touch him. The	 75.72067108879511
images of other males of his blood will repel him. He will see in them	 100.31932700644265
grotesque attempts of nature to foretell or to repeat himself.	 31.38037815452968
The benign forehead of the quaker librarian enkindled rosily with hope.	 23.95330588152029
—I hope Mr Dedalus will work out his theory for the enlightenment of	 45.71925281658802
the public. And we ought to mention another Irish commentator, Mr	 56.300976921924686
George Bernard Shaw. Nor should we forget Mr Frank Harris. His articles	 106.4572320573445
on Shakespeare in the _Saturday Review_ were surely brilliant. Oddly	 118.786393575654
enough he too draws for us an unhappy relation with the dark lady of	 67.47661211364601
the sonnets. The favoured rival is William Herbert, earl of Pembroke. I	 35.82175630309595
own that if the poet must be rejected such a rejection would seem more	 101.35060664493221
in harmony with—what shall I say?—our notions of what ought not to have	 71.05636834022782
been.	 1585.694488617479
Felicitously he ceased and held a meek head among them, auk’s egg,	 58.723261632936016
prize of their fray.	 77.77333355779305
He thous and thees her with grave husbandwords. Dost love, Miriam? Dost	 33.8271131972439
love thy man?	 275.35050983480534
—That may be too, Stephen said. There’s a saying of Goethe’s which Mr	 57.69468814644399
Magee likes to quote. Beware of what you wish for in youth because you	 120.51396271909161
will get it in middle life. Why does he send to one who is a	 67.85801884886078
_buonaroba,_ a bay where all men ride, a maid of honour with a	 86.9527400077172
scandalous girlhood, a lordling to woo for him? He was himself a lord	 69.74158562958186
of language and had made himself a coistrel gentleman and he had	 67.06575378700872
written _Romeo and Juliet_. Why? Belief in himself has been untimely	 64.84620085403574
killed. He was overborne in a cornfield first (ryefield, I should say)	 53.006065830748064
and he will never be a victor in his own eyes after nor play	 51.053589309196155
victoriously the game of laugh and lie down. Assumed dongiovannism will	 74.77455427675953
not save him. No later undoing will undo the first undoing. The tusk of	 56.45513696114014
the boar has wounded him there where love lies ableeding. If the shrew	 79.77275608567228
is worsted yet there remains to her woman’s invisible weapon. There is,	 71.02732084779213
I feel in the words, some goad of the flesh driving him into a new	 56.12714253938366
passion, a darker shadow of the first, darkening even his own	 129.28510338806845
understanding of himself. A like fate awaits him and the two rages	 89.41236501704591
commingle in a whirlpool.	 8.941467320039383
They list. And in the porches of their ears I pour.	 49.36540184130666
—The soul has been before stricken mortally, a poison poured in the	 38.603340935885925
porch of a sleeping ear. But those who are done to death in sleep	 94.75213685054007
cannot know the manner of their quell unless their Creator endow their	 148.10828337636934
souls with that knowledge in the life to come. The poisoning and the	 50.22310505996163
beast with two backs that urged it King Hamlet’s ghost could not know	 144.04542840355867
of were he not endowed with knowledge by his creator. That is why the	 141.26241111014403
speech (his lean unlovely English) is always turned elsewhere,	 530.4741866760476
backward. Ravisher and ravished, what he would but would not, go with	 84.88833241259078
him from Lucrece’s bluecircled ivory globes to Imogen’s breast, bare,	 89.61326299538293
with its mole cinquespotted. He goes back, weary of the creation he has	 71.31969888466124
piled up to hide him from himself, an old dog licking an old sore. But,	 66.64909950410215
because loss is his gain, he passes on towards eternity in undiminished	 55.741027650923975
personality, untaught by the wisdom he has written or by the laws he	 30.153243140783324
has revealed. His beaver is up. He is a ghost, a shadow now, the wind	 90.54399265784775
by Elsinore’s rocks or what you will, the sea’s voice, a voice heard	 146.4494662107127
only in the heart of him who is the substance of his shadow, the son	 48.536382168396294
consubstantial with the father.	 33.650615227433306
—Amen! was responded from the doorway.	 75.276893067163
Hast thou found me, O mine enemy?	 146.62715216774342

They make him welcome. _Was Du verlachst wirst Du noch dienen._	 68.88941017383365
Brood of mockers: Photius, pseudomalachi, Johann Most.	 25.61938583410893
He Who Himself begot middler the Holy Ghost and Himself sent Himself,	 70.02232310198312
Agenbuyer, between Himself and others, Who, put upon by His fiends,	 88.35527960881475
stripped and whipped, was nailed like bat to barndoor, starved on	 24.12017261221908
crosstree, Who let Him bury, stood up, harrowed hell, fared into heaven	 80.47350914566445
and there these nineteen hundred years sitteth on the right hand of His	 65.4202828131413
Own Self but yet shall come in the latter day to doom the quick and	 67.38721208304143
dead when all the quick shall be dead already.	 86.39238193858374
[Illustration]	 4.608171674364364
He lifts his hands. Veils fall. O, flowers! Bells with bells with bells	 75.91858127086637
aquiring.	 4.608171674364364

He smiled on all sides equally.	 34.02866448679341

Vining held that the prince was a woman. Has no-one made him out to be	 56.699919880543824

hues.	 4.608171674364364
—For Willie Hughes, is it not? the quaker librarian asked.	 37.824875074848165
