inquirers are not up to the present congrued to render manifest)	 32.37768636451549
whereby maternity was so far from all accident possibility removed that	 68.97290210811815
whatever care the patient in that allhardest of woman hour chiefly	 118.09045389912606
required and not solely for the copiously opulent but also for her who	 48.62033347992083
not being sufficiently moneyed scarcely and often not even scarcely	 132.16334699216344
could subsist valiantly and for an inconsiderable emolument was	 41.78664865494518
provided.	 11448.636138514892
To her nothing already then and thenceforward was anyway able to be	 75.86951593015601
molestful for this chiefly felt all citizens except with proliferent	 86.68205849968973
mothers prosperity at all not to can be and as they had received	 98.76990667898092
eternity gods mortals generation to befit them her beholding, when the	 51.60408741694491
case was so hoving itself, parturient in vehicle thereward carrying	 89.18471004423043
desire immense among all one another was impelling on of her to be	 149.62639235998478
received into that domicile. O thing of prudent nation not merely in	 117.81081623244418
being seen but also even in being related worthy of being praised that	 119.19223666143677
they her by anticipation went seeing mother, that she by them suddenly	 354.09472285787604
to be about to be cherished had been begun she felt!	 42.78313633346535
Before born bliss babe had. Within womb won he worship. Whatever in	 332.43430694907096
that one case done commodiously done was. A couch by midwives attended	 202.9293881532694
with wholesome food reposeful, cleanest swaddles as though	 38.82997224819813
forthbringing were now done and by wise foresight set: but to this no	 176.18947301024227
less of what drugs there is need and surgical implements which are	 96.3037791206929
pertaining to her case not omitting aspect of all very distracting	 44.99462655253954
spectacles in various latitudes by our terrestrial orb offered together	 105.03545953853678
with images, divine and human, the cogitation of which by sejunct	 42.86636594208545
females is to tumescence conducive or eases issue in the high sunbright	 63.52424571774574
wellbuilt fair home of mothers when, ostensibly far gone and	 188.29449113089856
reproductitive, it is come by her thereto to lie in, her term up.	 53.36781303933917
Some man that wayfaring was stood by housedoor at night’s oncoming. Of	 48.38120287739004
Israel’s folk was that man that on earth wandering far had fared. Stark	 113.90030283955168
ruth of man his errand that him lone led till that house.	 135.05352643990807
Of that house A. Horne is lord. Seventy beds keeps he there teeming	 161.21629279979388
mothers are wont that they lie for to thole and bring forth bairns hale	 57.633028572872774
so God’s angel to Mary quoth. Watchers tway there walk, white sisters	 101.98167749665917
in ward sleepless. Smarts they still, sickness soothing: in twelve	 88.83816653671065
moons thrice an hundred. Truest bedthanes they twain are, for Horne	 78.75630848962669
holding wariest ward.	 661.5497585923205
In ward wary the watcher hearing come that man mildhearted eft rising	 136.9871404534088
with swire ywimpled to him her gate wide undid. Lo, levin leaping	 61.10746288918718
lightens in eyeblink Ireland’s westward welkin. Full she drad that God	 60.98475059518301
the Wreaker all mankind would fordo with water for his evil sins.	 50.48401689530842
Christ’s rood made she on breastbone and him drew that he would rathe	 94.55428101339001
infare under her thatch. That man her will wotting worthful went in	 67.07306572083567
Horne’s house.	 189.6331878601038
Loth to irk in Horne’s hall hat holding the seeker stood. On her stow	 24.317192361455625
he ere was living with dear wife and lovesome daughter that then over	 132.96975218144487
land and seafloor nine years had long outwandered. Once her in	 180.54708207685525
townhithe meeting he to her bow had not doffed. Her to forgive now he	 78.73760623578987
craved with good ground of her allowed that that of him swiftseen face,	 103.72220959041553
hers, so young then had looked. Light swift her eyes kindled, bloom of	 274.2041285298265
blushes his word winning.	 43.53487165965411
As her eyes then ongot his weeds swart therefor sorrow she feared. Glad	 126.5486775805419
after she was that ere adread was. Her he asked if O’Hare Doctor	 134.3780208537968
tidings sent from far coast and she with grameful sigh him answered	 182.12312632041295
that O’Hare Doctor in heaven was. Sad was the man that word to hear	 99.05585327847061
that him so heavied in bowels ruthful. All she there told him, ruing	 80.48339979957204
death for friend so young, algate sore unwilling God’s rightwiseness to	 170.7972603374374
withsay. She said that he had a fair sweet death through God His	 104.25236530775017
goodness with masspriest to be shriven, holy housel and sick men’s oil	 87.78414909202804
to his limbs. The man then right earnest asked the nun of which death	 100.19382256220742
the dead man was died and the nun answered him and said that he was	 53.248226286254976
died in Mona Island through bellycrab three year agone come Childermas	 118.8185023925498
and she prayed to God the Allruthful to have his dear soul in his	 64.57081636704328
undeathliness. He heard her sad words, in held hat sad staring. So	 166.3699671171882
stood they there both awhile in wanhope sorrowing one with other.	 152.35749060974902
Therefore, everyman, look to that last end that is thy death and the	 110.76839685715714
dust that gripeth on every man that is born of woman for as he came	 120.66175694353723
naked forth from his mother’s womb so naked shall he wend him at the	 116.89658853400348
last for to go as he came.	 119.42421312083846
The man that was come in to the house then spoke to the nursingwoman	 41.829743508914305
and he asked her how it fared with the woman that lay there in	 76.62128689236222
childbed. The nursingwoman answered him and said that that woman was in	 51.79560272700109
throes now full three days and that it would be a hard birth unneth to	 52.20257828423016
bear but that now in a little it would be. She said thereto that she	 84.60155986942145
had seen many births of women but never was none so hard as was that	 105.08559452911277
woman’s birth. Then she set it all forth to him for because she knew	 114.50426977440104
the man that time was had lived nigh that house. The man hearkened to	 59.45579804148314
her words for he felt with wonder women’s woe in the travail that they	 70.19181669956082
have of motherhood and he wondered to look on her face that was a fair	 35.81861529410545
face for any man to see but yet was she left after long years a	 177.30239277299768
handmaid. Nine twelve bloodflows chiding her childless.	 29.824727033257094
And whiles they spake the door of the castle was opened and there	 48.94720913185957
nighed them a mickle noise as of many that sat there at meat. And there	 89.27485446534429
came against the place as they stood a young learningknight yclept	 53.913042538505685
Dixon. And the traveller Leopold was couth to him sithen it had happed	 32.34096167793522
that they had had ado each with other in the house of misericord where	 60.54600813666293
this learningknight lay by cause the traveller Leopold came there to be	 96.9590744946337
healed for he was sore wounded in his breast by a spear wherewith a	 33.25326550444619
horrible and dreadful dragon was smitten him for which he did do make a	 82.49853179407508
salve of volatile salt and chrism as much as he might suffice. And he	 24.571864644081767
said now that he should go in to that castle for to make merry with	 83.79601703451205
them that were there. And the traveller Leopold said that he should go	 46.97928164263487
otherwhither for he was a man of cautels and a subtile. Also the lady	 33.04040142013905
was of his avis and repreved the learningknight though she trowed well	 35.572173032128624
that the traveller had said thing that was false for his subtility. But	 109.92155905204774
the learningknight would not hear say nay nor do her mandement ne have	 98.96732281899936
him in aught contrarious to his list and he said how it was a	 47.98771475238957
marvellous castle. And the traveller Leopold went into the castle for	 70.19389634925983
to rest him for a space being sore of limb after many marches	 88.18456955404925
environing in divers lands and sometime venery.	 25.127529559408316
And in the castle was set a board that was of the birchwood of Finlandy	 32.13633758691315
and it was upheld by four dwarfmen of that country but they durst not	 46.1742793801199
move more for enchantment. And on this board were frightful swords and	 87.27544526138544
knives that are made in a great cavern by swinking demons out of white	 31.518021911006723
flames that they fix then in the horns of buffalos and stags that there	 30.863243981238885
abound marvellously. And there were vessels that are wrought by magic	 21.48044831366369
of Mahound out of seasand and the air by a warlock with his breath that	 31.089506016846496
he blases in to them like to bubbles. And full fair cheer and rich was	 94.26051831332889
on the board that no wight could devise a fuller ne richer. And there	 52.10731530097827
was a vat of silver that was moved by craft to open in the which lay	 75.43750132302029
strange fishes withouten heads though misbelieving men nie that this be	 134.23235170507547
possible thing without they see it natheless they are so. And these	 127.64369606922384
fishes lie in an oily water brought there from Portugal land because of	 171.97413317981162
the fatness that therein is like to the juices of the olivepress. And	 17.936219711341593
also it was a marvel to see in that castle how by magic they make a	 51.045371343363676
compost out of fecund wheatkidneys out of Chaldee that by aid of	 19.800023712395838
certain angry spirits that they do in to it swells up wondrously like	 138.78624807750182
to a vast mountain. And they teach the serpents there to entwine	 78.33705211952085
themselves up on long sticks out of the ground and of the scales of	 29.288148069813982
these serpents they brew out a brewage like to mead.	 87.33686378677847
And the learning knight let pour for childe Leopold a draught and halp	 86.18977169788089
thereto the while all they that were there drank every each. And childe	 178.29615428908238
Leopold did up his beaver for to pleasure him and took apertly somewhat	 132.62049983695078
in amity for he never drank no manner of mead which he then put by and	 85.68034093497491
anon full privily he voided the more part in his neighbour glass and	 57.26363562211439
his neighbour nist not of this wile. And he sat down in that castle	 50.518834387694845
with them for to rest him there awhile. Thanked be Almighty God.	 234.65190934142447
This meanwhile this good sister stood by the door and begged them at	 106.53810214402509
the reverence of Jesu our alther liege Lord to leave their wassailing	 38.03094988367335
for there was above one quick with child, a gentle dame, whose time	 186.7118936132842
hied fast. Sir Leopold heard on the upfloor cry on high and he wondered	 56.783448705231855
what cry that it was whether of child or woman and I marvel, said he,	 139.17177012512275
that it be not come or now. Meseems it dureth overlong. And he was ware	 59.30024623989706
and saw a franklin that hight Lenehan on that side the table that was	 116.90994058059782
older than any of the tother and for that they both were knights	 44.908939986465214
virtuous in the one emprise and eke by cause that he was elder he spoke	 37.70359133931933
to him full gently. But, said he, or it be long too she will bring	 301.704770136679
forth by God His bounty and have joy of her childing for she hath	 63.35607181996406
waited marvellous long. And the franklin that had drunken said,	 147.66538796878277
Expecting each moment to be her next. Also he took the cup that stood	 83.57953204108152
tofore him for him needed never none asking nor desiring of him to	 69.76701246161028
drink and, Now drink, said he, fully delectably, and he quaffed as far	 64.48240639691338
as he might to their both’s health for he was a passing good man of his	 84.5645823449193
lustiness. And sir Leopold that was the goodliest guest that ever sat	 42.51686495480976
in scholars’ hall and that was the meekest man and the kindest that	 30.014306597514032
ever laid husbandly hand under hen and that was the very truest knight	 92.51474915116529
of the world one that ever did minion service to lady gentle pledged	 151.05639884979578
him courtly in the cup. Woman’s woe with wonder pondering.	 67.2983676720043
Now let us speak of that fellowship that was there to the intent to be	 33.6649531227736
drunken an they might. There was a sort of scholars along either side	 194.83238371482474
the board, that is to wit, Dixon yclept junior of saint Mary	 78.81703412086203
Merciable’s with other his fellows Lynch and Madden, scholars of	 130.8466089028808
medicine, and the franklin that hight Lenehan and one from Alba Longa,	 52.808936632473305
one Crotthers, and young Stephen that had mien of a frere that was at	 52.20285342430698
head of the board and Costello that men clepen Punch Costello all long	 136.53849707088062
of a mastery of him erewhile gested (and of all them, reserved young	 35.35323766881656
Stephen, he was the most drunken that demanded still of more mead) and	 70.19704703590482
beside the meek sir Leopold. But on young Malachi they waited for that	 218.43029386523727
he promised to have come and such as intended to no goodness said how	 78.11795060163415
he had broke his avow. And sir Leopold sat with them for he bore fast	 75.72661527766594
friendship to sir Simon and to this his son young Stephen and for that	 144.33122417784836
his languor becalmed him there after longest wanderings insomuch as	 33.50872863201411
they feasted him for that time in the honourablest manner. Ruth red	 48.27186868434409
him, love led on with will to wander, loth to leave.	 225.98933901888765
For they were right witty scholars. And he heard their aresouns each	 66.80834781344001
gen other as touching birth and righteousness, young Madden maintaining	 94.45824795478956
that put such case it were hard the wife to die (for so it had fallen	 185.47815026769015
out a matter of some year agone with a woman of Eblana in Horne’s house	 39.4207671861439
that now was trespassed out of this world and the self night next	 84.83282590527263
before her death all leeches and pothecaries had taken counsel of her	 54.94166641872862
case). And they said farther she should live because in the beginning,	 150.8293660500939
they said, the woman should bring forth in pain and wherefore they that	 110.9999317002696
were of this imagination affirmed how young Madden had said truth for	 116.52712823213838
he had conscience to let her die. And not few and of these was young	 85.97328993231244
Lynch were in doubt that the world was now right evil governed as it	 94.10467346539549
was never other howbeit the mean people believed it otherwise but the	 100.82779820466088
law nor his judges did provide no remedy. A redress God grant. This was	 125.38151417078036
scant said but all cried with one acclaim nay, by our Virgin Mother,	 144.87524082605444
the wife should live and the babe to die. In colour whereof they waxed	 63.36809010501317
hot upon that head what with argument and what for their drinking but	 216.44658942246616
the franklin Lenehan was prompt each when to pour them ale so that at	 141.60002544897287
the least way mirth might not lack. Then young Madden showed all the	 67.25033288027316
whole affair and said how that she was dead and how for holy religion	 85.56860003023336
sake by rede of palmer and bedesman and for a vow he had made to Saint	 58.18543768319955
Ultan of Arbraccan her goodman husband would not let her death whereby	 52.37793613255842
they were all wondrous grieved. To whom young Stephen had these words	 82.0157890807805
following: Murmur, sirs, is eke oft among lay folk. Both babe and	 109.00729013424373
parent now glorify their Maker, the one in limbo gloom, the other in	 65.44113119563208
purgefire. But, gramercy, what of those Godpossibled souls that we	 82.52508419146889
nightly impossibilise, which is the sin against the Holy Ghost, Very	 62.06945140204003
God, Lord and Giver of Life? For, sirs, he said, our lust is brief. We	 80.03837641924447
are means to those small creatures within us and nature has other ends	 156.40119879809242
than we. Then said Dixon junior to Punch Costello wist he what ends.	 181.4328693145061
But he had overmuch drunken and the best word he could have of him was	 82.43063769110938
that he would ever dishonest a woman whoso she were or wife or maid or	 44.58386844907879
leman if it so fortuned him to be delivered of his spleen of lustihead.	 29.34279035722488
Whereat Crotthers of Alba Longa sang young Malachi’s praise of that	 79.88629519813499
beast the unicorn how once in the millennium he cometh by his horn, the	 46.55751132634907
other all this while, pricked forward with their jibes wherewith they	 107.22605110919476
did malice him, witnessing all and several by saint Foutinus his	 104.32631472064487
engines that he was able to do any manner of thing that lay in man to	 52.00120129821914
do. Thereat laughed they all right jocundly only young Stephen and sir	 208.09491221530678
Leopold which never durst laugh too open by reason of a strange humour	 146.96896339237318
which he would not bewray and also for that he rued for her that bare	 53.97022761068663
whoso she might be or wheresoever. Then spake young Stephen orgulous of	 42.522129525964644
mother Church that would cast him out of her bosom, of law of canons,	 58.596082878021036
of Lilith, patron of abortions, of bigness wrought by wind of seeds of	 23.84894309574496
brightness or by potency of vampires mouth to mouth or, as Virgilius	 129.28462144334173
saith, by the influence of the occident or by the reek of moonflower or	 36.710438150057705
an she lie with a woman which her man has but lain with, _effectu	 174.7404458276798
secuto_, or peradventure in her bath according to the opinions of	 15.427487091262192
Averroes and Moses Maimonides. He said also how at the end of the	 36.20590501604036
second month a human soul was infused and how in all our holy mother	 79.59134460373042
foldeth ever souls for God’s greater glory whereas that earthly mother	 113.1804321563121
which was but a dam to bear beastly should die by canon for so saith he	 171.50329585161833
that holdeth the fisherman’s seal, even that blessed Peter on which	 95.20511180037403
rock was holy church for all ages founded. All they bachelors then	 119.34019714855395
asked of sir Leopold would he in like case so jeopard her person as	 123.77406226055501
risk life to save life. A wariness of mind he would answer as fitted	 82.08303668486234
all and, laying hand to jaw, he said dissembling, as his wont was, that	 90.86288225093625
as it was informed him, who had ever loved the art of physic as might a	 54.46665857260183
layman, and agreeing also with his experience of so seldomseen an	 59.955810013550476
accident it was good for that mother Church belike at one blow had	 119.35799299560455
birth and death pence and in such sort deliverly he scaped their	 90.15171727731881
questions. That is truth, pardy, said Dixon, and, or I err, a pregnant	 110.5328102866548
word. Which hearing young Stephen was a marvellous glad man and he	 94.4790590058398
averred that he who stealeth from the poor lendeth to the Lord for he	 36.97458827081053
was of a wild manner when he was drunken and that he was now in that	 58.114515838305564
taking it appeared eftsoons.	 114.87504002703906
But sir Leopold was passing grave maugre his word by cause he still had	 140.08552174157882
pity of the terrorcausing shrieking of shrill women in their labour and	 37.392364225482936
as he was minded of his good lady Marion that had borne him an only	 61.7347541563268
manchild which on his eleventh day on live had died and no man of art	 112.82045349206705
could save so dark is destiny. And she was wondrous stricken of heart	 114.20454648640724
for that evil hap and for his burial did him on a fair corselet of	 54.84353231615642
lamb’s wool, the flower of the flock, lest he might perish utterly and	 45.530394824980235
lie akeled (for it was then about the midst of the winter) and now sir	 54.29903926423135
Leopold that had of his body no manchild for an heir looked upon him	 70.35251037351722
his friend’s son and was shut up in sorrow for his forepassed happiness	 82.856022406953
and as sad as he was that him failed a son of such gentle courage (for	 46.80077895878428
all accounted him of real parts) so grieved he also in no less measure	 130.9216009920294
for young Stephen for that he lived riotously with those wastrels and	 60.22151067817397
murdered his goods with whores.	 439.10102693039306
About that present time young Stephen filled all cups that stood empty	 122.22360799376004
so as there remained but little mo if the prudenter had not shadowed	 87.63363694668708
their approach from him that still plied it very busily who, praying	 102.4721177309796
for the intentions of the sovereign pontiff, he gave them for a pledge	 23.540129634251382
the vicar of Christ which also as he said is vicar of Bray. Now drink	 43.52085730439987
we, quod he, of this mazer and quaff ye this mead which is not indeed	 82.19782462874039
parcel of my body but my soul’s bodiment. Leave ye fraction of bread to	 42.12149195827821
them that live by bread alone. Be not afeard neither for any want for	 203.64247426401556
this will comfort more than the other will dismay. See ye here. And he	 68.64814727786113
showed them glistering coins of the tribute and goldsmith notes the	 107.29348923594203
worth of two pound nineteen shilling that he had, he said, for a song	 94.47770229825821
which he writ. They all admired to see the foresaid riches in such	 54.903897954523416
dearth of money as was herebefore. His words were then these as	 126.28878111444766
followeth: Know all men, he said, time’s ruins build eternity’s	 34.39175270214052
mansions. What means this? Desire’s wind blasts the thorntree but after	 74.07316422669884
it becomes from a bramblebush to be a rose upon the rood of time. Mark	 61.941759266974586
me now. In woman’s womb word is made flesh but in the spirit of the	 118.15853109775962
maker all flesh that passes becomes the word that shall not pass away.	 84.19455436692454
This is the postcreation. _Omnis caro ad te veniet_. No question but	 25.889626103588544
her name is puissant who aventried the dear corse of our Agenbuyer,	 35.206132545227064
Healer and Herd, our mighty mother and mother most venerable and	 32.37651661931571
Bernardus saith aptly that She hath an _omnipotentiam deiparae	 38.25485360367622
supplicem_, that is to wit, an almightiness of petition because she is	 31.362646222104228
the second Eve and she won us, saith Augustine too, whereas that other,	 73.9203844601849
our grandam, which we are linked up with by successive anastomosis of	 37.150784463669254
navelcords sold us all, seed, breed and generation, for a penny pippin.	 25.986627924245127
But here is the matter now. Or she knew him, that second I say, and was	 129.90786867661706
but creature of her creature, _vergine madre, figlia di tuo figlio_, or	 43.303407624754534
she knew him not and then stands she in the one denial or ignorancy	 85.77918173717319
with Peter Piscator who lives in the house that Jack built and with	 75.83641437348753
Joseph the joiner patron of the happy demise of all unhappy marriages,	 29.303287058482482
_parceque M. Léo Taxil nous a dit que qui l’avait mise dans cette	 12.977640951312214
fichue position c’était le sacré pigeon, ventre de Dieu! Entweder_	 32.00509365284363
transubstantiality _oder_ consubstantiality but in no case	 43.07852791053877
subsubstantiality. And all cried out upon it for a very scurvy word. A	 75.32024717662601
pregnancy without joy, he said, a birth without pangs, a body without	 94.47559144353237
blemish, a belly without bigness. Let the lewd with faith and fervour	 43.619237471468054
worship. With will will we withstand, withsay.	 192.93992851442826
Hereupon Punch Costello dinged with his fist upon the board and would	 47.66368481232061
sing a bawdy catch _Staboo Stabella_ about a wench that was put in pod	 49.63667721261561
of a jolly swashbuckler in Almany which he did straightways now attack:	 42.56366690626399
_The first three months she was not well, Staboo,_ when here nurse	 131.10867119232006
Quigley from the door angerly bid them hist ye should shame you nor was	 69.6945267722863
it not meet as she remembered them being her mind was to have all	 158.86439151041833
orderly against lord Andrew came for because she was jealous that no	 91.93321367326912
gasteful turmoil might shorten the honour of her guard. It was an	 44.636897325171006
ancient and a sad matron of a sedate look and christian walking, in	 83.88513140757442
habit dun beseeming her megrims and wrinkled visage, nor did her	 77.08993405803746
hortative want of it effect for incontinently Punch Costello was of	 60.559511283826616
them all embraided and they reclaimed the churl with civil rudeness	 26.14570666144878
some and shaked him with menace of blandishments others whiles they all	 48.44016577356825
chode with him, a murrain seize the dolt, what a devil he would be at,	 35.998431630310236
thou chuff, thou puny, thou got in peasestraw, thou losel, thou	 89.23314650318466
chitterling, thou spawn of a rebel, thou dykedropt, thou abortion thou,	 36.88662907906987
to shut up his drunken drool out of that like a curse of God ape, the	 55.06718761157081
good sir Leopold that had for his cognisance the flower of quiet,	 70.40687527173019
margerain gentle, advising also the time’s occasion as most sacred and	 81.19968435623909
most worthy to be most sacred. In Horne’s house rest should reign.	 73.0785601159766
To be short this passage was scarce by when Master Dixon of Mary in	 176.27181146080608
Eccles, goodly grinning, asked young Stephen what was the reason why he	 141.814070662136
had not cided to take friar’s vows and he answered him obedience in the	 37.11473434496787
womb, chastity in the tomb but involuntary poverty all his days. Master	 64.11435833765742
Lenehan at this made return that he had heard of those nefarious deeds	 69.00146987246002
and how, as he heard hereof counted, he had besmirched the lily virtue	 57.24711461408296
of a confiding female which was corruption of minors and they all	 28.622996319167115
intershowed it too, waxing merry and toasting to his fathership. But he	 46.63442691082773
said very entirely it was clean contrary to their suppose for he was	 129.52877743658092
the eternal son and ever virgin. Thereat mirth grew in them the more	 192.62160854983816
and they rehearsed to him his curious rite of wedlock for the disrobing	 25.150821061467862
and deflowering of spouses, as the priests use in Madagascar island,	 52.20921933988235
she to be in guise of white and saffron, her groom in white and grain,	 33.24643344958345
with burning of nard and tapers, on a bridebed while clerks sung kyries	 19.83087293223058
and the anthem _Ut novetur sexus omnis corporis mysterium_ till she was	 19.02404143978065
there unmaided. He gave them then a much admirable hymen minim by those	 66.84658754897946
delicate poets Master John Fletcher and Master Francis Beaumont that is	 120.64363464376481
in their _Maid’s Tragedy_ that was writ for a like twining of lovers:	 64.44452577115868
_To bed, to bed_ was the burden of it to be played with accompanable	 58.236725943573745
concent upon the virginals. An exquisite dulcet epithalame of most	 36.46075098623055
mollificative suadency for juveniles amatory whom the odoriferous	 14.866555546425587
flambeaus of the paranymphs have escorted to the quadrupedal proscenium	 11.623108881798641
of connubial communion. Well met they were, said Master Dixon, joyed,	 96.68015400633097
but, harkee, young sir, better were they named Beau Mount and Lecher	 100.70583808288569
for, by my troth, of such a mingling much might come. Young Stephen	 158.5960510052877
said indeed to his best remembrance they had but the one doxy between	 108.0015285428874
them and she of the stews to make shift with in delights amorous for	 70.75683518660044
life ran very high in those days and the custom of the country approved	 60.68891379181946
with it. Greater love than this, he said, no man hath that a man lay	 113.72826265705196
down his wife for his friend. Go thou and do likewise. Thus, or words	 118.23835123159778
to that effect, saith Zarathustra, sometime regius professor of French	 100.27362573768501
letters to the university of Oxtail nor breathed there ever that man to	 105.39104010275396
whom mankind was more beholden. Bring a stranger within thy tower it	 207.1520567239667
will go hard but thou wilt have the secondbest bed. _Orate, fratres,	 111.5481924909927
pro memetipso_. And all the people shall say, Amen. Remember, Erin, thy	 99.32867685729742
generations and thy days of old, how thou settedst little by me and by	 163.8117201638413
my word and broughtedst in a stranger to my gates to commit fornication	 52.00359455666289
in my sight and to wax fat and kick like Jeshurum. Therefore hast thou	 186.40920018086703
sinned against my light and hast made me, thy lord, to be the slave of	 62.49272379850335
servants. Return, return, Clan Milly: forget me not, O Milesian. Why	 256.35708687769744
hast thou done this abomination before me that thou didst spurn me for	 108.69043439873406
a merchant of jalaps and didst deny me to the Roman and to the Indian	 33.29540033367077
of dark speech with whom thy daughters did lie luxuriously? Look forth	 152.88211489096125
now, my people, upon the land of behest, even from Horeb and from Nebo	 71.39988805594099
and from Pisgah and from the Horns of Hatten unto a land flowing with	 43.96163073493624
milk and money. But thou hast suckled me with a bitter milk: my moon	 103.41631717147511
and my sun thou hast quenched for ever. And thou hast left me alone for	 60.845308397124214
ever in the dark ways of my bitterness: and with a kiss of ashes hast	 62.07940977245253
thou kissed my mouth. This tenebrosity of the interior, he proceeded to	 52.59170418372177
say, hath not been illumined by the wit of the septuagint nor so much	 49.21954155998509
as mentioned for the Orient from on high which brake hell’s gates	 222.58849108239136
visited a darkness that was foraneous. Assuefaction minorates	 19.800633280481055
atrocities (as Tully saith of his darling Stoics) and Hamlet his father	 74.08852546629521
showeth the prince no blister of combustion. The adiaphane in the noon	 31.882625478126062
of life is an Egypt’s plague which in the nights of prenativity and	 40.38871806159949
postmortemity is their most proper _ubi_ and _quomodo_. And as the ends	 47.48204542631284
and ultimates of all things accord in some mean and measure with their	 49.26200658749263
inceptions and originals, that same multiplicit concordance which leads	 24.090836181781484
forth growth from birth accomplishing by a retrogressive metamorphosis	 44.976653158087345
that minishing and ablation towards the final which is agreeable unto	 24.731858522920465
nature so is it with our subsolar being. The aged sisters draw us into	 177.5536768647247
life: we wail, batten, sport, clip, clasp, sunder, dwindle, die: over	 107.28389411700282
us dead they bend. First, saved from waters of old Nile, among	 120.98591774566007
bulrushes, a bed of fasciated wattles: at last the cavity of a	 21.892700621027352
mountain, an occulted sepulchre amid the conclamation of the hillcat	 24.72861440366107
and the ossifrage. And as no man knows the ubicity of his tumulus nor	 36.071831271257025
to what processes we shall thereby be ushered nor whether to Tophet or	 78.72919343036693
to Edenville in the like way is all hidden when we would backward see	 94.06961460269706
from what region of remoteness the whatness of our whoness hath fetched	 46.876567972353776
his whenceness.	 21.605641423575047
Thereto Punch Costello roared out mainly _Etienne chanson_ but he	 23.706055171296722
loudly bid them, lo, wisdom hath built herself a house, this vast	 176.41054637024817
majestic longstablished vault, the crystal palace of the Creator, all	 20.58604415230683
in applepie order, a penny for him who finds the pea.	 42.45818234691138
Behold the mansion reared by dedal Jack	 57.45505961996838
See the malt stored in many a refluent sack,	 55.73799822773179
In the proud cirque of Jackjohn’s bivouac.	 14.530793213655192
A black crack of noise in the street here, alack, bawled back. Loud on	 74.1911545763513
left Thor thundered: in anger awful the hammerhurler. Came now the	 62.48016882323098
storm that hist his heart. And Master Lynch bade him have a care to	 103.96253025632957
flout and witwanton as the god self was angered for his hellprate and	 23.226699739446047
paganry. And he that had erst challenged to be so doughty waxed wan as	 26.586708048948697
they might all mark and shrank together and his pitch that was before	 66.49863124788415
so haught uplift was now of a sudden quite plucked down and his heart	 90.14065303712329
shook within the cage of his breast as he tasted the rumour of that	 27.826078861585408
storm. Then did some mock and some jeer and Punch Costello fell hard	 191.04874770655712
again to his yale which Master Lenehan vowed he would do after and he	 91.01780049041218
was indeed but a word and a blow on any the least colour. But the	 96.88895537934363
braggart boaster cried that an old Nobodaddy was in his cups it was	 39.55983315074097
muchwhat indifferent and he would not lag behind his lead. But this was	 37.20757581205875
only to dye his desperation as cowed he crouched in Horne’s hall. He	 34.326847480180646
drank indeed at one draught to pluck up a heart of any grace for it	 140.93058750724921
thundered long rumblingly over all the heavens so that Master Madden,	 107.24203896025533
being godly certain whiles, knocked him on his ribs upon that crack of	 156.54028660534766
doom and Master Bloom, at the braggart’s side, spoke to him calming	 43.59049944660793
words to slumber his great fear, advertising how it was no other thing	 98.45646598533439
but a hubbub noise that he heard, the discharge of fluid from the	 36.65135500497651
thunderhead, look you, having taken place, and all of the order of a	 71.69847774495257
natural phenomenon.	 995.694033684496
But was young Boasthard’s fear vanquished by Calmer’s words? No, for he	 149.15592516702023
had in his bosom a spike named Bitterness which could not by words be	 99.65274174002009
done away. And was he then neither calm like the one nor godly like the	 129.54647594252262
other? He was neither as much as he would have liked to be either. But	 54.58888906855724
could he not have endeavoured to have found again as in his youth the	 113.89046042174995
bottle Holiness that then he lived withal? Indeed no for Grace was not	 146.63344987190038
there to find that bottle. Heard he then in that clap the voice of the	 85.19172958378903
god Bringforth or, what Calmer said, a hubbub of Phenomenon? Heard?	 80.26481610422253
Why, he could not but hear unless he had plugged him up the tube	 51.577424202919694
Understanding (which he had not done). For through that tube he saw	 85.08299609830614
that he was in the land of Phenomenon where he must for a certain one	 46.02393597938625
day die as he was like the rest too a passing show. And would he not	 75.18013672492941
accept to die like the rest and pass away? By no means would he though	 159.03742980056117
he must nor would he make more shows according as men do with wives	 206.04795384839738
which Phenomenon has commanded them to do by the book Law. Then wotted	 99.92852333362873
he nought of that other land which is called Believe-on-Me, that is the	 96.98975561708828
land of promise which behoves to the king Delightful and shall be for	 54.70859791318552
ever where there is no death and no birth neither wiving nor mothering	 128.8399403198565
at which all shall come as many as believe on it? Yes, Pious had told	 149.94034028760154
him of that land and Chaste had pointed him to the way but the reason	 68.08679586677914
was that in the way he fell in with a certain whore of an eyepleasing	 34.956880293889206
exterior whose name, she said, is Bird-in-the-Hand and she beguiled him	 44.28840148773998
wrongways from the true path by her flatteries that she said to him as,	 39.32399931217404
Ho, you pretty man, turn aside hither and I will show you a brave	 109.00930364507903
place, and she lay at him so flatteringly that she had him in her grot	 53.69830899801266
which is named Two-in-the-Bush or, by some learned, Carnal	 75.18106715532366
Concupiscence.	 4.608171674364364
This was it what all that company that sat there at commons in Manse of	 96.265049632512
Mothers the most lusted after and if they met with this whore	 193.36639862988426
Bird-in-the-Hand (which was within all foul plagues, monsters and a	 36.029793144724664
wicked devil) they would strain the last but they would make at her and	 101.44049070100131
know her. For regarding Believe-on-Me they said it was nought else but	 47.87618266803788
notion and they could conceive no thought of it for, first,	 49.89591335828747
Two-in-the-Bush whither she ticed them was the very goodliest grot and	 23.61924782748672
in it were four pillows on which were four tickets with these words	 85.38852127298566
printed on them, Pickaback and Topsyturvy and Shameface and Cheek by	 37.47042136991509
Jowl and, second, for that foul plague Allpox and the monsters they	 45.08840003027019
cared not for them for Preservative had given them a stout shield of	 53.014157407314144
oxengut and, third, that they might take no hurt neither from Offspring	 78.24716712284973
that was that wicked devil by virtue of this same shield which was	 54.78238976119657
named Killchild. So were they all in their blind fancy, Mr Cavil and Mr	 101.74581061471258
Sometimes Godly, Mr Ape Swillale, Mr False Franklin, Mr Dainty Dixon,	 156.260627164959
Young Boasthard and Mr Cautious Calmer. Wherein, O wretched company,	 100.47281026911689
were ye all deceived for that was the voice of the god that was in a	 38.457920491785664
very grievous rage that he would presently lift his arm up and spill	 41.399213052973046
their souls for their abuses and their spillings done by them	 61.33993849546295
contrariwise to his word which forth to bring brenningly biddeth.	 54.56948782250846
So Thursday sixteenth June Patk. Dignam laid in clay of an apoplexy and	 90.20554523650972
after hard drought, please God, rained, a bargeman coming in by water a	 160.63930546179523
fifty mile or thereabout with turf saying the seed won’t sprout, fields	 245.98243352673614
athirst, very sadcoloured and stunk mightily, the quags and tofts too.	 17.491795527259594
Hard to breathe and all the young quicks clean consumed without	 112.45014080113411
sprinkle this long while back as no man remembered to be without. The	 147.15035286617908
rosy buds all gone brown and spread out blobs and on the hills nought	 73.44235616110507
but dry flag and faggots that would catch at first fire. All the world	 116.63382281566193
saying, for aught they knew, the big wind of last February a year that	 110.70818734085839
did havoc the land so pitifully a small thing beside this barrenness.	 87.77315687875043
But by and by, as said, this evening after sundown, the wind sitting in	 238.0021454171648
the west, biggish swollen clouds to be seen as the night increased and	 68.31349479725077
the weatherwise poring up at them and some sheet lightnings at first	 39.994259009355254
and after, past ten of the clock, one great stroke with a long thunder	 112.43982310067037
and in a brace of shakes all scamper pellmell within door for the	 41.31844705443402
smoking shower, the men making shelter for their straws with a clout or	 80.66164729057371
kerchief, womenfolk skipping off with kirtles catched up soon as the	 44.28813273692435
pour came. In Ely place, Baggot street, Duke’s lawn, thence through	 152.57572028941925
Merrion green up to Holles street a swash of water flowing that was	 93.32844852883115
before bonedry and not one chair or coach or fiacre seen about but no	 137.33952502704417
more crack after that first. Over against the Rt. Hon. Mr Justice	 102.8254910982166
Fitzgibbon’s door (that is to sit with Mr Healy the lawyer upon the	 44.2913528527356
college lands) Mal. Mulligan a gentleman’s gentleman that had but come	 128.87153253670147
from Mr Moore’s the writer’s (that was a papish but is now, folk say, a	 52.76116735143715
good Williamite) chanced against Alec. Bannon in a cut bob (which are	 148.69537833659965
now in with dance cloaks of Kendal green) that was new got to town from	 167.9475328145454
Mullingar with the stage where his coz and Mal M’s brother will stay a	 65.6716439047489
month yet till Saint Swithin and asks what in the earth he does there,	 121.48690400534747
he bound home and he to Andrew Horne’s being stayed for to crush a cup	 93.3087508148855
of wine, so he said, but would tell him of a skittish heifer, big of	 84.93969307969161
her age and beef to the heel, and all this while poured with rain and	 92.47634621579674
so both together on to Horne’s. There Leop. Bloom of Crawford’s journal	 243.84132856252072
sitting snug with a covey of wags, likely brangling fellows, Dixon	 85.22254464288716
jun., scholar of my lady of Mercy’s, Vin. Lynch, a Scots fellow, Will.	 39.92317375606699
Madden, T. Lenehan, very sad about a racer he fancied and Stephen D.	 117.47386381070656
Leop. Bloom there for a languor he had but was now better, he having	 114.59348686182847
dreamed tonight a strange fancy of his dame Mrs Moll with red slippers	 68.34693963271037
on in a pair of Turkey trunks which is thought by those in ken to be	 48.739802301249334
for a change and Mistress Purefoy there, that got in through pleading	 160.12646159939894
her belly, and now on the stools, poor body, two days past her term,	 53.54508979358785
the midwives sore put to it and can’t deliver, she queasy for a bowl of	 53.671369585536716
riceslop that is a shrewd drier up of the insides and her breath very	 24.742001175042063
heavy more than good and should be a bullyboy from the knocks, they	 74.63268976984394
say, but God give her soon issue. ’Tis her ninth chick to live, I hear,	 93.90320374134427
and Lady day bit off her last chick’s nails that was then a twelvemonth	 74.01273820618155
and with other three all breastfed that died written out in a fair hand	 82.23862049917518
in the king’s bible. Her hub fifty odd and a methodist but takes the	 65.66427300419969
sacrament and is to be seen any fair sabbath with a pair of his boys	 73.83576687124392
off Bullock harbour dapping on the sound with a heavybraked reel or in	 54.68587534973175
a punt he has trailing for flounder and pollock and catches a fine bag,	 32.26342399863224
I hear. In sum an infinite great fall of rain and all refreshed and	 112.20947989973892
will much increase the harvest yet those in ken say after wind and	 173.51134791440654
water fire shall come for a prognostication of Malachi’s almanac (and I	 51.35074550936055
hear that Mr Russell has done a prophetical charm of the same gist out	 76.57409815744904
of the Hindustanish for his farmer’s gazette) to have three things in	 52.46112061935784
all but this a mere fetch without bottom of reason for old crones and	 78.48376063317079
bairns yet sometimes they are found in the right guess with their	 43.70325642133243
queerities no telling how.	 258.79382516452165
With this came up Lenehan to the feet of the table to say how the	 93.4435462206099
letter was in that night’s gazette and he made a show to find it about	 109.6842654022343
him (for he swore with an oath that he had been at pains about it) but	 50.05799671272069
on Stephen’s persuasion he gave over the search and was bidden to sit	 88.55397752350748
near by which he did mighty brisk. He was a kind of sport gentleman	 72.75662186447629
that went for a merryandrew or honest pickle and what belonged of	 42.12324787692406
women, horseflesh or hot scandal he had it pat. To tell the truth he	 90.92906760206773
was mean in fortunes and for the most part hankered about the	 75.1025128488525
coffeehouses and low taverns with crimps, ostlers, bookies, Paul’s men,	 20.38439921636355
runners, flatcaps, waistcoateers, ladies of the bagnio and other rogues	 15.960029924843926
of the game or with a chanceable catchpole or a tipstaff often at	 56.19103606818538
nights till broad day of whom he picked up between his sackpossets much	 222.84021276570388
loose gossip. He took his ordinary at a boilingcook’s and if he had but	 67.81324489949598
gotten into him a mess of broken victuals or a platter of tripes with a	 25.924640745820522
bare tester in his purse he could always bring himself off with his	 108.94045149170145
tongue, some randy quip he had from a punk or whatnot that every	 48.47386433007338
mother’s son of them would burst their sides. The other, Costello that	 96.27205169567253
is, hearing this talk asked was it poetry or a tale. Faith, no, he	 191.08376513967028
says, Frank (that was his name), ’tis all about Kerry cows that are to	 113.90409791205126
be butchered along of the plague. But they can go hang, says he with a	 86.20575300020181
wink, for me with their bully beef, a pox on it. There’s as good fish	 69.64692545503524
in this tin as ever came out of it and very friendly he offered to take	 78.22933038029201
of some salty sprats that stood by which he had eyed wishly in the	 31.368212901025753
meantime and found the place which was indeed the chief design of his	 42.37456843540472
embassy as he was sharpset. _Mort aux vaches_, says Frank then in the	 19.023206976888737
French language that had been indentured to a brandyshipper that has a	 50.44461651854898
winelodge in Bordeaux and he spoke French like a gentleman too. From a	 61.97640144472397
child this Frank had been a donought that his father, a headborough,	 67.16458816138162
who could ill keep him to school to learn his letters and the use of	 72.16731740415025
the globes, matriculated at the university to study the mechanics but	 34.3907520638485
he took the bit between his teeth like a raw colt and was more familiar	 62.70705090043184
with the justiciary and the parish beadle than with his volumes. One	 25.275774558708317
time he would be a playactor, then a sutler or a welsher, then nought	 37.53605390887022
would keep him from the bearpit and the cocking main, then he was for	 39.17743897746926
the ocean sea or to hoof it on the roads with the romany folk,	 48.2646166927263
kidnapping a squire’s heir by favour of moonlight or fecking maids’	 44.44199715534328
linen or choking chicken behind a hedge. He had been off as many times	 55.3699932073635
as a cat has lives and back again with naked pockets as many more to	 174.1599295057474
his father the headborough who shed a pint of tears as often as he saw	 68.6716528735324
him. What, says Mr Leopold with his hands across, that was earnest to	 100.29003786428932
know the drift of it, will they slaughter all? I protest I saw them but	 54.90419672814523
this day morning going to the Liverpool boats, says he. I can scarce	 46.43002685989999
believe ’tis so bad, says he. And he had experience of the like brood	 47.646009006564654
beasts and of springers, greasy hoggets and wether wool, having been	 94.15250850188795
some years before actuary for Mr Joseph Cuffe, a worthy salesmaster	 116.74310941544883
that drove his trade for live stock and meadow auctions hard by Mr	 109.16221642247625
Gavin Low’s yard in Prussia street. I question with you there, says he.	 69.10788299202625
More like ’tis the hoose or the timber tongue. Mr Stephen, a little	 109.63070616853281
moved but very handsomely told him no such matter and that he had	 106.74137961942175
dispatches from the emperor’s chief tailtickler thanking him for the	 19.71135736086329
hospitality, that was sending over Doctor Rinderpest, the bestquoted	 39.72762851996181
cowcatcher in all Muscovy, with a bolus or two of physic to take the	 21.721910765985218
bull by the horns. Come, come, says Mr Vincent, plain dealing. He’ll	 101.58449325139856
find himself on the horns of a dilemma if he meddles with a bull that’s	 67.9087541650215
Irish, says he. Irish by name and irish by nature, says Mr Stephen, and	 283.5758470229196
he sent the ale purling about, an Irish bull in an English chinashop. I	 129.89671314531404
conceive you, says Mr Dixon. It is that same bull that was sent to our	 55.0859046008505
island by farmer Nicholas, the bravest cattlebreeder of them all, with	 33.46102161680719
an emerald ring in his nose. True for you, says Mr Vincent cross the	 50.631250117701015
table, and a bullseye into the bargain, says he, and a plumper and a	 45.17368462859653
portlier bull, says he, never shit on shamrock. He had horns galore, a	 46.71184117740606
coat of cloth of gold and a sweet smoky breath coming out of his	 57.72682273812856
nostrils so that the women of our island, leaving doughballs and	 56.968138267895725
rollingpins, followed after him hanging his bulliness in daisychains.	 60.67423066879191
What for that, says Mr Dixon, but before he came over farmer Nicholas	 58.79068413040598
that was a eunuch had him properly gelded by a college of doctors who	 93.79244821205644
were no better off than himself. So be off now, says he, and do all my	 162.7948710065848
cousin german the lord Harry tells you and take a farmer’s blessing,	 72.0895164296502
and with that he slapped his posteriors very soundly. But the slap and	 43.328125094103434
the blessing stood him friend, says Mr Vincent, for to make up he	 140.0079608459156
taught him a trick worth two of the other so that maid, wife, abbess	 93.48707643614433
and widow to this day affirm that they would rather any time of the	 63.39637860400915
month whisper in his ear in the dark of a cowhouse or get a lick on the	 65.04075024952225
nape from his long holy tongue than lie with the finest strapping young	 78.36897414193555
ravisher in the four fields of all Ireland. Another then put in his	 57.830600698235735
word: And they dressed him, says he, in a point shift and petticoat	 84.27790563403703
with a tippet and girdle and ruffles on his wrists and clipped his	 11.020983728606632
forelock and rubbed him all over with spermacetic oil and built stables	 54.60247997992149
for him at every turn of the road with a gold manger in each full of	 101.91519101527193
the best hay in the market so that he could doss and dung to his	 35.45003676202844
heart’s content. By this time the father of the faithful (for so they	 51.75101851057227
called him) was grown so heavy that he could scarce walk to pasture. To	 72.60906872109034
remedy which our cozening dames and damsels brought him his fodder in	 70.18258042559758
their apronlaps and as soon as his belly was full he would rear up on	 67.92641310154195
his hind quarters to show their ladyships a mystery and roar and bellow	 42.32359165127789
out of him in bulls’ language and they all after him. Ay, says another,	 88.8104244022687
and so pampered was he that he would suffer nought to grow in all the	 55.155188845722506
land but green grass for himself (for that was the only colour to his	 83.93819022237166
mind) and there was a board put up on a hillock in the middle of the	 31.041926224429762
island with a printed notice, saying: By the Lord Harry, Green is the	 120.04568779137679
grass that grows on the ground. And, says Mr Dixon, if ever he got	 70.12276687460246
scent of a cattleraider in Roscommon or the wilds of Connemara or a	 19.770032248057124
husbandman in Sligo that was sowing as much as a handful of mustard or	 23.467007444028816
a bag of rapeseed out he’d run amok over half the countryside rooting	 58.36364090900488
up with his horns whatever was planted and all by lord Harry’s orders.	 124.46138250024258
There was bad blood between them at first, says Mr Vincent, and the	 48.15039896871435
lord Harry called farmer Nicholas all the old Nicks in the world and an	 43.15675810421839
old whoremaster that kept seven trulls in his house and I’ll meddle in	 58.717558955455424
his matters, says he. I’ll make that animal smell hell, says he, with	 57.33464852289397
the help of that good pizzle my father left me. But one evening, says	 84.40528027613618
Mr Dixon, when the lord Harry was cleaning his royal pelt to go to	 57.04371843098957
dinner after winning a boatrace (he had spade oars for himself but the	 42.499590842444526
first rule of the course was that the others were to row with	 90.01401432278398
pitchforks) he discovered in himself a wonderful likeness to a bull and	 50.47599300679313
on picking up a blackthumbed chapbook that he kept in the pantry he	 36.99363777127756
found sure enough that he was a lefthanded descendant of the famous	 42.98204387144028
champion bull of the Romans, _Bos Bovum_, which is good bog Latin for	 42.79682325959371
boss of the show. After that, says Mr Vincent, the lord Harry put his	 59.035803091332824
head into a cow’s drinkingtrough in the presence of all his courtiers	 26.86302239259006
and pulling it out again told them all his new name. Then, with the	 85.81226395811849
water running off him, he got into an old smock and skirt that had	 81.517768500412
belonged to his grandmother and bought a grammar of the bulls’ language	 21.969351253404028
to study but he could never learn a word of it except the first	 65.31882828122393
personal pronoun which he copied out big and got off by heart and if	 95.08111596197693
ever he went out for a walk he filled his pockets with chalk to write	 72.92614197605486
it upon what took his fancy, the side of a rock or a teahouse table or	 147.93245340541552
a bale of cotton or a corkfloat. In short, he and the bull of Ireland	 33.76231410935126
were soon as fast friends as an arse and a shirt. They were, says Mr	 133.760227868247
Stephen, and the end was that the men of the island seeing no help was	 101.81488763021898
toward, as the ungrate women were all of one mind, made a wherry raft,	 44.82436644297474
loaded themselves and their bundles of chattels on shipboard, set all	 49.393787519718686
masts erect, manned the yards, sprang their luff, heaved to, spread	 48.95436538297643
three sheets in the wind, put her head between wind and water, weighed	 72.22606225376079
anchor, ported her helm, ran up the jolly Roger, gave three times	 65.77608349049618
three, let the bullgine run, pushed off in their bumboat and put to sea	 182.06013745673548
to recover the main of America. Which was the occasion, says Mr	 76.93025840199208
Vincent, of the composing by a boatswain of that rollicking chanty:	 31.234667007693492
_—Pope Peter’s but a pissabed.	 12.99502959932421
A man’s a man for a’ that._	 79.38940582081848
Our worthy acquaintance Mr Malachi Mulligan now appeared in the doorway	 40.46807447695286
as the students were finishing their apologue accompanied with a friend	 50.2866640017493
whom he had just rencountered, a young gentleman, his name Alec Bannon,	 88.2097895912025
who had late come to town, it being his intention to buy a colour or a	 70.30416771058539
cornetcy in the fencibles and list for the wars. Mr Mulligan was civil	 35.971251927506444
enough to express some relish of it all the more as it jumped with a	 61.96236080923376
project of his own for the cure of the very evil that had been touched	 89.34129633105908
on. Whereat he handed round to the company a set of pasteboard cards	 44.36693914567736
which he had had printed that day at Mr Quinnell’s bearing a legend	 91.72774002412444
printed in fair italics: _Mr Malachi Mulligan. Fertiliser and	 51.009168634526226
Incubator. Lambay Island_. His project, as he went on to expound, was	 34.98092499317653
to withdraw from the round of idle pleasures such as form the chief	 100.88433984143998
business of sir Fopling Popinjay and sir Milksop Quidnunc in town and	 59.84361732090252
to devote himself to the noblest task for which our bodily organism has	 27.36970287372002
been framed. Well, let us hear of it, good my friend, said Mr Dixon. I	 80.26766248258458
make no doubt it smacks of wenching. Come, be seated, both. ’Tis as	 165.1633711834511
cheap sitting as standing. Mr Mulligan accepted of the invitation and,	 65.52050623432972
expatiating upon his design, told his hearers that he had been led into	 35.24159694507207
this thought by a consideration of the causes of sterility, both the	 60.972509275787196
inhibitory and the prohibitory, whether the inhibition in its turn were	 41.53683664722848
due to conjugal vexations or to a parsimony of the balance as well as	 32.65504460522272
whether the prohibition proceeded from defects congenital or from	 34.91213884702343
proclivities acquired. It grieved him plaguily, he said, to see the	 20.581127280753254
nuptial couch defrauded of its dearest pledges: and to reflect upon so	 69.31324840611838
many agreeable females with rich jointures, a prey to the vilest	 63.466810136436116
bonzes, who hide their flambeau under a bushel in an uncongenial	 30.44221342377944
cloister or lose their womanly bloom in the embraces of some	 52.02327496697825
unaccountable muskin when they might multiply the inlets of happiness,	 21.842327696179396
sacrificing the inestimable jewel of their sex when a hundred pretty	 46.22706197928539
fellows were at hand to caress, this, he assured them, made his heart	 107.39975277503318
weep. To curb this inconvenient (which he concluded due to a	 43.93063596214108
suppression of latent heat), having advised with certain counsellors of	 43.4390714913298
worth and inspected into this matter, he had resolved to purchase in	 92.04869951743139
fee simple for ever the freehold of Lambay island from its holder, lord	 50.530554921721986
Talbot de Malahide, a Tory gentleman of note much in favour with our	 162.30819844046104
ascendancy party. He proposed to set up there a national fertilising	 71.4085411894808
farm to be named _Omphalos_ with an obelisk hewn and erected after the	 33.205058905034804
fashion of Egypt and to offer his dutiful yeoman services for the	 56.417920217791384
fecundation of any female of what grade of life soever who should there	 67.16378492282196
direct to him with the desire of fulfilling the functions of her	 19.989445975829653
natural. Money was no object, he said, nor would he take a penny for	 81.25520380524245
his pains. The poorest kitchenwench no less than the opulent lady of	 92.75462305446278
fashion, if so be their constructions and their tempers were warm	 118.28810741930948
persuaders for their petitions, would find in him their man. For his	 88.42946151837361
nutriment he shewed how he would feed himself exclusively upon a diet	 47.24464849563714
of savoury tubercles and fish and coneys there, the flesh of these	 44.597091142060954
latter prolific rodents being highly recommended for his purpose, both	 31.401619473036174
broiled and stewed with a blade of mace and a pod or two of capsicum	 13.602610646415735
chillies. After this homily which he delivered with much warmth of	 38.12020563320326
asseveration Mr Mulligan in a trice put off from his hat a kerchief	 63.6934053242314
with which he had shielded it. They both, it seems, had been overtaken	 61.466186769879585
by the rain and for all their mending their pace had taken water, as	 93.4279754001743
might be observed by Mr Mulligan’s smallclothes of a hodden grey which	 44.676619589171125
was now somewhat piebald. His project meanwhile was very favourably	 73.88227470085783
entertained by his auditors and won hearty eulogies from all though Mr	 46.46783603821632
Dixon of Mary’s excepted to it, asking with a finicking air did he	 82.99436451713113
purpose also to carry coals to Newcastle. Mr Mulligan however made	 169.37190103892726
court to the scholarly by an apt quotation from the classics which, as	 33.534063022965015
it dwelt upon his memory, seemed to him a sound and tasteful support of	 40.18501499950989
his contention: _Talis ac tanta depravatio hujus seculi, O quirites, ut	 17.593334705760547
matresfamiliarum nostrae lascivas cujuslibet semiviri libici	 3.857285642109819
titillationes testibus ponderosis atque excelsis erectionibus	 3.857285642109819
centurionum Romanorum magnopere anteponunt_, while for those of ruder	 26.087617388220533
wit he drove home his point by analogies of the animal kingdom more	 156.5169419169971
suitable to their stomach, the buck and doe of the forest glade, the	 42.17875399868428
farmyard drake and duck.	 29.38772608903704
Valuing himself not a little upon his elegance, being indeed a proper	 135.6166609156966
man of person, this talkative now applied himself to his dress with	 106.24891991385272
animadversions of some heat upon the sudden whimsy of the atmospherics	 28.95139274376537
while the company lavished their encomiums upon the project he had	 85.6377676374244
advanced. The young gentleman, his friend, overjoyed as he was at a	 63.88724454946603
passage that had late befallen him, could not forbear to tell it his	 102.23943277500638
nearest neighbour. Mr Mulligan, now perceiving the table, asked for	 120.58918352540553
whom were those loaves and fishes and, seeing the stranger, he made him	 85.07427925129446
a civil bow and said, Pray, sir, was you in need of any professional	 123.20305391535771
assistance we could give? Who, upon his offer, thanked him very	 128.75184316449045
heartily, though preserving his proper distance, and replied that he	 179.59793942042774
was come there about a lady, now an inmate of Horne’s house, that was	 89.28595607336351
in an interesting condition, poor body, from woman’s woe (and here he	 145.52725299237457
fetched a deep sigh) to know if her happiness had yet taken place. Mr	 123.30503336178067
Dixon, to turn the table, took on to ask of Mr Mulligan himself whether	 236.74913652416222
his incipient ventripotence, upon which he rallied him, betokened an	 32.789158190528205
ovoblastic gestation in the prostatic utricle or male womb or was due,	 24.59843036029485
as with the noted physician, Mr Austin Meldon, to a wolf in the	 22.86705947837505
stomach. For answer Mr Mulligan, in a gale of laughter at his smalls,	 73.15645411989993
smote himself bravely below the diaphragm, exclaiming with an admirable	 25.07904903855913
droll mimic of Mother Grogan (the most excellent creature of her sex	 34.71340046817562
though ’tis pity she’s a trollop): There’s a belly that never bore a	 117.54862325178422
bastard. This was so happy a conceit that it renewed the storm of mirth	 100.71673431925561
and threw the whole room into the most violent agitations of delight.	 47.46326046658241
The spry rattle had run on in the same vein of mimicry but for some	 50.41973234409541
larum in the antechamber.	 6.2586885757549
Here the listener who was none other than the Scotch student, a little	 117.92496567971241
fume of a fellow, blond as tow, congratulated in the liveliest fashion	 32.09309371051768
with the young gentleman and, interrupting the narrative at a salient	 24.641890669479025
point, having desired his visavis with a polite beck to have the	 38.59144316106781
obligingness to pass him a flagon of cordial waters at the same time by	 35.79992910774131
a questioning poise of the head (a whole century of polite breeding had	 25.635378188161727
not achieved so nice a gesture) to which was united an equivalent but	 134.41065089720686
contrary balance of the bottle asked the narrator as plainly as was	 67.47352516811436
ever done in words if he might treat him with a cup of it. _Mais bien	 34.11864644451517
sûr_, noble stranger, said he cheerily, _et mille compliments_. That	 72.37120050856316
you may and very opportunely. There wanted nothing but this cup to	 175.52868837765627
crown my felicity. But, gracious heaven, was I left with but a crust in	 108.93918073635925
my wallet and a cupful of water from the well, my God, I would accept	 57.65317642420544
of them and find it in my heart to kneel down upon the ground and give	 49.37751406665803
thanks to the powers above for the happiness vouchsafed me by the Giver	 64.3199280776781
of good things. With these words he approached the goblet to his lips,	 70.71595349947633
took a complacent draught of the cordial, slicked his hair and, opening	 59.093503206298394
his bosom, out popped a locket that hung from a silk riband, that very	 96.97648578562136
picture which he had cherished ever since her hand had wrote therein.	 90.2835431726658
Gazing upon those features with a world of tenderness, Ah, Monsieur, he	 121.68126517007413
said, had you but beheld her as I did with these eyes at that affecting	 152.18594484752632
instant with her dainty tucker and her new coquette cap (a gift for her	 68.38219902546403
feastday as she told me prettily) in such an artless disorder, of so	 30.438438465232373
melting a tenderness, ’pon my conscience, even you, Monsieur, had been	 157.64968136283065
impelled by generous nature to deliver yourself wholly into the hands	 70.85970673098383
of such an enemy or to quit the field for ever. I declare, I was never	 65.57304273242993
so touched in all my life. God, I thank thee, as the Author of my days!	 76.06257098907821
Thrice happy will he be whom so amiable a creature will bless with her	 136.10318111290573
favours. A sigh of affection gave eloquence to these words and, having	 72.64656889729655
replaced the locket in his bosom, he wiped his eye and sighed again.	 34.32678688425839
Beneficent Disseminator of blessings to all Thy creatures, how great	 51.52835203232832
and universal must be that sweetest of Thy tyrannies which can hold in	 72.4740805562781
thrall the free and the bond, the simple swain and the polished	 41.454929674826346
coxcomb, the lover in the heyday of reckless passion and the husband of	 34.41606897813466
maturer years. But indeed, sir, I wander from the point. How mingled	 172.48682763644672
and imperfect are all our sublunary joys. Maledicity! he exclaimed in	 24.992683388213507
anguish. Would to God that foresight had but remembered me to take my	 64.56235892149522
cloak along! I could weep to think of it. Then, though it had poured	 93.12306031922238
seven showers, we were neither of us a penny the worse. But beshrew me,	 125.1146956778438
he cried, clapping hand to his forehead, tomorrow will be a new day	 35.15378385579815
and, thousand thunders, I know of a _marchand de capotes_, Monsieur	 83.03024728525385
Poyntz, from whom I can have for a _livre_ as snug a cloak of the	 44.65079654340487
French fashion as ever kept a lady from wetting. Tut, tut! cries Le	 78.67637704752036
Fécondateur, tripping in, my friend Monsieur Moore, that most	 26.077313580128955
accomplished traveller (I have just cracked a half bottle _avec lui_ in	 35.28742153701353
a circle of the best wits of the town), is my authority that in Cape	 46.870829429752554
Horn, _ventre biche_, they have a rain that will wet through any, even	 153.70025518023442
the stoutest cloak. A drenching of that violence, he tells me, _sans	 22.117946544518155
blague_, has sent more than one luckless fellow in good earnest	 97.87834335537129
posthaste to another world. Pooh! A _livre!_ cries Monsieur Lynch. The	 75.66336209932095
clumsy things are dear at a sou. One umbrella, were it no bigger than a	 111.39675295122309
fairy mushroom, is worth ten such stopgaps. No woman of any wit would	 115.61360751637895
wear one. My dear Kitty told me today that she would dance in a deluge	 81.22617812665419
before ever she would starve in such an ark of salvation for, as she	 56.97698534117743
reminded me (blushing piquantly and whispering in my ear though there	 69.14576171150117
was none to snap her words but giddy butterflies), dame Nature, by the	 122.66217646088464
divine blessing, has implanted it in our hearts and it has become a	 68.34806605731698
household word that _il y a deux choses_ for which the innocence of our	 64.81367065668181
original garb, in other circumstances a breach of the proprieties, is	 64.32385193421807
the fittest, nay, the only garment. The first, said she (and here my	 103.56901028240725
pretty philosopher, as I handed her to her tilbury, to fix my	 73.18273883675346
attention, gently tipped with her tongue the outer chamber of my ear),	 163.0434648335793
the first is a bath... But at this point a bell tinkling in the hall	 94.42117255899815
cut short a discourse which promised so bravely for the enrichment of	 75.4778148794471
our store of knowledge.	 79.6888817680545
Amid the general vacant hilarity of the assembly a bell rang and, while	 47.44731134872612
all were conjecturing what might be the cause, Miss Callan entered and,	 80.03409490022709
having spoken a few words in a low tone to young Mr Dixon, retired with	 91.55714189914875
a profound bow to the company. The presence even for a moment among a	 61.520660296339784
party of debauchees of a woman endued with every quality of modesty and	 29.413466255490516
not less severe than beautiful refrained the humourous sallies even of	 55.62273714004547
the most licentious but her departure was the signal for an outbreak of	 39.916664131518104
ribaldry. Strike me silly, said Costello, a low fellow who was fuddled.	 69.95562047362203
A monstrous fine bit of cowflesh! I’ll be sworn she has rendezvoused	 51.9061262310882
you. What, you dog? Have you a way with them? Gad’s bud, immensely so,	 62.66360568748366
said Mr Lynch. The bedside manner it is that they use in the Mater	 80.96384812966092
hospice. Demme, does not Doctor O’Gargle chuck the nuns there under the	 61.16949968611868
chin. As I look to be saved I had it from my Kitty who has been	 100.03364700923858
wardmaid there any time these seven months. Lawksamercy, doctor, cried	 121.45752734519016
the young blood in the primrose vest, feigning a womanish simper and	 25.176061434979637
with immodest squirmings of his body, how you do tease a body! Drat the	 43.618891345786196
man! Bless me, I’m all of a wibbly wobbly. Why, you’re as bad as dear	 50.54818888432711
little Father Cantekissem, that you are! May this pot of four half	 149.1995228991592
choke me, cried Costello, if she aint in the family way. I knows a lady	 103.79614395344089
what’s got a white swelling quick as I claps eyes on her. The young	 116.12587861152174
surgeon, however, rose and begged the company to excuse his retreat as	 119.6406144224279
the nurse had just then informed him that he was needed in the ward.	 68.85484456526906
Merciful providence had been pleased to put a period to the sufferings	 66.61271617928486
of the lady who was _enceinte_ which she had borne with a laudable	 24.031071457344435
fortitude and she had given birth to a bouncing boy. I want patience,	 43.69529336844216
said he, with those who, without wit to enliven or learning to	 94.54010689808521
instruct, revile an ennobling profession which, saving the reverence	 30.58953619138281
due to the Deity, is the greatest power for happiness upon the earth. I	 76.59499413759227
am positive when I say that if need were I could produce a cloud of	 77.05778807971264
witnesses to the excellence of her noble exercitations which, so far	 27.587345542329956
from being a byword, should be a glorious incentive in the human	 43.34591091150893
breast. I cannot away with them. What? Malign such an one, the amiable	 198.62882859979993
Miss Callan, who is the lustre of her own sex and the astonishment of	 22.933345149612062
ours? And at an instant the most momentous that can befall a puny child	 66.08578000536586
of clay? Perish the thought! I shudder to think of the future of a race	 50.324420189179506
where the seeds of such malice have been sown and where no right	 81.50465288027416
reverence is rendered to mother and maid in house of Horne. Having	 221.22610098151432
delivered himself of this rebuke he saluted those present on the by and	 171.43327729733147
repaired to the door. A murmur of approval arose from all and some were	 44.70276929244884
for ejecting the low soaker without more ado, a design which would have	 80.177037839737
been effected nor would he have received more than his bare deserts had	 94.98742048117616
he not abridged his transgression by affirming with a horrid	 38.269206496138196
imprecation (for he swore a round hand) that he was as good a son of	 52.34299913139978
the true fold as ever drew breath. Stap my vitals, said he, them was	 167.8263024957834
always the sentiments of honest Frank Costello which I was bred up most	 56.699279114206405
particular to honour thy father and thy mother that had the best hand	 119.54353667730598
to a rolypoly or a hasty pudding as you ever see what I always looks	 50.60724587017257
back on with a loving heart.	 122.57250809554236
To revert to Mr Bloom who, after his first entry, had been conscious of	 60.88497464224103
some impudent mocks which he however had borne with as being the fruits	 97.81005003115904
of that age upon which it is commonly charged that it knows not pity.	 69.66263012224312
The young sparks, it is true, were as full of extravagancies as	 69.08237581026847
overgrown children: the words of their tumultuary discussions were	 42.946365819049824
difficultly understood and not often nice: their testiness and	 104.54761391246036
outrageous _mots_ were such that his intellects resiled from: nor were	 84.29812080262468
they scrupulously sensible of the proprieties though their fund of	 23.506420101251756
strong animal spirits spoke in their behalf. But the word of Mr	 97.2746704928363
Costello was an unwelcome language for him for he nauseated the wretch	 89.56608337506566
that seemed to him a cropeared creature of a misshapen gibbosity, born	 43.79635876890104
out of wedlock and thrust like a crookback toothed and feet first into	 65.73305680401248
the world, which the dint of the surgeon’s pliers in his skull lent	 17.952162959415517
indeed a colour to, so as to put him in thought of that missing link of	 85.32980182841841
creation’s chain desiderated by the late ingenious Mr Darwin. It was	 45.72161850113998
now for more than the middle span of our allotted years that he had	 58.38344395861092
passed through the thousand vicissitudes of existence and, being of a	 123.14143764109096
wary ascendancy and self a man of rare forecast, he had enjoined his	 31.12736341643714
heart to repress all motions of a rising choler and, by intercepting	 45.99372779018636
them with the readiest precaution, foster within his breast that	 32.463797566674295
plenitude of sufferance which base minds jeer at, rash judgers scorn	 32.7522861392078
and all find tolerable and but tolerable. To those who create	 65.6683776733901
themselves wits at the cost of feminine delicacy (a habit of mind which	 58.15846994369955
he never did hold with) to them he would concede neither to bear the	 131.94273794893053
name nor to herit the tradition of a proper breeding: while for such	 63.98360632682505
that, having lost all forbearance, can lose no more, there remained the	 93.72972619429682
sharp antidote of experience to cause their insolency to beat a	 118.69841509778708
precipitate and inglorious retreat. Not but what he could feel with	 49.8782741190553
mettlesome youth which, caring nought for the mows of dotards or the	 35.92853394151798
gruntlings of the severe, is ever (as the chaste fancy of the Holy	 25.130100547202325
Writer expresses it) for eating of the tree forbid it yet not so far	 82.52363481287635
forth as to pretermit humanity upon any condition soever towards a	 68.972513979809
gentlewoman when she was about her lawful occasions. To conclude, while	 30.532876107481048
from the sister’s words he had reckoned upon a speedy delivery he was,	 24.893405397724933
however, it must be owned, not a little alleviated by the intelligence	 39.30154766907973
that the issue so auspicated after an ordeal of such duress now	 67.97295914624799
testified once more to the mercy as well as to the bounty of the	 24.206374633050437
Supreme Being.	 128.2296384386798
Accordingly he broke his mind to his neighbour, saying that, to express	 68.18594231767058
his notion of the thing, his opinion (who ought not perchance to	 86.63200312642292
express one) was that one must have a cold constitution and a frigid	 53.57271190569871
genius not to be rejoiced by this freshest news of the fruition of her	 45.008416117651564
confinement since she had been in such pain through no fault of hers.	 102.02652202592601
The dressy young blade said it was her husband’s that put her in that	 62.71775535487261
expectation or at least it ought to be unless she were another Ephesian	 60.629045277083556
matron. I must acquaint you, said Mr Crotthers, clapping on the table	 54.860004682336225
so as to evoke a resonant comment of emphasis, old Glory Allelujurum	 27.71923730060124
was round again today, an elderly man with dundrearies, preferring	 99.79350622884232
through his nose a request to have word of Wilhelmina, my life, as he	 95.51958747754814
calls her. I bade him hold himself in readiness for that the event	 66.51529016875472
would burst anon. ’Slife, I’ll be round with you. I cannot but extol	 79.46839360544728
the virile potency of the old bucko that could still knock another	 44.9407047507149
child out of her. All fell to praising of it, each after his own	 110.1499471760171
fashion, though the same young blade held with his former view that	 125.64574896613722
another than her conjugial had been the man in the gap, a clerk in	 77.16550950684451
orders, a linkboy (virtuous) or an itinerant vendor of articles needed	 126.65011717372951
in every household. Singular, communed the guest with himself, the	 62.72248583559579
wonderfully unequal faculty of metempsychosis possessed by them, that	 23.63821180083366
the puerperal dormitory and the dissecting theatre should be the	 20.795760990359213
seminaries of such frivolity, that the mere acquisition of academic	 23.048723743550042
titles should suffice to transform in a pinch of time these votaries of	 29.593293520994894
levity into exemplary practitioners of an art which most men anywise	 69.92430443802769
eminent have esteemed the noblest. But, he further added, it is mayhap	 55.31241440497103
to relieve the pentup feelings that in common oppress them for I have	 88.60171463277011
more than once observed that birds of a feather laugh together.	 76.58282060234298
But with what fitness, let it be asked of the noble lord, his patron,	 158.380613209213
has this alien, whom the concession of a gracious prince has admitted	 56.31140428314946
to civic rights, constituted himself the lord paramount of our internal	 50.4734077176679
polity? Where is now that gratitude which loyalty should have	 51.01577105554861
counselled? During the recent war whenever the enemy had a temporary	 86.05151367348195
advantage with his granados did this traitor to his kind not seize that	 53.46709567204768
moment to discharge his piece against the empire of which he is a	 53.34500674969085
tenant at will while he trembled for the security of his four per	 53.03503773041087
cents? Has he forgotten this as he forgets all benefits received? Or is	 98.8125607347546
it that from being a deluder of others he has become at last his own	 76.5434399698558
