dupe as he is, if report belie him not, his own and his only enjoyer?	 58.22756273858619
Far be it from candour to violate the bedchamber of a respectable lady,	 51.23415637686634
the daughter of a gallant major, or to cast the most distant	 66.41335763759578
reflections upon her virtue but if he challenges attention there (as it	 72.75375711358741
was indeed highly his interest not to have done) then be it so. Unhappy	 120.76457417522083
woman, she has been too long and too persistently denied her legitimate	 70.33245191277466
prerogative to listen to his objurgations with any other feeling than	 54.34492316262109
the derision of the desperate. He says this, a censor of morals, a very	 28.217531125555773
pelican in his piety, who did not scruple, oblivious of the ties of	 14.781714263453653
nature, to attempt illicit intercourse with a female domestic drawn	 33.47357957107688
from the lowest strata of society! Nay, had the hussy’s scouringbrush	 38.55554805697597
not been her tutelary angel, it had gone with her as hard as with	 107.07701939894031
Hagar, the Egyptian! In the question of the grazing lands his peevish	 33.97192986910287
asperity is notorious and in Mr Cuffe’s hearing brought upon him from	 64.26178483294512
an indignant rancher a scathing retort couched in terms as	 23.194830382138623
straightforward as they were bucolic. It ill becomes him to preach that	 26.18387012179372
gospel. Has he not nearer home a seedfield that lies fallow for the	 56.88021703875629
want of the ploughshare? A habit reprehensible at puberty is second	 76.94844852772384
nature and an opprobrium in middle life. If he must dispense his balm	 65.3019031640467
of Gilead in nostrums and apothegms of dubious taste to restore to	 21.606303180778706
health a generation of unfledged profligates let his practice consist	 36.54465958208827
better with the doctrines that now engross him. His marital breast is	 84.68802399501946
the repository of secrets which decorum is reluctant to adduce. The	 21.911264000355114
lewd suggestions of some faded beauty may console him for a consort	 29.864516514682112
neglected and debauched but this new exponent of morals and healer of	 19.381530660851656
ills is at his best an exotic tree which, when rooted in its native	 103.85617672510826
orient, throve and flourished and was abundant in balm but,	 37.45994360442902
transplanted to a clime more temperate, its roots have lost their	 48.911277797888516
quondam vigour while the stuff that comes away from it is stagnant,	 64.4293729543248
acid and inoperative.	 78.47177457053351
The news was imparted with a circumspection recalling the ceremonial	 17.166344657119687
usage of the Sublime Porte by the second female infirmarian to the	 12.61866393388073
junior medical officer in residence, who in his turn announced to the	 149.50712667262897
delegation that an heir had been born. When he had betaken himself to	 75.98718316601939
the women’s apartment to assist at the prescribed ceremony of the	 8.67050238721001
afterbirth in the presence of the secretary of state for domestic	 12.397944198393619
affairs and the members of the privy council, silent in unanimous	 35.626429577214616
exhaustion and approbation the delegates, chafing under the length and	 14.13883455588053
solemnity of their vigil and hoping that the joyful occurrence would	 32.39170847194729
palliate a licence which the simultaneous absence of abigail and	 23.33726238809235
obstetrician rendered the easier, broke out at once into a strife of	 39.97480316940977
tongues. In vain the voice of Mr Canvasser Bloom was heard endeavouring	 115.71838545604035
to urge, to mollify, to refrain. The moment was too propitious for the	 28.717765446957532
display of that discursiveness which seemed the only bond of union	 47.23757813724325
among tempers so divergent. Every phase of the situation was	 45.72095531371563
successively eviscerated: the prenatal repugnance of uterine brothers,	 12.790962478499482
the Caesarean section, posthumity with respect to the father and, that	 20.09510254441823
rarer form, with respect to the mother, the fratricidal case known as	 56.7206785815685
the Childs Murder and rendered memorable by the impassioned plea of Mr	 26.498697059637784
Advocate Bushe which secured the acquittal of the wrongfully accused,	 29.547119690892988
the rights of primogeniture and king’s bounty touching twins and	 63.66576417099083
triplets, miscarriages and infanticides, simulated or dissimulated, the	 9.478188664421216
acardiac _foetus in foetu_ and aprosopia due to a congestion, the	 16.02782856501344
agnathia of certain chinless Chinamen (cited by Mr Candidate Mulligan)	 26.67922225792867
in consequence of defective reunion of the maxillary knobs along the	 13.473551450588745
medial line so that (as he said) one ear could hear what the other	 72.30333687158056
spoke, the benefits of anesthesia or twilight sleep, the prolongation	 34.494999622503435
of labour pains in advanced gravidancy by reason of pressure on the	 48.580456576321986
vein, the premature relentment of the amniotic fluid (as exemplified in	 15.271919375674624
the actual case) with consequent peril of sepsis to the matrix,	 27.11246808882464
artificial insemination by means of syringes, involution of the womb	 19.92775799385386
consequent upon the menopause, the problem of the perpetration of the	 11.550754538194965
species in the case of females impregnated by delinquent rape, that	 26.564468534334495
distressing manner of delivery called by the Brandenburghers	 27.490047328672127
_Sturzgeburt,_ the recorded instances of multiseminal, twikindled and	 6.234770745173986
monstrous births conceived during the catamenic period or of	 36.18568571517231
consanguineous parents—in a word all the cases of human nativity which	 44.16774835711798
Aristotle has classified in his masterpiece with chromolithographic	 18.67846017584438
illustrations. The gravest problems of obstetrics and forensic medicine	 5.836859293226711
were examined with as much animation as the most popular beliefs on the	 46.48519475189495
state of pregnancy such as the forbidding to a gravid woman to step	 57.83764311288441
over a countrystile lest, by her movement, the navelcord should	 61.71241029091373
strangle her creature and the injunction upon her in the event of a	 25.17991185724983
yearning, ardently and ineffectually entertained, to place her hand	 25.22515107177348
against that part of her person which long usage has consecrated as the	 80.60870904172965
seat of castigation. The abnormalities of harelip, breastmole,	 10.967295570426476
supernumerary digits, negro’s inkle, strawberry mark and portwine stain	 32.33742660065293
were alleged by one as a _prima facie_ and natural hypothetical	 42.4033365069492
explanation of those swineheaded (the case of Madame Grissel Steevens	 23.0364617587472
was not forgotten) or doghaired infants occasionally born. The	 55.26399106398586
hypothesis of a plasmic memory, advanced by the Caledonian envoy and	 13.614608814195394
worthy of the metaphysical traditions of the land he stood for,	 28.507353443687485
envisaged in such cases an arrest of embryonic development at some	 19.649433050108804
stage antecedent to the human. An outlandish delegate sustained against	 115.6755712464002
both these views, with such heat as almost carried conviction, the	 85.14101015789913
theory of copulation between women and the males of brutes, his	 76.40759773122446
authority being his own avouchment in support of fables such as that of	 74.57072759912033
the Minotaur which the genius of the elegant Latin poet has handed down	 36.12028303070182
to us in the pages of his Metamorphoses. The impression made by his	 36.45362059725516
words was immediate but shortlived. It was effaced as easily as it had	 62.84490152814728
been evoked by an allocution from Mr Candidate Mulligan in that vein of	 51.62742342217505
pleasantry which none better than he knew how to affect, postulating as	 47.88278487542902
the supremest object of desire a nice clean old man. Contemporaneously,	 56.02957611482438
a heated argument having arisen between Mr Delegate Madden and Mr	 70.15176953048892
Candidate Lynch regarding the juridical and theological dilemma created	 29.159439710204715
in the event of one Siamese twin predeceasing the other, the difficulty	 16.624463222043115
by mutual consent was referred to Mr Canvasser Bloom for instant	 77.37497180357066
submittal to Mr Coadjutor Deacon Dedalus. Hitherto silent, whether the	 64.1060568059934
better to show by preternatural gravity that curious dignity of the	 91.30137683471332
garb with which he was invested or in obedience to an inward voice, he	 60.73996098947094
delivered briefly and, as some thought, perfunctorily the	 102.03559974891917
ecclesiastical ordinance forbidding man to put asunder what God has	 86.87057350272543
joined.	 4.608171674364364
But Malachias’ tale began to freeze them with horror. He conjured up	 79.91877604414526
the scene before them. The secret panel beside the chimney slid back	 77.76501129555731
and in the recess appeared... Haines! Which of us did not feel his	 164.6121783399744
flesh creep! He had a portfolio full of Celtic literature in one hand,	 57.0009580755503
in the other a phial marked _Poison._ Surprise, horror, loathing were	 84.59224500628217
depicted on all faces while he eyed them with a ghostly grin. I	 36.97167166480433
anticipated some such reception, he began with an eldritch laugh, for	 85.45471958351982
which, it seems, history is to blame. Yes, it is true. I am the	 37.57916968419892
murderer of Samuel Childs. And how I am punished! The inferno has no	 38.63455888418322
terrors for me. This is the appearance is on me. Tare and ages, what	 78.64313462708098
way would I be resting at all, he muttered thickly, and I tramping	 70.68094699923948
Dublin this while back with my share of songs and himself after me the	 164.00517820736948
like of a soulth or a bullawurrus? My hell, and Ireland’s, is in this	 77.13832473822777
life. It is what I tried to obliterate my crime. Distractions,	 29.45627524239381
rookshooting, the Erse language (he recited some), laudanum (he raised	 44.86637000000483
the phial to his lips), camping out. In vain! His spectre stalks me.	 29.204877973894753
Dope is my only hope... Ah! Destruction! The black panther! With a cry	 60.86946262241993
he suddenly vanished and the panel slid back. An instant later his head	 71.5014417743303
appeared in the door opposite and said: Meet me at Westland Row station	 73.51001253942619
at ten past eleven. He was gone. Tears gushed from the eyes of the	 73.76869873689502
dissipated host. The seer raised his hand to heaven, murmuring: The	 41.592374152147805
vendetta of Mananaun! The sage repeated: _Lex talionis_. The	 19.531418823284596
sentimentalist is he who would enjoy without incurring the immense	 60.22111628789354
debtorship for a thing done. Malachias, overcome by emotion, ceased.	 36.31096699226802
The mystery was unveiled. Haines was the third brother. His real name	 115.61183460187
was Childs. The black panther was himself the ghost of his own father.	 40.25665430515293
He drank drugs to obliterate. For this relief much thanks. The lonely	 115.23025563557725
house by the graveyard is uninhabited. No soul will live there. The	 63.12886630772278
spider pitches her web in the solitude. The nocturnal rat peers from	 22.095657552135002
his hole. A curse is on it. It is haunted. Murderer’s ground.	 120.27216871825208
What is the age of the soul of man? As she hath the virtue of the	 34.87707656423764
chameleon to change her hue at every new approach, to be gay with the	 68.38910239560856
merry and mournful with the downcast, so too is her age changeable as	 122.88448653175698
her mood. No longer is Leopold, as he sits there, ruminating, chewing	 103.38131741520994
the cud of reminiscence, that staid agent of publicity and holder of a	 9.855156856927913
modest substance in the funds. A score of years are blown away. He is	 36.1512328765451
young Leopold. There, as in a retrospective arrangement, a mirror	 95.6221572325467
within a mirror (hey, presto!), he beholdeth himself. That young figure	 89.9939532795383
of then is seen, precociously manly, walking on a nipping morning from	 99.54014311063061
the old house in Clanbrassil street to the high school, his booksatchel	 35.845746809070704
on him bandolierwise, and in it a goodly hunk of wheaten loaf, a	 39.030270228720426
mother’s thought. Or it is the same figure, a year or so gone over, in	 99.80940040864743
his first hard hat (ah, that was a day!), already on the road, a	 58.391142572457504
fullfledged traveller for the family firm, equipped with an orderbook,	 31.677805957346052
a scented handkerchief (not for show only), his case of bright	 177.02606837486206
trinketware (alas! a thing now of the past!) and a quiverful of	 46.25275336189293
compliant smiles for this or that halfwon housewife reckoning it out	 56.184411294857064
upon her fingertips or for a budding virgin, shyly acknowledging (but	 74.98678468906314
the heart? tell me!) his studied baisemoins. The scent, the smile, but,	 155.6587480752338
more than these, the dark eyes and oleaginous address, brought home at	 90.43567701492297
duskfall many a commission to the head of the firm, seated with Jacob’s	 44.30723425372343
pipe after like labours in the paternal ingle (a meal of noodles, you	 59.09242233359577
may be sure, is aheating), reading through round horned spectacles some	 253.79627840798412
paper from the Europe of a month before. But hey, presto, the mirror is	 100.39910976884362
breathed on and the young knighterrant recedes, shrivels, dwindles to a	 35.005167998742046
tiny speck within the mist. Now he is himself paternal and these about	 78.54916636669113
him might be his sons. Who can say? The wise father knows his own	 113.24897786352699
child. He thinks of a drizzling night in Hatch street, hard by the	 35.11362309231811
bonded stores there, the first. Together (she is a poor waif, a child	 117.10203086663215
of shame, yours and mine and of all for a bare shilling and her	 88.36161156501802
luckpenny), together they hear the heavy tread of the watch as two	 91.97179794880415
raincaped shadows pass the new royal university. Bridie! Bridie Kelly!	 79.22898671357817
He will never forget the name, ever remember the night: first night,	 50.49848984802595
the bridenight. They are entwined in nethermost darkness, the willer	 21.522667412005053
with the willed, and in an instant (_fiat!_) light shall flood the	 50.69033418187337
world. Did heart leap to heart? Nay, fair reader. In a breath ’twas	 136.67383914039033
done but—hold! Back! It must not be! In terror the poor girl flees away	 124.83218190898108
through the murk. She is the bride of darkness, a daughter of night.	 77.37553441365499
She dare not bear the sunnygolden babe of day. No, Leopold. Name and	 164.21316386964963
memory solace thee not. That youthful illusion of thy strength was	 103.32674134451048
taken from thee—and in vain. No son of thy loins is by thee. There is	 121.20041119774874
none now to be for Leopold, what Leopold was for Rudolph.	 206.01034527609883
The voices blend and fuse in clouded silence: silence that is the	 36.939567533038925
infinite of space: and swiftly, silently the soul is wafted over	 98.86732249428093
regions of cycles of generations that have lived. A region where grey	 45.1756377691828
twilight ever descends, never falls on wide sagegreen pasturefields,	 101.29595792552084
shedding her dusk, scattering a perennial dew of stars. She follows her	 36.682505701939505
mother with ungainly steps, a mare leading her fillyfoal. Twilight	 147.1222038715107
phantoms are they, yet moulded in prophetic grace of structure, slim	 90.31746043343334
shapely haunches, a supple tendonous neck, the meek apprehensive skull.	 260.2120087584736
They fade, sad phantoms: all is gone. Agendath is a waste land, a home	 110.3366627529544
of screechowls and the sandblind upupa. Netaim, the golden, is no more.	 43.956929775106325
And on the highway of the clouds they come, muttering thunder of	 56.24674648491563
rebellion, the ghosts of beasts. Huuh! Hark! Huuh! Parallax stalks	 27.37419385705931
behind and goads them, the lancinating lightnings of whose brow are	 57.3939065595523
scorpions. Elk and yak, the bulls of Bashan and of Babylon, mammoth and	 7.271908136414962
mastodon, they come trooping to the sunken sea, _Lacus Mortis_. Ominous	 19.641930009069405
revengeful zodiacal host! They moan, passing upon the clouds, horned	 100.1626841671101
and capricorned, the trumpeted with the tusked, the lionmaned, the	 12.170005348612438
giantantlered, snouter and crawler, rodent, ruminant and pachyderm, all	 7.763835380434656
their moving moaning multitude, murderers of the sun.	 28.73947544565321
Onward to the dead sea they tramp to drink, unslaked and with horrible	 48.13538744819223
gulpings, the salt somnolent inexhaustible flood. And the equine	 26.522333264151044
portent grows again, magnified in the deserted heavens, nay to heaven’s	 35.21256576550036
own magnitude, till it looms, vast, over the house of Virgo. And lo,	 91.31241053872301
wonder of metempsychosis, it is she, the everlasting bride, harbinger	 118.7519550040114
of the daystar, the bride, ever virgin. It is she, Martha, thou lost	 55.93815661618673
one, Millicent, the young, the dear, the radiant. How serene does she	 296.5747708498396
now arise, a queen among the Pleiades, in the penultimate antelucan	 22.4386236793612
hour, shod in sandals of bright gold, coifed with a veil of what do you	 47.380839973836316
call it gossamer. It floats, it flows about her starborn flesh and	 48.94787329182939
loose it streams, emerald, sapphire, mauve and heliotrope, sustained on	 147.46178035452556
currents of the cold interstellar wind, winding, coiling, simply	 46.975527823023754
swirling, writhing in the skies a mysterious writing till, after a	 35.2827329393948
myriad metamorphoses of symbol, it blazes, Alpha, a ruby and triangled	 48.56778311471811
sign upon the forehead of Taurus.	 66.63067881984045
Francis was reminding Stephen of years before when they had been at	 158.92456181961023
school together in Conmee’s time. He asked about Glaucon, Alcibiades,	 74.97580656648182
Pisistratus. Where were they now? Neither knew. You have spoken of the	 86.32385651951067
past and its phantoms, Stephen said. Why think of them? If I call them	 84.63140198668849
into life across the waters of Lethe will not the poor ghosts troop to	 46.29533984649929
my call? Who supposes it? I, Bous Stephanoumenos, bullockbefriending	 49.37161100716964
bard, am lord and giver of their life. He encircled his gadding hair	 87.92572968518088
with a coronal of vineleaves, smiling at Vincent. That answer and those	 61.20241297836692
leaves, Vincent said to him, will adorn you more fitly when something	 150.26416666267983
more, and greatly more, than a capful of light odes can call your	 70.451672751744
genius father. All who wish you well hope this for you. All desire to	 311.2356686561328
see you bring forth the work you meditate, to acclaim you	 67.61036848999474
Stephaneforos. I heartily wish you may not fail them. O no, Vincent	 85.80644079748673
Lenehan said, laying a hand on the shoulder near him. Have no fear. He	 72.05731319625492
could not leave his mother an orphan. The young man’s face grew dark.	 85.10001535864629
All could see how hard it was for him to be reminded of his promise and	 58.162156867368594
of his recent loss. He would have withdrawn from the feast had not the	 52.49119201815406
noise of voices allayed the smart. Madden had lost five drachmas on	 169.577855069638
Sceptre for a whim of the rider’s name: Lenehan as much more. He told	 65.69671738409404
them of the race. The flag fell and, huuh! off, scamper, the mare ran	 73.35084996389956
out freshly with O. Madden up. She was leading the field. All hearts	 112.52855968492166
were beating. Even Phyllis could not contain herself. She waved her	 100.83747148736781
scarf and cried: Huzzah! Sceptre wins! But in the straight on the run	 178.26511415544374
home when all were in close order the dark horse Throwaway drew level,	 193.6901723861185
reached, outstripped her. All was lost now. Phyllis was silent: her	 152.41407618889104
eyes were sad anemones. Juno, she cried, I am undone. But her lover	 70.84551464523713
consoled her and brought her a bright casket of gold in which lay some	 99.83885620460042
oval sugarplums which she partook. A tear fell: one only. A whacking	 88.87188803564638
fine whip, said Lenehan, is W. Lane. Four winners yesterday and three	 169.9753556285105
today. What rider is like him? Mount him on the camel or the boisterous	 53.91617351901812
buffalo the victory in a hack canter is still his. But let us bear it	 33.21921993346685
as was the ancient wont. Mercy on the luckless! Poor Sceptre! he said	 64.33876124329771
with a light sigh. She is not the filly that she was. Never, by this	 54.49552776275095
hand, shall we behold such another. By gad, sir, a queen of them. Do	 188.04161749611418
you remember her, Vincent? I wish you could have seen my queen today,	 109.31930136764355
Vincent said. How young she was and radiant (Lalage were scarce fair	 167.36808259524508
beside her) in her yellow shoes and frock of muslin, I do not know the	 44.59602533527633
right name of it. The chestnuts that shaded us were in bloom: the air	 114.38867992654183
drooped with their persuasive odour and with pollen floating by us. In	 92.27858296775773
the sunny patches one might easily have cooked on a stone a batch of	 28.15344316819092
those buns with Corinth fruit in them that Periplipomenes sells in his	 49.38438798988274
booth near the bridge. But she had nought for her teeth but the arm	 94.12023490339469
with which I held her and in that she nibbled mischievously when I	 77.3788610723784
pressed too close. A week ago she lay ill, four days on the couch, but	 158.52768037059764
today she was free, blithe, mocked at peril. She is more taking then.	 116.52997829230306
Her posies too! Mad romp that she is, she had pulled her fill as we	 53.3060956061078
reclined together. And in your ear, my friend, you will not think who	 72.27453511927037
met us as we left the field. Conmee himself! He was walking by the	 101.22321494995423
hedge, reading, I think a brevier book with, I doubt not, a witty	 112.99728952373643
letter in it from Glycera or Chloe to keep the page. The sweet creature	 77.89987159431197
turned all colours in her confusion, feigning to reprove a slight	 79.21369894885642
disorder in her dress: a slip of underwood clung there for the very	 35.92641287365273
trees adore her. When Conmee had passed she glanced at her lovely echo	 127.0284977949923
in that little mirror she carries. But he had been kind. In going by he	 88.08201931009135
had blessed us. The gods too are ever kind, Lenehan said. If I had poor	 97.2202485170417
luck with Bass’s mare perhaps this draught of his may serve me more	 96.87066480287174
propensely. He was laying his hand upon a winejar: Malachi saw it and	 56.055841596045845
withheld his act, pointing to the stranger and to the scarlet label.	 52.037887416724054
Warily, Malachi whispered, preserve a druid silence. His soul is far	 153.94330257284176
away. It is as painful perhaps to be awakened from a vision as to be	 64.24244293111099
born. Any object, intensely regarded, may be a gate of access to the	 51.09975120693688
incorruptible eon of the gods. Do you not think it, Stephen? Theosophos	 33.28541550737629
told me so, Stephen answered, whom in a previous existence Egyptian	 85.37694286580628
priests initiated into the mysteries of karmic law. The lords of the	 38.827138327743995
moon, Theosophos told me, an orangefiery shipload from planet Alpha of	 32.55837388934099
the lunar chain would not assume the etheric doubles and these were	 40.286617675254135
therefore incarnated by the rubycoloured egos from the second	 30.841099358087753
constellation.	 4.608171674364364
However, as a matter of fact though, the preposterous surmise about him	 43.57167454007827
being in some description of a doldrums or other or mesmerised which	 50.76116131554097
was entirely due to a misconception of the shallowest character, was	 30.647252736058928
not the case at all. The individual whose visual organs while the above	 115.64532298092516
was going on were at this juncture commencing to exhibit symptoms of	 54.364171275571614
animation was as astute if not astuter than any man living and anybody	 82.2694257629951
that conjectured the contrary would have found themselves pretty	 86.13461183264535
speedily in the wrong shop. During the past four minutes or thereabouts	 42.36587466065889
he had been staring hard at a certain amount of number one Bass bottled	 20.105033990467472
by Messrs Bass and Co at Burton-on-Trent which happened to be situated	 55.90136353216282
amongst a lot of others right opposite to where he was and which was	 102.98194844673037
certainly calculated to attract anyone’s remark on account of its	 50.93246546626238
scarlet appearance. He was simply and solely, as it subsequently	 61.112060061453356
transpired for reasons best known to himself, which put quite an	 156.2458241118378
altogether different complexion on the proceedings, after the moment	 37.0999011646033
before’s observations about boyhood days and the turf, recollecting two	 62.19640431482841
or three private transactions of his own which the other two were as	 99.68397474824168
mutually innocent of as the babe unborn. Eventually, however, both	 139.0380134508269
their eyes met and as soon as it began to dawn on him that the other	 36.63498276797566
was endeavouring to help himself to the thing he involuntarily	 57.87561211309955
determined to help him himself and so he accordingly took hold of the	 67.78693982254039
neck of the mediumsized glass recipient which contained the fluid	 107.83323692293128
sought after and made a capacious hole in it by pouring a lot of it out	 91.9965194247193
with, also at the same time, however, a considerable degree of	 46.781304556049754
attentiveness in order not to upset any of the beer that was in it	 66.0701490210726
about the place.	 151.49909460544166
The debate which ensued was in its scope and progress an epitome of the	 20.627120485559395
course of life. Neither place nor council was lacking in dignity. The	 66.24778447299693
debaters were the keenest in the land, the theme they were engaged on	 25.857497826705252
the loftiest and most vital. The high hall of Horne’s house had never	 36.68792408453158
beheld an assembly so representative and so varied nor had the old	 103.6731741173065
rafters of that establishment ever listened to a language so	 55.83076886606425
encyclopaedic. A gallant scene in truth it made. Crotthers was there at	 100.5658846518758
the foot of the table in his striking Highland garb, his face glowing	 57.833365727857874
from the briny airs of the Mull of Galloway. There too, opposite to	 18.531247563194768
him, was Lynch whose countenance bore already the stigmata of early	 163.9124905140135
depravity and premature wisdom. Next the Scotchman was the place	 64.82303696593841
assigned to Costello, the eccentric, while at his side was seated in	 76.08726166122791
stolid repose the squat form of Madden. The chair of the resident	 50.84348701658139
indeed stood vacant before the hearth but on either flank of it the	 84.94047743977572
figure of Bannon in explorer’s kit of tweed shorts and salted cowhide	 20.013229172565097
brogues contrasted sharply with the primrose elegance and townbred	 74.37426210689499
manners of Malachi Roland St John Mulligan. Lastly at the head of the	 30.291367016062754
board was the young poet who found a refuge from his labours of	 64.3153537197495
pedagogy and metaphysical inquisition in the convivial atmosphere of	 6.234790835689884
Socratic discussion, while to right and left of him were accommodated	 161.92124178366973
the flippant prognosticator, fresh from the hippodrome, and that	 29.876778701370448
vigilant wanderer, soiled by the dust of travel and combat and stained	 29.765919996670924
by the mire of an indelible dishonour, but from whose steadfast and	 30.877348006325583
constant heart no lure or peril or threat or degradation could ever	 62.11908690313802
efface the image of that voluptuous loveliness which the inspired	 17.275170315776656
pencil of Lafayette has limned for ages yet to come.	 109.43715407381714
It had better be stated here and now at the outset that the perverted	 41.447497914426656
transcendentalism to which Mr S. Dedalus’ (Div. Scep.) contentions	 22.522732303362464
would appear to prove him pretty badly addicted runs directly counter	 146.6350496507523
to accepted scientific methods. Science, it cannot be too often	 116.03086676572315
repeated, deals with tangible phenomena. The man of science like the	 69.2967573886314
man in the street has to face hardheaded facts that cannot be blinked	 59.645980210836484
and explain them as best he can. There may be, it is true, some	 146.22261913760053
questions which science cannot answer—at present—such as the first	 70.37145061839885
problem submitted by Mr L. Bloom (Pubb. Canv.) regarding the future	 61.50977318347338
determination of sex. Must we accept the view of Empedocles of	 53.891965844821534
Trinacria that the right ovary (the postmenstrual period, assert	 34.46534165450841
others) is responsible for the birth of males or are the too long	 139.36301954508733
neglected spermatozoa or nemasperms the differentiating factors or is	 14.890434303691315
it, as most embryologists incline to opine, such as Culpepper,	 38.498694251934076
Spallanzani, Blumenbach, Lusk, Hertwig, Leopold and Valenti, a mixture	 12.508933251369612
of both? This would be tantamount to a cooperation (one of nature’s	 87.72659011434718
favourite devices) between the _nisus formativus_ of the nemasperm on	 22.261844390094698
the one hand and on the other a happily chosen position, _succubitus	 38.699200682952366
felix_, of the passive element. The other problem raised by the same	 24.633267257796323
inquirer is scarcely less vital: infant mortality. It is interesting	 76.42778054702204
because, as he pertinently remarks, we are all born in the same way but	 37.779535696403336
we all die in different ways. Mr M. Mulligan (Hyg. et Eug. Doc.) blames	 85.74865248733317
the sanitary conditions in which our greylunged citizens contract	 11.381719925304141
adenoids, pulmonary complaints etc. by inhaling the bacteria which lurk	 18.750740793333076
in dust. These factors, he alleged, and the revolting spectacles	 51.833786446050176
offered by our streets, hideous publicity posters, religious ministers	 31.045383251578667
of all denominations, mutilated soldiers and sailors, exposed scorbutic	 17.738181897520086
cardrivers, the suspended carcases of dead animals, paranoic bachelors	 10.65225431054956
and unfructified duennas—these, he said, were accountable for any and	 45.570793935937736
every fallingoff in the calibre of the race. Kalipedia, he prophesied,	 18.50739757074142
would soon be generally adopted and all the graces of life, genuinely	 17.74244224906191
good music, agreeable literature, light philosophy, instructive	 430.0971943137013
pictures, plastercast reproductions of the classical statues such as	 46.8231952622686
Venus and Apollo, artistic coloured photographs of prize babies, all	 57.57373321175474
these little attentions would enable ladies who were in a particular	 143.68577678076525
condition to pass the intervening months in a most enjoyable manner. Mr	 108.3726626125963
J. Crotthers (Disc. Bacc.) attributes some of these demises to	 64.22533363553357
abdominal trauma in the case of women workers subjected to heavy	 28.027437388514873
labours in the workshop and to marital discipline in the home but by	 27.498684347388018
far the vast majority to neglect, private or official, culminating in	 101.75745952035989
the exposure of newborn infants, the practice of criminal abortion or	 12.42982960448836
in the atrocious crime of infanticide. Although the former (we are	 18.282616154958113
thinking of neglect) is undoubtedly only too true the case he cites of	 58.06789987734252
nurses forgetting to count the sponges in the peritoneal cavity is too	 12.663531227313666
rare to be normative. In fact when one comes to look into it the wonder	 79.96977557190951
is that so many pregnancies and deliveries go off so well as they do,	 46.51711706771845
all things considered and in spite of our human shortcomings which	 45.47304556593956
often baulk nature in her intentions. An ingenious suggestion is that	 74.94660890717869
thrown out by Mr V. Lynch (Bacc. Arith.) that both natality and	 36.48530177565188
mortality, as well as all other phenomena of evolution, tidal	 17.288597218715122
movements, lunar phases, blood temperatures, diseases in general,	 53.82266559340805
everything, in fine, in nature’s vast workshop from the extinction of	 62.44807097341545
some remote sun to the blossoming of one of the countless flowers which	 45.01021932012122
beautify our public parks is subject to a law of numeration as yet	 53.28850651440888
unascertained. Still the plain straightforward question why a child of	 89.2583210465826
normally healthy parents and seemingly a healthy child and properly	 63.10835737562561
looked after succumbs unaccountably in early childhood (though other	 111.18093277110988
children of the same marriage do not) must certainly, in the poet’s	 55.95986663869729
words, give us pause. Nature, we may rest assured, has her own good and	 150.20843407993956
cogent reasons for whatever she does and in all probability such deaths	 152.88994923479854
are due to some law of anticipation by which organisms in which morbous	 45.94139806515768
germs have taken up their residence (modern science has conclusively	 70.38350235554469
shown that only the plasmic substance can be said to be immortal) tend	 53.52564416150297
to disappear at an increasingly earlier stage of development, an	 42.4395283709479
arrangement which, though productive of pain to some of our feelings	 193.49362319832503
(notably the maternal), is nevertheless, some of us think, in the long	 60.91257804037001
run beneficial to the race in general in securing thereby the survival	 62.10862686616649
of the fittest. Mr S. Dedalus’ (Div. Scep.) remark (or should it be	 71.47511161848747
called an interruption?) that an omnivorous being which can masticate,	 127.23871108929274
deglute, digest and apparently pass through the ordinary channel with	 26.67318383705063
pluterperfect imperturbability such multifarious aliments as cancrenous	 18.475032964985495
females emaciated by parturition, corpulent professional gentlemen, not	 63.330712575353566
to speak of jaundiced politicians and chlorotic nuns, might possibly	 50.904210131968576
find gastric relief in an innocent collation of staggering bob, reveals	 99.86705670196827
as nought else could and in a very unsavoury light the tendency above	 89.05378596932573
alluded to. For the enlightenment of those who are not so intimately	 26.48329607369553
acquainted with the minutiae of the municipal abattoir as this	 12.31996650571207
morbidminded esthete and embryo philosopher who for all his overweening	 22.80799761085504
bumptiousness in things scientific can scarcely distinguish an acid	 72.71870597659054
from an alkali prides himself on being, it should perhaps be stated	 171.36607411744296
that staggering bob in the vile parlance of our lowerclass licensed	 33.44771401851223
victuallers signifies the cookable and eatable flesh of a calf newly	 19.452709052284014
dropped from its mother. In a recent public controversy with Mr L.	 117.96642600593556
Bloom (Pubb. Canv.) which took place in the commons’ hall of the	 21.382851407567486
National Maternity Hospital, 29, 30 and 31 Holles street, of which, as	 88.1472795179351
is well known, Dr A. Horne (Lic. in Midw., F. K. Q. C. P. I.) is the	 74.81555084162271
able and popular master, he is reported by eyewitnesses as having	 147.96812032326943
stated that once a woman has let the cat into the bag (an esthete’s	 131.2060360261271
allusion, presumably, to one of the most complicated and marvellous of	 21.593545170060743
all nature’s processes—the act of sexual congress) she must let it out	 64.69599338182455
again or give it life, as he phrased it, to save her own. At the risk	 86.65775984183121
of her own, was the telling rejoinder of his interlocutor, none the	 80.03048929225143
less effective for the moderate and measured tone in which it was	 45.01180204644535
delivered.	 5757.389109386618
Meanwhile the skill and patience of the physician had brought about a	 31.42089996164552
happy _accouchement._ It had been a weary weary while both for patient	 104.51580309392276
and doctor. All that surgical skill could do was done and the brave	 125.15523666194252
woman had manfully helped. She had. She had fought the good fight and	 67.78450358957772
now she was very very happy. Those who have passed on, who have gone	 137.91147361359907
before, are happy too as they gaze down and smile upon the touching	 218.1585591635937
scene. Reverently look at her as she reclines there with the	 53.33468890667618
motherlight in her eyes, that longing hunger for baby fingers (a pretty	 84.79868618574241
sight it is to see), in the first bloom of her new motherhood,	 81.3052001105294
breathing a silent prayer of thanksgiving to One above, the Universal	 124.52108227196054
Husband. And as her loving eyes behold her babe she wishes only one	 90.28939031641691
blessing more, to have her dear Doady there with her to share her joy,	 126.28356174355469
to lay in his arms that mite of God’s clay, the fruit of their lawful	 61.719453740831426
embraces. He is older now (you and I may whisper it) and a trifle	 72.0799868022343
stooped in the shoulders yet in the whirligig of years a grave dignity	 85.09750844558437
has come to the conscientious second accountant of the Ulster bank,	 56.78817656757495
College Green branch. O Doady, loved one of old, faithful lifemate now,	 127.83085930637841
it may never be again, that faroff time of the roses! With the old	 62.92894733416461
shake of her pretty head she recalls those days. God! How beautiful now	 79.72287792660303
across the mist of years! But their children are grouped in her	 46.16849207355481
imagination about the bedside, hers and his, Charley, Mary Alice,	 88.6521404948044
Frederick Albert (if he had lived), Mamy, Budgy (Victoria Frances),	 69.33256756754731
Tom, Violet Constance Louisa, darling little Bobsy (called after our	 125.61680429350746
famous hero of the South African war, lord Bobs of Waterford and	 48.68921642122857
Candahar) and now this last pledge of their union, a Purefoy if ever	 96.9690774237165
there was one, with the true Purefoy nose. Young hopeful will be	 131.7869278320136
christened Mortimer Edward after the influential third cousin of Mr	 51.343873013131564
Purefoy in the Treasury Remembrancer’s office, Dublin Castle. And so	 75.79850655033877
time wags on: but father Cronion has dealt lightly here. No, let no	 264.4823871853368
sigh break from that bosom, dear gentle Mina. And Doady, knock the	 203.9794446725822
ashes from your pipe, the seasoned briar you still fancy when the	 108.41246161109734
curfew rings for you (may it be the distant day!) and dout the light	 81.66205492849602
whereby you read in the Sacred Book for the oil too has run low, and so	 76.92563175226861
with a tranquil heart to bed, to rest. He knows and will call in His	 68.64254815323945
own good time. You too have fought the good fight and played loyally	 91.02666092024569
your man’s part. Sir, to you my hand. Well done, thou good and faithful	 288.12700947809145
servant!	 25266.71737672707
There are sins or (let us call them as the world calls them) evil	 79.01194157556722
memories which are hidden away by man in the darkest places of the	 30.053586223564782
heart but they abide there and wait. He may suffer their memory to grow	 134.61907396168942
dim, let them be as though they had not been and all but persuade	 87.70334528334837
himself that they were not or at least were otherwise. Yet a chance	 148.96861229631784
word will call them forth suddenly and they will rise up to confront	 65.19294443807765
him in the most various circumstances, a vision or a dream, or while	 73.90177495328169
timbrel and harp soothe his senses or amid the cool silver tranquility	 77.31649716912523
of the evening or at the feast, at midnight, when he is now filled with	 79.38208458849623
wine. Not to insult over him will the vision come as over one that lies	 213.49023730022978
under her wrath, not for vengeance to cut him off from the living but	 84.99777970380298
shrouded in the piteous vesture of the past, silent, remote,	 12.919793727599417
reproachful.	 4.608171674364364
The stranger still regarded on the face before him a slow recession of	 54.31610658630662
that false calm there, imposed, as it seemed, by habit or some studied	 125.17174318483652
trick, upon words so embittered as to accuse in their speaker an	 103.22345969453575
unhealthiness, a _flair,_ for the cruder things of life. A scene	 44.93910086039434
disengages itself in the observer’s memory, evoked, it would seem, by a	 42.571078338966544
word of so natural a homeliness as if those days were really present	 133.30644929450975
there (as some thought) with their immediate pleasures. A shaven space	 124.98942996211612
of lawn one soft May evening, the wellremembered grove of lilacs at	 103.1016728711704
Roundtown, purple and white, fragrant slender spectators of the game	 72.27515573039476
but with much real interest in the pellets as they run slowly forward	 71.86621683624954
over the sward or collide and stop, one by its fellow, with a brief	 78.27449671973811
alert shock. And yonder about that grey urn where the water moves at	 54.44132434900933
times in thoughtful irrigation you saw another as fragrant sisterhood,	 56.51341787047522
Floey, Atty, Tiny and their darker friend with I know not what of	 139.72509864146653
arresting in her pose then, Our Lady of the Cherries, a comely brace of	 25.755789337377184
them pendent from an ear, bringing out the foreign warmth of the skin	 90.31965642056011
so daintily against the cool ardent fruit. A lad of four or five in	 124.31178519314027
linseywoolsey (blossomtime but there will be cheer in the kindly hearth	 38.13592957495795
when ere long the bowls are gathered and hutched) is standing on the	 54.59727048834052
urn secured by that circle of girlish fond hands. He frowns a little	 46.243428303845185
just as this young man does now with a perhaps too conscious enjoyment	 166.8878532331353
of the danger but must needs glance at whiles towards where his mother	 182.00136697802816
watches from the _piazzetta_ giving upon the flowerclose with a faint	 48.25457003640991
shadow of remoteness or of reproach (_alles Vergängliche_) in her glad	 36.53213819940093
look.	 916.721424060204
Mark this farther and remember. The end comes suddenly. Enter that	 321.5103168965016
antechamber of birth where the studious are assembled and note their	 40.24144070428445
faces. Nothing, as it seems, there of rash or violent. Quietude of	 66.7064111047244
custody, rather, befitting their station in that house, the vigilant	 56.42946453872372
watch of shepherds and of angels about a crib in Bethlehem of Juda long	 46.97825345140222
ago. But as before the lightning the serried stormclouds, heavy with	 316.4777298407957
preponderant excess of moisture, in swollen masses turgidly distended,	 12.343163638575895
compass earth and sky in one vast slumber, impending above parched	 125.97910422149177
field and drowsy oxen and blighted growth of shrub and verdure till in	 29.67548271062444
an instant a flash rives their centres and with the reverberation of	 35.089421100492636
the thunder the cloudburst pours its torrent, so and not otherwise was	 77.20732629567871
the transformation, violent and instantaneous, upon the utterance of	 33.83398705098113
the word.	 90.64604619166981
Burke’s! outflings my lord Stephen, giving the cry, and a tag and	 80.40253625696701
bobtail of all them after, cockerel, jackanapes, welsher, pilldoctor,	 16.941478084098556
punctual Bloom at heels with a universal grabbing at headgear,	 54.69208026575299
ashplants, bilbos, Panama hats and scabbards, Zermatt alpenstocks and	 18.968220770038407
what not. A dedale of lusty youth, noble every student there. Nurse	 145.7827530405402
Callan taken aback in the hallway cannot stay them nor smiling surgeon	 152.71906618849286
coming downstairs with news of placentation ended, a full pound if a	 128.36859890258444
milligramme. They hark him on. The door! It is open? Ha! They are out,	 46.15276983620803
tumultuously, off for a minute’s race, all bravely legging it, Burke’s	 72.09222971882673
of Denzille and Holles their ulterior goal. Dixon follows giving them	 83.9949254113264
sharp language but raps out an oath, he too, and on. Bloom stays with	 175.00616148410435
nurse a thought to send a kind word to happy mother and nurseling up	 215.57941598862774
there. Doctor Diet and Doctor Quiet. Looks she too not other now? Ward	 231.41586851064338
of watching in Horne’s house has told its tale in that washedout	 105.72298930385895
pallor. Then all being gone, a glance of motherwit helping, he whispers	 41.50994094300071
close in going: Madam, when comes the storkbird for thee?	 130.9921406558574
The air without is impregnated with raindew moisture, life essence	 71.74020423788076
celestial, glistening on Dublin stone there under starshiny _coelum._	 76.06249422206464
God’s air, the Allfather’s air, scintillant circumambient cessile air.	 80.39560390452523
Breathe it deep into thee. By heaven, Theodore Purefoy, thou hast done	 263.2037591775563
a doughty deed and no botch! Thou art, I vow, the remarkablest	 30.13443552588934
progenitor barring none in this chaffering allincluding most	 42.12012697477748
farraginous chronicle. Astounding! In her lay a Godframed Godgiven	 15.865018866700884
preformed possibility which thou hast fructified with thy modicum of	 22.96039433282446
man’s work. Cleave to her! Serve! Toil on, labour like a very bandog	 102.6050113707257
and let scholarment and all Malthusiasts go hang. Thou art all their	 75.4021218331174
daddies, Theodore. Art drooping under thy load, bemoiled with butcher’s	 62.74124647984425
bills at home and ingots (not thine!) in the countinghouse? Head up!	 52.36724980443929
For every newbegotten thou shalt gather thy homer of ripe wheat. See,	 77.75024624496457
thy fleece is drenched. Dost envy Darby Dullman there with his Joan? A	 22.002669191521207
canting jay and a rheumeyed curdog is all their progeny. Pshaw, I tell	 21.7779193125501
thee! He is a mule, a dead gasteropod, without vim or stamina, not	 62.12453450275249
worth a cracked kreutzer. Copulation without population! No, say I!	 85.3639280168901
Herod’s slaughter of the innocents were the truer name. Vegetables,	 18.205842227383105
forsooth, and sterile cohabitation! Give her beefsteaks, red, raw,	 25.17896186551967
bleeding! She is a hoary pandemonium of ills, enlarged glands, mumps,	 19.09631057746581
quinsy, bunions, hayfever, bedsores, ringworm, floating kidney,	 16.223255731491147
Derbyshire neck, warts, bilious attacks, gallstones, cold feet,	 40.824607582552325
varicose veins. A truce to threnes and trentals and jeremies and all	 19.244119716446477
such congenital defunctive music! Twenty years of it, regret them not.	 75.87030271146098
With thee it was not as with many that will and would and wait and	 193.85689552876607
never—do. Thou sawest thy America, thy lifetask, and didst charge to	 44.593572353345586
cover like the transpontine bison. How saith Zarathustra? _Deine Kuh	 35.99341305744366
Trübsal melkest Du. Nun Trinkst Du die süsse Milch des Euters_. See! it	 69.12495221902122
displodes for thee in abundance. Drink, man, an udderful! Mother’s	 114.93099210460394
milk, Purefoy, the milk of human kin, milk too of those burgeoning	 120.85786209241546
stars overhead rutilant in thin rainvapour, punch milk, such as those	 150.02305073928267
rioters will quaff in their guzzling den, milk of madness, the	 23.81138982487529
honeymilk of Canaan’s land. Thy cow’s dug was tough, what? Ay, but her	 42.293322140845916
milk is hot and sweet and fattening. No dollop this but thick rich	 129.5444116672791
bonnyclaber. To her, old patriarch! Pap! _Per deam Partulam et	 28.88292937780591
Pertundam nunc est bibendum!_	 17.579660025433906
All off for a buster, armstrong, hollering down the street. Bonafides.	 60.15991369316881
Where you slep las nigh? Timothy of the battered naggin. Like ole	 56.52021820251136

they done to him! My smelling salts! _(She hauls up a reef of skirt and	 43.159904696917884
ransacks the pouch of her striped blay petticoat. A phial, an Agnus	 19.159987143851904
Dei, a shrivelled potato and a celluloid doll fall out.)_ Sacred Heart	 48.719157892805704
of Mary, where were you at all at all?	 108.62077531472133
_(Bloom, mumbling, his eyes downcast, begins to bestow his parcels in	 35.43249349106761

A VOICE: _(Sharply.)_ Poldy!	 80.59766117781741
BLOOM: Who? _(He ducks and wards off a blow clumsily.)_ At your	 60.7114419555116
service.	 13781.811868011273
_(He looks up. Beside her mirage of datepalms a handsome woman in	 54.28056485179286

trousers and jacket, slashed with gold. A wide yellow cummerbund	 97.3860162975278

MARION: Welly? Mrs Marion from this out, my dear man, when you speak to	 129.91142087664073
me. _(Satirically.)_ Has poor little hubby cold feet waiting so long?	 118.05795839176704
BLOOM: _(Shifts from foot to foot.)_ No, no. Not the least little bit.	 94.83589744512861
_(He breathes in deep agitation, swallowing gulps of air, questions,	 29.519543758277482
hopes, crubeens for her supper, things to tell her, excuse, desire,	 77.45531391972273
spellbound. A coin gleams on her forehead. On her feet are jewelled	 32.383355017166494
toerings. Her ankles are linked by a slender fetterchain. Beside her a	 47.21388881067372

wristbangles angriling, scolding him in Moorish.)_	 26.436552914897312

_(The camel, lifting a foreleg, plucks from a tree a large mango fruit,	 44.86876267333016

BLOOM: I can give you... I mean as your business menagerer... Mrs	 49.934293413715

wide world.	 1106.3535606548987

The galling chain.	 37.208412734793015

_(He staggers forward, dragging them with him. Bloom stops, at fault.	 72.28086767358083
The dog approaches, his tongue outlolling, panting.)_	 101.182446916093
BLOOM: Wildgoose chase this. Disorderly houses. Lord knows where they	 69.38506742044912
are gone. Drunks cover distance double quick. Nice mixup. Scene at	 522.9081455562106
Westland row. Then jump in first class with third ticket. Then too far.	 97.88799271782788
Train with engine behind. Might have taken me to Malahide or a siding	 118.98387088415043
for the night or collision. Second drink does it. Once is a dose. What	 71.29816408477272
am I following him for? Still, he’s the best of that lot. If I hadn’t	 79.56440112733794
heard about Mrs Beaufoy Purefoy I wouldn’t have gone and wouldn’t have	 104.5671463904989
met. Kismet. He’ll lose that cash. Relieving office here. Good biz for	 114.94705573062218
cheapjacks, organs. What do ye lack? Soon got, soon gone. Might have	 222.90936915950508
lost my life too with that mangongwheeltracktrolleyglarejuggernaut only	 124.33046393455002
for presence of mind. Can’t always save you, though. If I had passed	 135.86282528521366
Truelock’s window that day two minutes later would have been shot.	 52.10597216537688
Absence of body. Still if bullet only went through my coat get damages	 218.07933617545308
for shock, five hundred pounds. What was he? Kildare street club toff.	 33.31686965153553
God help his gamekeeper.	 70.78758296544561
_(He gazes ahead, reading on the wall a scrawled chalk legend_ Wet	 51.60516438569424
Dream _and a phallic design._) Odd! Molly drawing on the frosted	 94.58928432820395
carriagepane at Kingstown. What’s that like? _(Gaudy dollwomen loll in	 39.40380605371801
the lighted doorways, in window embrasures, smoking birdseye	 73.12212676975614
cigarettes. The odour of the sicksweet weed floats towards him in slow	 65.41856602525297
round ovalling wreaths.)_	 1076.081866818805
THE WREATHS: Sweet are the sweets. Sweets of sin.	 91.09838504742369
BLOOM: My spine’s a bit limp. Go or turn? And this food? Eat it and get	 155.6101193663475
all pigsticky. Absurd I am. Waste of money. One and eightpence too	 47.16986748758535
much. _(The retriever drives a cold snivelling muzzle against his hand,	 42.52817629279666
wagging his tail.)_ Strange how they take to me. Even that brute today.	 199.78753336676647
Better speak to him first. Like women they like _rencontres._ Stinks	 84.49009209306443
like a polecat. _Chacun son goût_. He might be mad. Dogdays. Uncertain	 28.210588116960487
in his movements. Good fellow! Fido! Good fellow! Garryowen! _(The	 102.27398035231916
wolfdog sprawls on his back, wriggling obscenely with begging paws, his	 21.792570270031888
long black tongue lolling out.)_ Influence of his surroundings. Give	 85.7778519303172
and have done with it. Provided nobody. _(Calling encouraging words he	 65.15260743252264
shambles back with a furtive poacher’s tread, dogged by the setter into	 24.171021057996246
a dark stalestunk corner. He unrolls one parcel and goes to dump the	 52.674510408100744
crubeen softly but holds back and feels the trotter.)_ Sizeable for	 61.25580631488864
threepence. But then I have it in my left hand. Calls for more effort.	 76.45308350037365
Why? Smaller from want of use. O, let it slide. Two and six.	 173.2923057435824
_(With regret he lets the unrolled crubeen and trotter slide. The	 42.122310545059335
mastiff mauls the bundle clumsily and gluts himself with growling	 42.91569241190356
greed, crunching the bones. Two raincaped watch approach, silent,	 102.9711736782309
vigilant. They murmur together.)_	 84.67591835180843
THE WATCH: Bloom. Of Bloom. For Bloom. Bloom.	 319.9023780048892
_(Each lays hand on Bloom’s shoulder.)_	 173.57922513301637
FIRST WATCH: Caught in the act. Commit no nuisance.	 58.087992187150675
BLOOM: _(Stammers.)_ I am doing good to others.	 92.24655234698558
_(A covey of gulls, storm petrels, rises hungrily from Liffey slime	 53.864741775991426
with Banbury cakes in their beaks.)_	 29.854560247170745
THE GULLS: Kaw kave kankury kake.	 15.218986416958582
BLOOM: The friend of man. Trained by kindness.	 77.64914731824453
_(He points. Bob Doran, toppling from a high barstool, sways over the	 40.18453705229918
munching spaniel.)_	 4.411654744205047
BOB DORAN: Towser. Give us the paw. Give the paw.	 40.30543586206049
_(The bulldog growls, his scruff standing, a gobbet of pig’s knuckle	 25.971928104719037
between his molars through which rabid scumspittle dribbles. Bob Doran	 37.95681923653411
falls silently into an area.)_	 158.58708425566934
SECOND WATCH: Prevention of cruelty to animals.	 48.393092527373085
BLOOM: _(Enthusiastically.)_ A noble work! I scolded that tramdriver on	 52.38516278351498
Harold’s cross bridge for illusing the poor horse with his harness	 55.908360169540785
scab. Bad French I got for my pains. Of course it was frosty and the	 51.11909536837225
last tram. All tales of circus life are highly demoralising.	 46.0384671089257
_(Signor Maffei, passionpale, in liontamer’s costume with diamond studs	 20.05654319115361
in his shirtfront, steps forward, holding a circus paperhoop, a curling	 22.557660457096638
carriagewhip and a revolver with which he covers the gorging	 18.35435096797872
boarhound.)_	 4.608171674364364
SIGNOR MAFFEI: _(With a sinister smile.)_ Ladies and gentlemen, my	 20.52526236932902
educated greyhound. It was I broke in the bucking broncho Ajax with my	 17.859901703678602
patent spiked saddle for carnivores. Lash under the belly with a	 43.980297228861765
knotted thong. Block tackle and a strangling pulley will bring your	 28.14648740306249
lion to heel, no matter how fractious, even _Leo ferox_ there, the	 125.47258011784966
Libyan maneater. A redhot crowbar and some liniment rubbing on the	 22.335902945470835
burning part produced Fritz of Amsterdam, the thinking hyena. _(He	 148.23230612715938
glares.)_ I possess the Indian sign. The glint of my eye does it with	 29.75483488529703
these breastsparklers. _(With a bewitching smile.)_ I now introduce	 44.832194522133115
Mademoiselle Ruby, the pride of the ring.	 81.66438570489842
FIRST WATCH: Come. Name and address.	 112.50578390258161
BLOOM: I have forgotten for the moment. Ah, yes! _(He takes off his	 38.249730635976505
high grade hat, saluting.)_ Dr Bloom, Leopold, dental surgeon. You have	 55.92859525324391
heard of von Blum Pasha. Umpteen millions. _Donnerwetter!_ Owns half	 35.51928050435687
Austria. Egypt. Cousin.	 244.34867983390873
FIRST WATCH: Proof.	 63.93065742055223
_(A card falls from inside the leather headband of Bloom’s hat.)_	 77.24131247747572

Messrs John Henry Menton, 27 Bachelor’s Walk.	 27.712932731366266
FIRST WATCH: _(Reads.)_ Henry Flower. No fixed abode. Unlawfully	 29.515710443148365
watching and besetting.	 107.18409381406725
SECOND WATCH: An alibi. You are cautioned.	 41.516813946269885
BLOOM: _(Produces from his heartpocket a crumpled yellow flower.)_ This	 97.14273781173159
is the flower in question. It was given me by a man I don’t know his	 70.23918647276396
name. _(Plausibly.)_ You know that old joke, rose of Castile. Bloom.	 47.48336704734706
The change of name. Virag. _(He murmurs privately and confidentially.)_	 49.058622496253875
We are engaged you see, sergeant. Lady in the case. Love entanglement.	 74.24196547585576
_(He shoulders the second watch gently.)_ Dash it all. It’s a way we	 88.64946249009718
gallants have in the navy. Uniform that does it. _(He turns gravely to	 66.13763469360498

it in the shake of a lamb’s tail.	 65.45412795934992
_(A dark mercurialised face appears, leading a veiled figure.)_	 93.64291907151686
THE DARK MERCURY: The Castle is looking for him. He was drummed out of	 38.82298661488287
the army.	 171.15096419930373
MARTHA: _(Thickveiled, a crimson halter round her neck, a copy of the_	 61.263148948554424
Irish Times _in her hand, in tone of reproach, pointing.)_ Henry!	 90.61552319663956
Leopold! Lionel, thou lost one! Clear my name.	 84.53055395141251
FIRST WATCH: _(Sternly.)_ Come to the station.	 50.04751896430919
BLOOM: _(Scared, hats himself, steps back, then, plucking at his heart	 163.02284849812378
and lifting his right forearm on the square, he gives the sign and	 45.33475752204292
dueguard of fellowcraft.)_ No, no, worshipful master, light of love.	 58.70549310510779
Mistaken identity. The Lyons mail. Lesurques and Dubosc. You remember	 34.2474110152489
the Childs fratricide case. We medical men. By striking him dead with a	 214.69217373453503
hatchet. I am wrongfully accused. Better one guilty escape than	 32.27610495676876
ninetynine wrongfully condemned.	 70.21973531410792
MARTHA: _(Sobbing behind her veil.)_ Breach of promise. My real name is	 88.55858082021625
Peggy Griffin. He wrote to me that he was miserable. I’ll tell my	 32.85281935663367
brother, the Bective rugger fullback, on you, heartless flirt.	 26.007253138706265
BLOOM: _(Behind his hand.)_ She’s drunk. The woman is inebriated. _(He	 73.80841124550885
murmurs vaguely the pass of Ephraim.)_ Shitbroleeth.	 51.84895221045557
SECOND WATCH: _(Tears in his eyes, to Bloom.)_ You ought to be	 40.20346868555037
thoroughly well ashamed of yourself.	 82.40913078679499
BLOOM: Gentlemen of the jury, let me explain. A pure mare’s nest. I am	 77.92136385712038
a man misunderstood. I am being made a scapegoat of. I am a respectable	 44.856463692328234
married man, without a stain on my character. I live in Eccles street.	 88.8774005895309
My wife, I am the daughter of a most distinguished commander, a gallant	 37.89015744838373
upstanding gentleman, what do you call him, Majorgeneral Brian Tweedy,	 39.92507773288052
one of Britain’s fighting men who helped to win our battles. Got his	 146.95860225126697
majority for the heroic defence of Rorke’s Drift.	 6.8896597834936735
FIRST WATCH: Regiment.	 22.426823431877512
BLOOM: _(Turns to the gallery.)_ The royal Dublins, boys, the salt of	 111.45819997721306
the earth, known the world over. I think I see some old comrades in	 66.09939520311173
arms up there among you. The R. D. F., with our own Metropolitan	 111.85918017420964
police, guardians of our homes, the pluckiest lads and the finest body	 35.65097926826721
of men, as physique, in the service of our sovereign.	 63.13880122133162
A VOICE: Turncoat! Up the Boers! Who booed Joe Chamberlain?	 45.09516891521623
BLOOM: _(His hand on the shoulder of the first watch.)_ My old dad too	 47.87655178498494
was a J. P. I’m as staunch a Britisher as you are, sir. I fought with	 117.61574530288611
the colours for king and country in the absentminded war under general	 98.73815792582292
Gough in the park and was disabled at Spion Kop and Bloemfontein, was	 18.678471378733995
mentioned in dispatches. I did all a white man could. _(With quiet	 172.18326543227855
feeling.)_ Jim Bludso. Hold her nozzle again the bank.	 123.6696525956006
FIRST WATCH: Profession or trade.	 51.98734841455224
BLOOM: Well, I follow a literary occupation, author-journalist. In fact	 80.632510034857
we are just bringing out a collection of prize stories of which I am	 29.352683848182522
the inventor, something that is an entirely new departure. I am	 58.55696502138734
connected with the British and Irish press. If you ring up...	 109.54928285128736

MYLES CRAWFORD: _(His cock’s wattles wagging.)_ Hello, seventyseven	 105.91240881642376

Paralyse Europe. You which? Bluebags? Who writes? Is it Bloom?	 157.6807736965297
_(Mr Philip Beaufoy, palefaced, stands in the witnessbox, in accurate	 20.476851450672623

creased lavender trousers and patent boots. He carries a large	 32.56753319133312
portfolio labelled_ Matcham’s Masterstrokes.)	 4.045570071155129
BEAUFOY: _(Drawls.)_ No, you aren’t. Not by a long shot if I know it. I	 99.66584895756807
don’t see it, that’s all. No born gentleman, no-one with the most	 104.01271222735954
rudimentary promptings of a gentleman would stoop to such particularly	 35.146553678919034
loathsome conduct. One of those, my lord. A plagiarist. A soapy sneak	 28.63664011153654
masquerading as a literateur. It’s perfectly obvious that with the most	 52.92747182644603
inherent baseness he has cribbed some of my bestselling copy, really	 46.36824482156762
gorgeous stuff, a perfect gem, the love passages in which are beneath	 80.631100530344
suspicion. The Beaufoy books of love and great possessions, with which	 94.44232290794059
your lordship is doubtless familiar, are a household word throughout	 68.70011020772232
the kingdom.	 219.84870091243837
BLOOM: _(Murmurs with hangdog meekness glum.)_ That bit about the	 28.4362218573957
laughing witch hand in hand I take exception to, if I may...	 114.78177979990555
BEAUFOY: _(His lip upcurled, smiles superciliously on the court.)_ You	 134.5050849190084
funny ass, you! You’re too beastly awfully weird for words! I don’t	 169.16474897210284
think you need over excessively disincommodate yourself in that regard.	 137.08436966714652
My literary agent Mr J. B. Pinker is in attendance. I presume, my lord,	 69.4800876357359
we shall receive the usual witnesses’ fees, shan’t we? We are	 33.748281471535726
considerably out of pocket over this bally pressman johnny, this	 116.72840340115424
jackdaw of Rheims, who has not even been to a university.	 36.69512610484472

rottenness of the man! _(He extends his portfolio.)_ We have here	 28.172628256376726

maturer work disfigured by the hallmark of the beast.	 25.699675712736298

Moses, Moses, king of the jews,	 346.2186280294157
Wiped his arse in the _Daily News_.	 197.57714134618234
BLOOM: _(Bravely.)_ Overdrawn.	 50.23439425434676

FIRST WATCH: The King versus Bloom. Call the woman Driscoll.	 109.53870383023398
THE CRIER: Mary Driscoll, scullerymaid!	 15.923430220384182
_(Mary Driscoll, a slipshod servant girl, approaches. She has a bucket	 70.88936745179288
on the crook of her arm and a scouringbrush in her hand.)_	 19.81493070375781
SECOND WATCH: Another! Are you of the unfortunate class?	 42.806991346020034
MARY DRISCOLL: _(Indignantly.)_ I’m not a bad one. I bear a respectable	 76.11302335378811
character and was four months in my last place. I was in a situation,	 50.08795071355571
six pounds a year and my chances with Fridays out and I had to leave	 74.40208229558242
owing to his carryings on.	 17.03247327989221
FIRST WATCH: What do you tax him with?	 29.603920596095985
MARY DRISCOLL: He made a certain suggestion but I thought more of	 66.25281064857575
myself as poor as I am.	 127.7929053119377
BLOOM: _(In housejacket of ripplecloth, flannel trousers, heelless	 22.356494550037397
slippers, unshaven, his hair rumpled: softly.)_ I treated you white. I	 231.82975487077763
gave you mementos, smart emerald garters far above your station.	 125.96112302534883
Incautiously I took your part when you were accused of pilfering.	 41.395092807764506
There’s a medium in all things. Play cricket.	 42.809045430892844
MARY DRISCOLL: _(Excitedly.)_ As God is looking down on me this night	 58.18491350221767
if ever I laid a hand to them oylsters!	 106.1767086750794
FIRST WATCH: The offence complained of? Did something happen?	 80.52529803498321
MARY DRISCOLL: He surprised me in the rere of the premises, Your	 38.29722284286098
honour, when the missus was out shopping one morning with a request for	 106.66926508755488
a safety pin. He held me and I was discoloured in four places as a	 45.76964856477244
result. And he interfered twict with my clothing.	 16.897267216452025
BLOOM: She counterassaulted.	 116.37367589269495
MARY DRISCOLL: _(Scornfully.)_ I had more respect for the	 29.178205977930524
scouringbrush, so I had. I remonstrated with him, Your lord, and he	 57.165998203251036
remarked: keep it quiet.	 72.95230716406711
_(General laughter.)_	 2246.512913001537
GEORGE FOTTRELL: _(Clerk of the crown and peace, resonantly.)_ Order in	 91.5881537413902
court! The accused will now make a bogus statement.	 97.51001227827285
_(Bloom, pleading not guilty and holding a fullblown waterlily, begins	 61.468549014585086
a long unintelligible speech. They would hear what counsel had to say	 60.87422917579306
in his stirring address to the grand jury. He was down and out but,	 64.09026712228837
though branded as a black sheep, if he might say so, he meant to	 51.62626758797877
reform, to retrieve the memory of the past in a purely sisterly way and	 22.904319830310346
return to nature as a purely domestic animal. A sevenmonths’ child, he	 67.28521527134394
had been carefully brought up and nurtured by an aged bedridden parent.	 32.28434122952679
There might have been lapses of an erring father but he wanted to turn	 53.92428670941837
over a new leaf and now, when at long last in sight of the whipping	 92.08671647723816
post, to lead a homely life in the evening of his days, permeated by	 79.73332656053599
the affectionate surroundings of the heaving bosom of the family. An	 24.662819561637317
acclimatised Britisher, he had seen that summer eve from the footplate	 16.42395458507082
of an engine cab of the Loop line railway company while the rain	 56.67639376085475
refrained from falling glimpses, as it were, through the windows of	 58.39139224713497
loveful households in Dublin city and urban district of scenes truly	 28.29462991357876
rural of happiness of the better land with Dockrell’s wallpaper at one	 42.957270650834836
and ninepence a dozen, innocent Britishborn bairns lisping prayers to	 23.558344747380353
the Sacred Infant, youthful scholars grappling with their pensums or	 30.296911417417714
model young ladies playing on the pianoforte or anon all with fervour	 89.16196088960368
reciting the family rosary round the crackling Yulelog while in the	 57.1854545152218
boreens and green lanes the colleens with their swains strolled what	 35.65483814268096
times the strains of the organtoned melodeon Britannia metalbound with	 12.485532787035767
four acting stops and twelvefold bellows, a sacrifice, greatest bargain	 98.19325171183301
ever...._	 1903.9496821499147
_(Renewed laughter. He mumbles incoherently. Reporters complain that	 21.864845969021285
they cannot hear.)_	 120.81797900820942
LONGHAND AND SHORTHAND: _(Without looking up from their notebooks.)_	 16.01155903538855
Loosen his boots.	 45.15193094747805
PROFESSOR MACHUGH: _(From the presstable, coughs and calls.)_ Cough it	 73.0166570155533
up, man. Get it out in bits.	 146.09559530833286
_(The crossexamination proceeds_ re _Bloom and the bucket. A large	 48.21755774856794
bucket. Bloom himself. Bowel trouble. In Beaver street. Gripe, yes.	 115.06232002660929
Quite bad. A plasterer’s bucket. By walking stifflegged. Suffered	 275.55584125437156
untold misery. Deadly agony. About noon. Love or burgundy. Yes, some	 166.74167807175357
spinach. Crucial moment. He did not look in the bucket. Nobody. Rather	 49.56390112638271
a mess. Not completely. A_ Titbits _back number_.)	 80.01060013008117
_(Uproar and catcalls. Bloom in a torn frockcoat stained with	 29.89488630694256
whitewash, dinged silk hat sideways on his head, a strip of	 15.323822639408055
stickingplaster across his nose, talks inaudibly.)_	 25.66402902977056
J. J. O’MOLLOY: _(In barrister’s grey wig and stuffgown, speaking with	 33.308709483808215
a voice of pained protest.)_ This is no place for indecent levity at	 31.745268715927484
the expense of an erring mortal disguised in liquor. We are not in a	 39.58585521986064
beargarden nor at an Oxford rag nor is this a travesty of justice. My	 63.70769892376878
client is an infant, a poor foreign immigrant who started scratch as a	 64.44721461667943
stowaway and is now trying to turn an honest penny. The trumped up	 48.545298651921456
misdemeanour was due to a momentary aberration of heredity, brought on	 24.745799420885046
by hallucination, such familiarities as the alleged guilty occurrence	 52.38117274510981
being quite permitted in my client’s native place, the land of the	 54.868843558091825
Pharaoh. _Prima facie_, I put it to you that there was no attempt at	 33.67521610782626
carnally knowing. Intimacy did not occur and the offence complained of	 49.41795863955913
by Driscoll, that her virtue was solicited, was not repeated. I would	 116.12251503410172
deal in especial with atavism. There have been cases of shipwreck and	 16.857378915835113
somnambulism in my client’s family. If the accused could speak he could	 122.9377084455731
a tale unfold—one of the strangest that have ever been narrated between	 40.49011877682955
the covers of a book. He himself, my lord, is a physical wreck from	 49.48989189778295
cobbler’s weak chest. His submission is that he is of Mongolian	 43.7409461515618
extraction and irresponsible for his actions. Not all there, in fact.	 52.04007275693712
BLOOM: _(Barefoot, pigeonbreasted, in lascar’s vest and trousers,	 30.781240892873306
apologetic toes turned in, opens his tiny mole’s eyes and looks about	 64.8024327763294
him dazedly, passing a slow hand across his forehead. Then he hitches	 65.59059048257453
his belt sailor fashion and with a shrug of oriental obeisance salutes	 19.14543519546052
the court, pointing one thumb heavenward.)_ Him makee velly muchee fine	 95.32116213241781
night. _(He begins to lilt simply.)_	 109.3426079515617
Li li poo lil chile	 3.933542382544028
Blingee pigfoot evly night	 20.797753646770108
Payee two shilly...	 19.429454185737676
_(He is howled down.)_	 53.25811182001
J. J. O’MOLLOY: _(Hotly to the populace.)_ This is a lonehand fight. By	 28.41304864603962
Hades, I will not have any client of mine gagged and badgered in this	 38.95568969666215
fashion by a pack of curs and laughing hyenas. The Mosaic code has	 29.948344621887617
superseded the law of the jungle. I say it and I say it emphatically,	 26.972313455118037
without wishing for one moment to defeat the ends of justice, accused	 52.599678407440734
was not accessory before the act and prosecutrix has not been tampered	 58.93759317534762
with. The young person was treated by defendant as if she were his very	 89.39144711759788
own daughter. _(Bloom takes J. J. O’Molloy’s hand and raises it to his	 129.0662198077303
lips.)_ I shall call rebutting evidence to prove up to the hilt that	 70.68724403443683
the hidden hand is again at its old game. When in doubt persecute	 97.99546238545852
Bloom. My client, an innately bashful man, would be the last man in the	 33.18501681801229
world to do anything ungentlemanly which injured modesty could object	 105.77691884724382
to or cast a stone at a girl who took the wrong turning when some	 129.12052239548325
dastard, responsible for her condition, had worked his own sweet will	 41.08446141893423
on her. He wants to go straight. I regard him as the whitest man I	 50.94312713809044
know. He is down on his luck at present owing to the mortgaging of his	 40.60326028307074
extensive property at Agendath Netaim in faraway Asia Minor, slides of	 37.20430275022135
which will now be shown. _(To Bloom.)_ I suggest that you will do the	 54.56407969250935
handsome thing.	 612.9139743547039
BLOOM: A penny in the pound.	 105.50598451122211
_(The image of the lake of Kinnereth with blurred cattle cropping in	 16.6259273531751
silver haze is projected on the wall. Moses Dlugacz, ferreteyed albino,	 24.899813560267486
in blue dungarees, stands up in the gallery, holding in each hand an	 131.4710773742267
orange citron and a pork kidney.)_	 117.22838899575692
DLUGACZ: _(Hoarsely.)_ Bleibtreustrasse, Berlin, W. 13.	 33.28724561184869
_(J. J. O’Molloy steps on to a low plinth and holds the lapel of his	 25.861210935590208
coat with solemnity. His face lengthens, grows pale and bearded, with	 100.07833575060769
sunken eyes, the blotches of phthisis and hectic cheekbones of John F.	 17.052104482111645
Taylor. He applies his handkerchief to his mouth and scrutinises the	 31.73898531673557
galloping tide of rosepink blood.)_	 66.21883613330064
J. J. O’MOLLOY: _(Almost voicelessly.)_ Excuse me. I am suffering from	 41.84727732877597
a severe chill, have recently come from a sickbed. A few wellchosen	 33.94777604447538
words. _(He assumes the avine head, foxy moustache and proboscidal	 38.68282540006418
eloquence of Seymour Bushe.)_ When the angel’s book comes to be opened	 44.112741378260246
if aught that the pensive bosom has inaugurated of soultransfigured and	 39.17317066007946
of soultransfiguring deserves to live I say accord the prisoner at the	 33.753814183573006
bar the sacred benefit of the doubt.	 105.9999290959502
_(A paper with something written on it is handed into court._)	 167.85499781791717
BLOOM: _(In court dress.)_ Can give best references. Messrs Callan,	 200.44629793032152
Coleman. Mr Wisdom Hely J. P. My old chief Joe Cuffe. Mr V. B. Dillon,	 99.63307205106724
ex lord mayor of Dublin. I have moved in the charmed circle of the	 20.20926725500182
highest... Queens of Dublin society. _(Carelessly.)_ I was just	 46.48849207047135
chatting this afternoon at the viceregal lodge to my old pals, sir	 56.25244321940719
Robert and lady Ball, astronomer royal, at the levee. Sir Bob, I	 179.74559712246702
said...	 674.7359038427248
MRS YELVERTON BARRY: _(In lowcorsaged opal balldress and elbowlength	 7.8858998834611285
ivory gloves, wearing a sabletrimmed brickquilted dolman, a comb of	 20.76626031014549
brilliants and panache of osprey in her hair.)_ Arrest him, constable.	 24.089634650660997
He wrote me an anonymous letter in prentice backhand when my husband	 69.74539387813994
was in the North Riding of Tipperary on the Munster circuit, signed	 31.02680955587375
James Lovebirch. He said that he had seen from the gods my peerless	 59.19709210533787
globes as I sat in a box of the _Theatre Royal_ at a command	 54.10550532996042
performance of _La Cigale_. I deeply inflamed him, he said. He made	 39.89725491583239
improper overtures to me to misconduct myself at half past four p.m. on	 35.44348745564626
the following Thursday, Dunsink time. He offered to send me through the	 60.37330652852051
post a work of fiction by Monsieur Paul de Kock, entitled _The Girl	 51.37406514200507
with the Three Pairs of Stays_.	 82.77635886877685
MRS BELLINGHAM: _(In cap and seal coney mantle, wrapped up to the nose,	 80.26109516737081
steps out of her brougham and scans through tortoiseshell	 33.22839358887674
quizzing-glasses which she takes from inside her huge opossum muff.)_	 34.64628091021092
Also to me. Yes, I believe it is the same objectionable person. Because	 72.73972257160996
he closed my carriage door outside sir Thornley Stoker’s one sleety day	 206.88568114790732
during the cold snap of February ninetythree when even the grid of the	 30.774695673300833
wastepipe and the ballstop in my bath cistern were frozen. Subsequently	 27.41929368838519
he enclosed a bloom of edelweiss culled on the heights, as he said, in	 26.193089931976935
my honour. I had it examined by a botanical expert and elicited the	 32.37725135879937
information that it was a blossom of the homegrown potato plant	 16.061783276314273
purloined from a forcingcase of the model farm.	 16.833728914082492
MRS YELVERTON BARRY: Shame on him!	 26.99715214436101
