SECOND WATCH: _(Produces handcuffs.)_ Here are the darbies.	 35.779163222852304
MRS BELLINGHAM: He addressed me in several handwritings with fulsome	 37.14019831101913
compliments as a Venus in furs and alleged profound pity for my	 44.59432791565315
frostbound coachman Palmer while in the same breath he expressed	 53.847318246788575
himself as envious of his earflaps and fleecy sheepskins and of his	 31.55594166616986
fortunate proximity to my person, when standing behind my chair wearing	 90.48812483823279
my livery and the armorial bearings of the Bellingham escutcheon	 17.849510808906857
garnished sable, a buck’s head couped or. He lauded almost	 43.72513625658142
extravagantly my nether extremities, my swelling calves in silk hose	 34.64677807561585
drawn up to the limit, and eulogised glowingly my other hidden	 32.291925881693906
treasures in priceless lace which, he said, he could conjure up. He	 41.00383739376545
urged me (Stating that he felt it his mission in life to urge me.) to	 70.69151365294965
defile the marriage bed, to commit adultery at the earliest possible	 42.45065957867383
opportunity.	 4.608171674364364
THE HONOURABLE MRS MERVYN TALBOYS: _(In amazon costume, hard hat,	 25.49698766489978
jackboots cockspurred, vermilion waistcoat, fawn musketeer gauntlets	 13.83598885576105
with braided drums, long train held up and hunting crop with which she	 54.529656930174525
strikes her welt constantly.)_ Also me. Because he saw me on the polo	 74.61197247355462
ground of the Phoenix park at the match All Ireland versus the Rest of	 51.87275260874519
Ireland. My eyes, I know, shone divinely as I watched Captain Slogger	 43.13958953011381
Dennehy of the Inniskillings win the final chukkar on his darling cob	 26.60306954326105
_Centaur._ This plebeian Don Juan observed me from behind a hackney car	 117.90769323864706
and sent me in double envelopes an obscene photograph, such as are sold	 116.21275892691783
after dark on Paris boulevards, insulting to any lady. I have it still.	 108.1298927851476
It represents a partially nude señorita, frail and lovely (his wife, as	 40.18570208489927
he solemnly assured me, taken by him from nature), practising illicit	 81.14430993072959
intercourse with a muscular torero, evidently a blackguard. He urged me	 14.528128953270338
to do likewise, to misbehave, to sin with officers of the garrison. He	 36.88973924378985
implored me to soil his letter in an unspeakable manner, to chastise	 95.49794288099041
him as he richly deserves, to bestride and ride him, to give him a most	 34.92994933145821
vicious horsewhipping.	 4.411654744205047

ZOE: How’s the nuts?	 116.32812206410712
BLOOM: Off side. Curiously they are on the right. Heavier, I suppose.	 67.69877800055096

BLOOM: Not likely.	 100.90948505006027

BLOOM: A talisman. Heirloom.	 17.886276295919252

BLOOM: _(Forlornly.)_ I never loved a dear gazelle but it was sure	 47.072762137790676
to...	 109.99492139720992
_(Gazelles are leaping, feeding on the mountains. Near are lakes. Round	 71.58818470541341

hairgrowth of resin. It burns, the orient, a sky of sapphire, cleft by	 32.20822589994732

BLOOM: _(In workman’s corduroy overalls, black gansy with red floating	 29.678600375932263
tie and apache cap.)_ Mankind is incorrigible. Sir Walter Ralegh	 61.062527199425126
brought from the new world that potato and that weed, the one a killer	 76.20067182750229
of pestilence by absorption, the other a poisoner of the ear, eye,	 37.18660647822616
heart, memory, will, understanding, all. That is to say he brought the	 76.9739196941409
poison a hundred years before another person whose name I forget	 134.06283085585275
brought the food. Suicide. Lies. All our habits. Why, look at our	 165.98168687573386
public life!	 498.7652766657719
_(Midnight chimes from distant steeples.)_	 86.94089875488774
THE CHIMES: Turn again, Leopold! Lord mayor of Dublin!	 69.52916007501338
BLOOM: _(In alderman’s gown and chain.)_ Electors of Arran Quay, Inns	 47.42587802737676
Quay, Rotunda, Mountjoy and North Dock, better run a tramline, I say,	 262.5012973241568
from the cattlemarket to the river. That’s the music of the future.	 53.400732982640235
That’s my programme. _Cui bono?_ But our bucaneering Vanderdeckens in	 36.095731586446234
their phantom ship of finance...	 56.04235427073386
AN ELECTOR: Three times three for our future chief magistrate!	 115.22140933652362
_(The aurora borealis of the torchlight procession leaps.)_	 13.327816905432755
THE TORCHBEARERS: Hooray!	 6.922777768218444
_(Several wellknown burgesses, city magnates and freemen of the city	 39.30035954417396

tenens. _They nod vigorously in agreement.)_	 33.59102325235246

henceforth designated Boulevard Bloom.	 15.297732621004
COUNCILLOR LORCAN SHERLOCK: Carried unanimously.	 128.42532863555735
BLOOM: _(Impassionedly.)_ These flying Dutchmen or lying Dutchmen as	 64.76903803260818
they recline in their upholstered poop, casting dice, what reck they?	 21.648658488426342
Machines is their cry, their chimera, their panacea. Laboursaving	 89.11439600274508
apparatuses, supplanters, bugbears, manufactured monsters for mutual	 13.210423491227655
murder, hideous hobgoblins produced by a horde of capitalistic lusts	 24.38593883291231
upon our prostituted labour. The poor man starves while they are	 86.93530389974724
grassing their royal mountain stags or shooting peasants and	 39.250069973722205
phartridges in their purblind pomp of pelf and power. But their reign	 31.318029365806446
is rover for rever and ever and ev...	 43.219536926932676

beaters approach with imperial eagles hoisted, trailing banners and	 35.58521918527196

TOM KERNAN: You deserve it, your honour.	 114.15567386264524
BLOOM: On this day twenty years ago we overcame the hereditary enemy at	 65.12102447465097
Ladysmith. Our howitzers and camel swivel guns played on his lines with	 35.18915726517828
telling effect. Half a league onward! They charge! All is lost now! Do	 123.7593606216458

left our light horse swept across the heights of Plevna and, uttering	 47.3210181567346
their warcry _Bonafide Sabaoth_, sabred the Saracen gunners to a man.	 13.93357165864186

ALEXANDER KEYES: When will we have our own house of keys?	 38.74283389692314
BLOOM: I stand for the reform of municipal morals and the plain ten	 25.6026691334122
commandments. New worlds for old. Union of all, jew, moslem and	 61.91938468435692
gentile. Three acres and a cow for all children of nature. Saloon motor	 76.20020692767731

I vowed that I never would leave her,	 49.47253263201322
She turned out a cruel deceiver.	 79.21709485518495
With my tooraloom tooraloom tooraloom tooraloom.	 6.952517077417771

Casteele.	 4.608171674364364
_(Laughter.)_	 6551.2658316472025

Mendes gave precocious signs of infantile debauchery, recalling the	 24.95698446435384

_(Mother Grogan throws her boot at Bloom. Several shopkeepers from	 34.43418547566127

BLOOM: _(Excitedly.)_ This is midsummer madness, some ghastly joke	 53.185757215527865

inn ban bata coisde gan capall._ I call on my old friend, Dr Malachi	 27.00936697841944
Mulligan, sex specialist, to give medical testimony on my behalf.	 89.6644049237637
DR MULLIGAN: _(In motor jerkin, green motorgoggles on his brow.)_ Dr	 66.76656501890615
Bloom is bisexually abnormal. He has recently escaped from Dr Eustace’s	 28.38433457949431
private asylum for demented gentlemen. Born out of bedlock hereditary	 130.69349088400136
epilepsy is present, the consequence of unbridled lust. Traces of	 68.29855014941386
elephantiasis have been discovered among his ascendants. There are	 36.4633122510561
marked symptoms of chronic exhibitionism. Ambidexterity is also latent.	 37.69923637271291
He is prematurely bald from selfabuse, perversely idealistic in	 37.688162549693885
consequence, a reformed rake, and has metal teeth. In consequence of a	 58.44141662883216
family complex he has temporarily lost his memory and I believe him to	 76.46565036937389
be more sinned against than sinning. I have made a pervaginal	 45.263254294558735
examination and, after application of the acid test to 5427 anal,	 35.63305354840029
axillary, pectoral and pubic hairs, I declare him to be _virgo	 12.685486044700323
intacta._	 4.608171674364364
_(Bloom holds his high grade hat over his genital organs.)_	 62.674235373706004
DR MADDEN: Hypsospadia is also marked. In the interest of coming	 93.6945173115753
generations I suggest that the parts affected should be preserved in	 64.09810420770884
spirits of wine in the national teratological museum.	 165.26914722268805
DR CROTTHERS: I have examined the patient’s urine. It is albuminoid.	 27.237570267034858
Salivation is insufficient, the patellar reflex intermittent.	 8.223584840663296
DR PUNCH COSTELLO: The _fetor judaicus_ is most perceptible.	 17.370700679145155
DR DIXON: _(Reads a bill of health.)_ Professor Bloom is a finished	 170.48236910379762
example of the new womanly man. His moral nature is simple and lovable.	 81.97284628871117
Many have found him a dear man, a dear person. He is a rather quaint	 70.06958854346564
fellow on the whole, coy though not feebleminded in the medical sense.	 93.29982169296035
He has written a really beautiful letter, a poem in itself, to the	 59.43261139875561
court missionary of the Reformed Priests’ Protection Society which	 34.99503634413639
clears up everything. He is practically a total abstainer and I can	 34.71135514790419
affirm that he sleeps on a straw litter and eats the most Spartan food,	 45.348930460442574
cold dried grocer’s peas. He wears a hairshirt of pure Irish	 32.90705572016523
manufacture winter and summer and scourges himself every Saturday. He	 44.50788901259885
was, I understand, at one time a firstclass misdemeanant in Glencree	 47.33540087881051
reformatory. Another report states that he was a very posthumous child.	 44.350006833575335
I appeal for clemency in the name of the most sacred word our vocal	 34.80528709281767
organs have ever been called upon to speak. He is about to have a baby.	 139.16964587901242
_(General commotion and compassion. Women faint. A wealthy American	 75.65883258921399

evil. Where are you from? London?	 170.98088188206262

ZOE: Ladies first, gentlemen after.	 293.5205933348709
_(She crosses the threshold. He hesitates. She turns and, holding out	 40.02696069837502

white petticoat with the wand. She settles them down quickly.)_ Respect	 124.79508759374751

shift.	 6841.073226023633
_(Kitty Ricketts bends her head. Her boa uncoils, slides, glides over	 28.84836898420176

these knotty points see the seventeenth book of my Fundamentals of	 69.76463559383168
Sexology or the Love Passion which Doctor L. B. says is the book	 96.72022163453782
sensation of the year. Some, to example, there are again whose	 149.07084739207232
movements are automatic. Perceive. That is his appropriate sun.	 76.27589100014228

VIRAG: _(His face impassive, laughs in a rich feminine key.)_ Splendid!	 145.60454102176803

Eve and the serpent contradicts. Not a historical fact. Obvious analogy	 39.35364906722155

second according to the law of falling bodies. I have felt this instant	 39.75324172966361
a twinge of sciatica in my left glutear muscle. It runs in our family.	 46.2736848772738
Poor dear papa, a widower, was a regular barometer from it. He believed	 74.84299857633681
in animal heat. A skin of tabby lined his winter waistcoat. Near the	 76.65227154895392
end, remembering king David and the Sunamite, he shared his bed with	 56.15012367311948
Athos, faithful after death. A dog’s spittle as you probably... _(He	 61.74429236447319
winces.)_ Ah!	 100.4576999201616

Best value in Dub. Fit for a prince’s. Liver and kidney.	 32.526224359617146

are observed.	 386.06239420778866
THE FAN: _(Points downwards quickly.)_ You must.	 75.97864809579625

BELLO: _(Sarcastically.)_ I wouldn’t hurt your feelings for the world	 48.175702102065
but there’s a man of brawn in possession there. The tables are turned,	 77.11588656114316
my gay young fellow! He is something like a fullgrown outdoor man. Well	 59.35601795670788
for you, you muff, if you had that weapon with knobs and lumps and	 58.321190576363385
warts all over it. He shot his bolt, I can tell you! Foot to foot, knee	 63.62529839434632
to knee, belly to belly, bubs to breast! He’s no eunuch. A shock of red	 205.22622756842597
hair he has sticking out of him behind like a furzebush! Wait for nine	 89.21931061746574
months, my lad! Holy ginger, it’s kicking and coughing up and down in	 154.25385179001702
her guts already! That makes you wild, don’t it? Touches the spot? _(He	 153.71641268279916
spits in contempt.)_ Spittoon!	 7.465625312670333
BLOOM: I was indecently treated, I... Inform the police. Hundred	 66.86246188697338
pounds. Unmentionable. I...	 235.86885024194063

drizzle.	 4.608171674364364

years. Return and see.	 145.66197905889982

MILLY: My! It’s Papli! But, O Papli, how old you’ve grown!	 167.65170805995257

BELLO: _(Cuttingly.)_ Their heelmarks will stamp the Brusselette carpet	 47.008115925292074

find the buck flea in her breeches they will deface the little statue	 108.31400553484058
you carried home in the rain for art for art’s sake. They will violate	 66.45647942834422

your ten shilling brass fender from Hampton Leedom’s.	 63.561655360704414

Cohen, my stepnephew I married, the bloody old gouty procurator and	 30.469793284982345

THE NYMPH: _(Softly.)_ Mortal! _(Kindly.)_ Nay, dost not weepest!	 33.597787588311526

with dignity.)_ This position. I felt it was expected of me. Force of	 67.90791329662945

THE NYMPH: Mortal! You found me in evil company, highkickers, coster	 31.938091267634896
picnicmakers, pugilists, popular generals, immoral panto boys in	 27.046255434616626
fleshtights and the nifty shimmy dancers, La Aurora and Karini, musical	 17.415135361044026
act, the hit of the century. I was hidden in cheap pink paper that	 118.26084020904999
smelt of rock oil. I was surrounded by the stale smut of clubmen,	 33.912474802511014
stories to disturb callow youth, ads for transparencies, truedup dice	 29.594178756302895
and bustpads, proprietary articles and why wear a truss with	 63.19955255694303

BLOOM: _(Lifts a turtle head towards her lap.)_ We have met before. On	 77.41941881966336
another star.	 164.71244169304714
THE NYMPH: _(Sadly.)_ Rubber goods. Neverrip brand as supplied to the	 25.640734495776847
aristocracy. Corsets for men. I cure fits or money refunded.	 56.89006038956206
Unsolicited testimonials for Professor Waldmann’s wonderful chest	 72.69482716434953
exuber. My bust developed four inches in three weeks, reports Mrs Gus	 44.52229060731493
Rublin with photo.	 59.16995392502629
BLOOM: You mean _Photo Bits?_	 99.5879463562728

four places. And with loving pencil you shaded my eyes, my bosom and my	 117.17805575229251
shame.	 8899.828281478898

almost to pray.	 1381.2212930596972

bed or rather was pushed. Steel wine is said to cure snoring. For the	 154.0333363621197
rest there is that English invention, pamphlet of which I received some	 82.04602135827736
days ago, incorrectly addressed. It claims to afford a noiseless,	 68.85355690736425
inoffensive vent. _(He sighs.)_ ’Twas ever thus. Frailty, thy name is	 105.91007274434492
